I use it anytime I need to get grounded and feel more at ease with my feelings. I can‚Äôt recommend it enough!

title: Headspace Changed my life and my health
review: Everyday, I take 10mins for myself, which  gives me hour of focus and clarity to do so much more in my day. I had a health condition which was causing me pain and every time I  would meditate my pain would minimize. Andy Puddicombe, voice is so relaxing and he truly puts perspective and helps me set my expectation each day. Thank you Andy, I always look forward to our sessions! Headspace is very different, so easily accessible on your phone to take your mind and stress off of things.

title: Just know that if you give these people your card number, it‚Äôs a lifelong subscription.
review: I got the ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù two years ago. I the app was alright, but not worth $14 IMO. So i tried to cancel it every month since then. I have changed my card twice. They somehow find it and find a way to charge it. I have informed capital one to no avail. There is absolutely no way to cancel this app once you begin your subscription, so I highly recommend you are 110% sure you want this app because there is no phone number and the email is automated. If you try to cancel it will just pretend like you don‚Äôt know what you are talking about and go in circles until you give up. Then charge you next month
developerResponse: {'id': 21637861, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about the trouble with managing your subscription. We kindly ask that you visit https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008364988-How-do-I-cancel-my-subscription- and follow the instructions based on where you purchased your subscription. If you have any other questions, please send us a note to help@headspace.com. ", 'modified': '2021-03-14T17:42:28Z'}

title: Life changing
review:
I started using the free version a few times and it was useful but very limited. Once they gave out a free year to unemployed users, I started again and have given myself at least ten minutes of peace a day. It can change your whole day if you do it first thing in the morning. Thanks Headspace team, I‚Äôll be purchasing the full subscription once my year runs out. 
NOTE: the one feature that would be great to see is the ability to bookmark packets.

title: Love this app and Andy‚Äôs soothing voice, and....
review:
There are times it feels that Andy is narrating, rather than guiding you through the process. After a few lessons, I was able to remember the step progression that Andy taught and as I traveled further into my journey (by day 6 or 7), I felt that the repetition of instructing me on each daily step that I have already learned was increasingly becoming a distraction rather than a help. 

I recommend allowing functionality with the Apple Watch and use soft vibration to guide on the repetitive daily steps to help you know when to move on and have Andy chime in on new additions and/or changes.
developerResponse: {'id': 16267960, 'body': 'Thanks for your feedback regarding the narration and the Apple Watch. If you have any questions, feel free to email our team at help@headspace.com.', 'modified': '2020-06-28T22:31:41Z'}

title: Daily practice
review:
One of the best things about Headspace is that it keeps track of my total minutes and daily progress made. I had fits and stops getting started and keeping track of my progress at first, this app records all that for me and recognizes when I‚Äôm on a good streak. 

Daily meditation, even for just 15 minutes, has been a very centering and distilling experience. It helps to declutter thoughts and clarifying feelings. I have become more at ease as I make my practice part of each day.

title: Subscription warning
review: I signed up for a yearly subscription without being informed that it would auto renew. And there subscriptions are through the app not through Apple, so it doesn‚Äôt show in the Apple subscriptions. I was charged without warning again, and the only way to unsubscribe is to go the the website through a PC. I found it uncanny, and I felt like I was fooled. I emailed customer support, it received a reply saying they were busy and would be back in a few days, I received follow up emails saying we will be with you shortly, then nothing. Thanks for nothing headspace team, I just wanted My money refunded, so I could choose to pay how I wanted this year.
developerResponse: {'id': 13838438, 'body': "Thanks for reaching out here. We apologize for the delay in our response. Our Help Center has been seeing higher than normal volume and they're doing their best to respond to inquiries in the order in which they receive them. If you haven't already, you should receive a response shortly.", 'modified': '2020-03-03T19:26:28Z'}

title: Great App! I definitely recommend (for trouble falling back to sleep, stress, etc.)
review:
I have a lot of trouble with falling back to sleep, just going to sleep in general, so I decided I would try this app. Once I started listening to a falling back to sleep audio, I already could tell that I was starting to drift off with only 3 minutes into the audio. You can also switch people (coaches), which I really like. But yeah, I highly recommend this app, it works like a charm, and have a nice day.

Love the app!

title: Doctor Recommended
review: I have an anxiety disorder and a high stress career. My doctor recommended this app, which she uses herself, and thought it would be great for me. She was right!! This guided meditation has really helped me to be able to recognize feelings or emotions, and accept them without disruption. I‚Äôve subscribed since completing the basic program and am enjoying the different programs available. There‚Äôs even one for kids of different ages, so my 10 year old daughter and I meditate together. Love this app!!

title: Vital practice during Covid-19 pandemic
review: I started using Headspace at the beginning of the year to help calm the chatter that would sometimes overwhelm my mind. Then when self-isolation came into effect in my area meditation with the app became a routine that bolsters my sense of well-being during uncertainty. The setup of the app is very intuitive with options to try courses or just daily nuggets of wisdom to reflect on. I especially enjoy The Wake Up where I can gain insights that I normally would not encounter anywhere else. Five stars!

title: Disappointed subscriptions don‚Äôt share across family
review: Let me start off by saying overall this app is decent for guided meditation, which is kind of the point and I get that. That being said it‚Äôs really disappointing that at this price point I‚Äôm unable to share my subscription with my wife. It‚Äôs just another reminder that they are far less interested in actually helping people than they are in maximizing profit, which is sadly the standard for the industry. Slick cute marketing designed to make you think you matter as a person but in reality you only matters in terms of revenue.
developerResponse: {'id': 20382414, 'body': 'Sorry about any confusion with our Family Plan. If you looking to upgrade to a Family Plan, we recommend starting here: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/360011895334', 'modified': '2021-01-13T18:28:17Z'}

title: Good but...
review: I like it but I wish there were options to download the sleepcasts. I have a lot of internet problems and the sleep casts have helped me with my insomnia, but I can‚Äôt download them to listen to them if our WiFi is down. Also the speaking portion of the sleep cast is only about 25 minutes which is far too short for someone with insomnia. It would also be nice if they were organized by speaker because I prefer the old British man voice but have to listen to the first part of each one to find which ones he reads.

title: Love.  Especially the ‚ÄúSleepcasts.‚Äù
review: Please make more of these.  They are so eloquent and engaging that I get pulled in and lulled to bed.  I‚Äôve been using this app for several years now.  The ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù helped me through two pregnancies that were really close together and quite rough on the psyche.  Now as a mother of a 2 & 3 year old they still help by getting me to bed quickly even after multiple toddler night time wakings i.e. bottles, nightmares, peeing the bed...  thank you for putting this content together.  I appreciate your commitment not just as a customer but as a person.

title: Wonderful
review: I am a healthcare worker and it has been a rough year. I cannot thank Headspace enough for helping me through these challenging times. There are shorter meditations when one doesn‚Äôt have much time but needs a moment of sanity to clear their head. In addition there are longer ones with helpful tools and advice and the ap is easy to navigate to cater to different feelings. The sleep casts and sleep music have been a lifeline to enable me to get some much needed rest. Thank you so much.

title: Headspace changed my life
review: I found out about headspace through the show on Netflix, guide to mediation (highly recommend) and after trying a few other apps for sleep, meditation, etc, I figured I would give headspace a go. Seriously the best app I‚Äôve EVER used, wish I found it sooner but I guess the universal clock is always on time right? Andy and headspace literally changed my life and I am so thankful to have this experience . Will ABSOLUTELY be recommending this app to friends and family. Spread the wealth ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Used to struggle with meditation
review: I had given up on meditating as basically I couldn‚Äôt stop my mind from wandering or the judgement of whether or not I was doing it properly. But, after watching the Netflix Headspace series, where Andy‚Äôs guidance and technique simplified the whole process beyond belief, I had to get the app and subscribe to the family pack so my partner and I could reap the benefits. Of all the apps I have ever downloaded or purchased this is by far the most beneficial ever!!! Thank-you to Andy and the Headspace team.

title: Mental and physical health recovery and maintenance
review: Over the holidays, I suffered emotional and spiritual trauma resulting from a severe injury to a family member who has been hospitalized, battling depression, and suffering a concussion  from a fall. I was not able to sleep for almost 3 days due to my concussion, and the mental, spiritual and physical torment has been intense. I just started using headspace for sleeping at night and working on positivity for sports injury rehab. I‚Äôm looking forward to spending as much time as I can with meditating to heal my brain, spirit, heart and muscles (self).

title: YOU NEED THIS!
review: OMG this app is amazing! I didn‚Äôt think it would that well but was eager to try it, turned out to be an amazing decision to download! I turned on the storytelling and I relaxed myself as it instructs you and it was amazing, it‚Äôs like I went to another dimension! I had it on for about 20 minutes and then I woke up and I felt amazed and I just sat there for a few minutes thinking about it and I turned it back and fell asleep right away! Highly suggest for those with sleeping problems or anyone with stress.

title: Saving My Life Over Here
review: I‚Äôve been going through some heavy anxiety and depression this past year. Mediation and tapping (EFT) have saved me. This app is wonderfully diverse, and I love the home page with suggestions for morning, midday, and evening mindfulness. There are also plenty of options for specific needs, and I use the kids meditations frequently with my children. I am so grateful that Andi Puddicombe had an idea for Headspace and ran with it. It has grown into such a great resource that is literally changing lives.

title: Great app but...
review: This app is made very well. The quality of the app is great, no glitches not too sure but no ads. I really like the thought they put into the app. I have rated it a three because you have to pay six dollars a month to get anything on the app. I have downloaded this app a very long time ago and everything was free and it worked amazing. I am just a young student who wants a good night of sleep. I can‚Äôt pay six dollars a month. If the things on the app were free, it would be five stars without a doubt. If you can pay the six dollars a month, you go for it, it really does help.
developerResponse: {'id': 22307578, 'body': "Sorry for any confusion around our complimentary sessions, you don't have to enter any payment details to access these! Here's what's included in the free trial: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-", 'modified': '2021-04-18T19:21:41Z'}

title: Great Selections
review: I‚Äôm a university student and my courses are intensive and fast. Needed an App to feel calm and relaxed to go to bed. They have so much variety in voice actors, relaxing music that can make you feel focused and calm at the same time. They have amazing quality nature sounds. Theres stories or narrative meditative walkthroughs. Theres still much to explore. So far its help for all my needs for focus and to calm my anxieties and to relax to sleep. If you are a student they have a sweet discount for the whole year. Its worth it.

title: Interface / Customization
review:
I would love to give this app a 5 star review, but the interface just seems cumbersome. The general layout is ok, but it‚Äôs such a burden having to search through your recents or timeline in order to find the meditations most used. Additionally, some of the meditations are only found once you search the library instead of their designated page. 

If there was a ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù section that would make this an instant 5 stars, but the closest thing that comes to showing your ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù is what you‚Äôve downloaded. Just to find your downloads is slightly confusing and once you‚Äôre there, you can‚Äôt organize them.

Basically, I think the personal page could use a huge upgrade to make it easier to find meditations you use often and organize them better. Other than that, the content is outstanding and better than any other meditation app I‚Äôve tried. 

Please just add a ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù section!
developerResponse: {'id': 20093385, 'body': 'Sorry for any trouble navigating the app, the good news is we recently added a favorites feature! You simply have to click the heart icon next to the title, and it will appear under "Favorites" on the Today tab.', 'modified': '2020-12-30T20:02:00Z'}

title: Suggestion for longer Meditations
review:
I love the app. I particularly like the sense of accomplishment that comes from seeing how my total meditation minutes/hours add up and a 1:1 feeling of progress in my meditation practice as they do. 

As an improvement however, I would suggest the ability to have different counters for pure meditation time vs. time using sleepcasts/focus music, or even the ability to turn off time recording for the later in the settings. It‚Äôs persnickety, but I find it distorts my sense of how much I‚Äôve meditated and how I‚Äôm advancing in my practice.

title: Signed up for free healthcare version and still charged
review: I love this app so the stars here reflect the lack of efficient communication/help from headspace. I signed up for a free trial and then found out they were offering a free subscription for healthcare providers through 2020 so I enrolled for it through the website. I then emailed headspace to ask if I needed to cancel my subscription or if it would automatically switch to the free version. I never got a response and have now been charged $70. I love the service and the great offer for healthcare providers, but would like a refund. I emailed again but not hopeful about getting a response. Added stress during already stressful time!

title: Calming‚ù§Ô∏è
review: This app is very useful for if you have any sort of disorder or nightmares your having lately. They help me sleep and meditate more often they are just very relaxing and I feel happy when I sleep and meditate or even get up for the day when I‚Äôm feeling down. I strongly suggest you get this app if you having trouble sleeping or being able to go out and run around and getting started with your day. Thank you headspace for doing this for me I and keep up the good work!ü•∞üò∫üçÉ

title: Learning to Meditate
review: I have lived most of my life in state of dissociation; struggling with anxiety and then plummeting into depression. When I started seeking help and going to therapy, I learned about the Headspace app and the value of meditation in the healing journey. Headspace has been part of my life for a few years now. I‚Äôve tried a number of other meditation app, but have finally settled back on this one. The guided meditation and music selected is exceptional, the graphics and animations make me smile. I highly recommend this app!

title: A different space created with headspace
review: The convenience of having a meditation aid as close as my phone has made a significant change in my ability to meditate regularly. The grief module helped me thru the loss of my husband; the pain module helped through my broken elbow recovery. Now as I go they the Pro series I am getting deeper into what meditation is all about. Then there‚Äôs yoga modules. I Can‚Äôt say enough about the difference having this app on my phone has made in my life. Thank you headspace

title: From fear and judgement to calm and accepting
review: When I first started headspace, I was full of fear and judged myself and my relationships harshly. After 54 days of meditation with headspace, I have learned that it is okay to accept what is in the moment. To be content with whatever the situation. To be present and not judge. This has brought me to a place of openness in my relationships that has created the opportunity for me to heal those that I have hurt and forgive those that I have felt hurt by. Headspace will be a part of my daily routine forever.

title: App has improved but still lacking
review: I don‚Äôt have much more to add to what others have said in their reviews, but I do appreciate how many new features they've added to the app. I pretty much only use headspace for sleep so I‚Äôm probably in the minority, but I‚Äôm surprised that a toggle for night mode hasn't been added yet; I find it pretty jarring to be scrolling through the sleep tab in the dark and then accidentally or intentionally switch to another tab with a bright white screen in my face. Would love to see that get implemented

title: Sleepcasts have cured my nighttime anxiety
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for over a year. And although this app is great for teaching people to meditate (which I admit I am not really interested in), I truly believe this is the best app to use to help you fall asleep. The sleepcasts have a lot of variety, and they keep me calm and relaxed. Allowing me to fall asleep without anxiety or a worrying mind and wake up feeling so refreshed. I would recommend this app to anyone that struggles to turn their brain off at night. 10/10 love it.

title: Been using it since 2012, big changes recently
review:
Headspace is my go-to app. It has changed my life. I‚Äôve bought yearly subscription for about 10 people, and I've been using it nonstop since 2012. The reasons why me review went down from 5 stars to 3 are the following:
1) They are not releasing daily meditations anymore. This was extremely valuable, and they‚Äôve replace it with something called ‚ÄúThe Wake Up‚Äù which is very hit and miss.
2) They have gotten somewhat political. I understand that brands need to stand for what they believe in, and all that‚Äôs great. But in a world where politics is now everywhere (in sports,movies,social media etc) Headspace always felt like a refuge, like a place where you could tune out all that external noise and just breathe and relax. 

In conclusion, point number one is the biggest reason i gave it such a score now, but point number two is also worth mentioning.
I hope they bring back the daily meditations with Andy.
Thanks.
JR
developerResponse: {'id': 16152110, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback is heard. Please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com and we can help you locate the daily meditations on the app!", 'modified': '2020-06-22T20:20:51Z'}

title: Simply the best.
review: I‚Äòve been using headspace on and off over the last 5-6 years. I found it very good, but also quite expensive. So I did a safari, trying out other apps for a year or so - and now I‚Äôm back. No other app manages to catch and support me like Headspace does. It‚Äôs delightfully simple and does what I need it to do. Online and offline. Headspace simply ‚Äúdoes what it says on the can‚Äù without trying to make it more complicated than necessary. And that‚Äôs well worth the price!

title: Got me meditating, keeps me meditating
review: Headspace did the trick for me. I had tried meditating before, but those efforts never lasted very long. Headspace is an excellent choice for people who prefer their meditation without the religious/spiritual/new age trappings. Just good guidance to good practice. I‚Äôve tried several other apps and books, but Headspace is the best among them. Now I start each day with a brief meditation (and coffee, of course). I find it makes me just a bit calmer during the day. It‚Äôs good for me and for my family.

title: Pretty good
review: I used to use this app back when it first started and there were far less courses and options to choose from. I love that there‚Äôs so many options now, but can‚Äôt really afford the subscription at the moment. Overall, it‚Äôs a great app. I do have one suggestion: there should be an option to add courses or single meditations to a playlist of sorts. Sometimes I see courses that I want to try but don‚Äôt have time in that moment. I‚Äôd like to be able to add them to a list so I can come back to them later.

title: Amazing array of options!
review: I have used other meditation apps but the flexibility and variety of features Headspace offers works the best for me. There are meditations targeted for specific needs, and dedicated structured programs designed to be completed over days or weeks. You can find guided meditations as well as those with minimal to no prompts, and all come in a range of lengths. So far, headspace offers the perfect combination of choice and structure for me. And I‚Äôve only just begun to explore the options!

title: Good Good Stuff
review:
Really like to put the ‚Äúmusic‚Äù on as I drift off to sleep.  Have recently been using the guided meditation (use the male voice-I swear its Russell Brand!) when I crawl in bed and find that it helps me replace all those racing thoughts in my brain that typically prevent my falling asleep with something more peaceful to concentrate on. 

Would like even more bedtime meditation options as well as longer lengths; would be nice to have variations and extended time for nights you just need to keep intrusive thoughts at bay.

title: A way to feel better
review: During the pandemic, being diagnosed with a life long illness, having so much anxiety and dread I found this app. I can honestly say that it has changed how I live! The amount of help, clarity, and calmness I get from the days that I practice meditation makes a dramatic difference. But like anything else it takes practice. I do notice the major differences in the days that I don‚Äôt practice. I can honestly say that headspace has given me a way to feel better.

title: Handy connection to sanity
review: I love knowing that Headspace is always available for me to turn to to lead me in a meditation when I need it.  I am able to yank myself out of any prevailing turmoil in my head and take a few minutes to reset, calm down and adopt a new perspective.  It has also been phenomenal for my sleep pattern.  If I wake in the night, I simply breathe and focus on the breath as in the guided meditations and miraculously fall back asleep in no time.  This has been a worthwhile investment in myself indeed!

title: Headspace
review:
The interface is getting more and more convoluted. I'd prefer a big button to just start a meditation, preferably the next one in my current course, instead of all these other options.

Great guidance through the meditation. The app itself is a little above average in quality, nothing extraordinary. But the content is very good.

There's no way to change the subscription in the app you have to open their website or use the Apple system.

title: Suggestions!
review: This app is great and I use it every day for sleeping and gaining control over my mood and emotions. I especially love the sleepcasts! However, I think a nice bonus feature would be to save our favorite programs so they are more easily accessible (meditations, sleepcasts, etc) so we can see them in one spot instead of having to tap through the menu. I tend to go to the same ones which are my favorites. Thank you for the awesome app and discount for students!

title: Almost there
review: Love this app - it‚Äôs made meditating accessible for me and has been a huge life saver when it comes to falling asleep. However I wish there was a library mechanism of sorts. Somewhere to keep your favorite meditations/series or future ones you‚Äôd like to start would be immensely helpful. I know there‚Äôs a download feature but I don‚Äôt want to have to download every single meditation I‚Äôd like to revisit or start soon. Navigating to downloaded meditations is difficult anyway. If this feature was in the app it would be perfect!
developerResponse: {'id': 17308272, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback, we'll be sure to pass along this feedback to our team! Feel free to reach out to our team at help@headspace.com if you have any other questions.", 'modified': '2020-08-16T20:03:24Z'}

title: Best thing I have done for myself
review: I wanted to challenge myself further to start taking better care of my health ‚Äî both physically, but mentally as well. Headspace is the perfect start and end to my day. I normally don‚Äôt ever sign up for subscriptions, but I absolutely feel that Headspace is worth it. There are so many different types of meditations and themes to select that you can‚Äôt possibly find something you won‚Äôt benefit from. I love this app and truly and honestly recommend it.

title: The  best for sleeping and its free!
review: This is the best app if your struggling with falling asleep and going back to bed also is really good for staying and making you more  productive in life especially in work! I really recommend this, it  helps for everything and I   just really enjoy it and without this app, i was struggling with going and falling to sleep and i‚Äôm proud to put a five  star for this app and also taking  my time on writing this review thank you for the person who made this game!

title: Helps me get through the day
review: This app has really opened my eyes to a new way of living life. This is actually the only app that has had a positive impact on my life. There are ways to cope with anxiety and ruminating thoughts. When I find myself in difficult situations mentally, I am always reminded to pay attention to my breath and let my thoughts pass through me because sometimes our thoughts don‚Äôt need to be taken so seriously. Thank you for helping my mindfulness journey, Headspace.

title: New Today Tab is a bad change
review: Nothing like having a checklist of things to do on my meditation app home screen. Definitely not stressful at all. I love seeing a big list of things I need to do throughout the entire day. I love it when an algorithm picks a bunch of random videos and playlists and then makes me feel compelled to watch them. Very thoughtful design choice and definitely feels grounded in care for the user and not in helping some product manager in charge of workout videos on a meditation app get their content onto the Home Screen somehow. Again, I love feeling pressured by my meditation app. Great feeling.

title: ‚ÄúFree‚Äù Trial wasn‚Äôt free
review: I signed up for the free trial as the app is very expensive and I wasn‚Äôt sure it‚Äôs for me.  App itself is great, really liked the sleep meditation.  However I decided it‚Äôs not for me and within one week I followed all steps provided by Headspace to cancel the service.  Immediately received a confirmation from them stating they received my cancellation request.  But at the end of two weeks today I was charged for the annual subscription amount.  I have no way to contact them except an email address that I have no idea if they check.  A CS chat option would be nice for issues like this.  At this point it looks like I need to go to my bank to dispute the charges.

title: Life changing
review: Practicing the guided meditations everyday with Andy‚Äôs calming voice in the past several months is helping me through an immensely challenging time with my mental health. I am grateful for that. I love so many things about the app: the daily meditations, courses, animations, and mindful earth videos. The only thing I‚Äôd ask for is longer meditations now that I‚Äôve become comfortable with the 20 minute sessions - which says a lot about the app since I initially struggled with the 5 minute ones!

title: Highly Recommend This App!
review: Always read about the benefits of meditation but never really stuck to it. Started using this app about a year ago and it the most value added habit/app in my life. Andy and other presenters in the app are some of the best I‚Äôve tried. The animated videos make the meditation concepts easy to understand and explain. Now I‚Äôm one of those annoying people that push their loved ones to meditate üòÜ. Everyday is a good day to meditate, especially today.

title: Amazing
review:
I take 3-10 minutes in the mornings before work to sit down and learn how to meditate with Headspace. It teaches you everything. At first you are skeptical that this is even a real thing or that this might work for everyone else but it is not going to work for me. Stay positive and try that is all you need. I started feeling better the more I practiced with it. I am still learning but I can tell it‚Äôs making a difference with how busy my mind is. 
~Registered Nurse

title: Best money I‚Äôve ever spent
review: I have gained so much from this app. I used to fall asleep every time I tried to meditate, but this app has taught me how to relax while remaining focused and has greatly improved my overall approach to life. I am more patient, kind and happy - things that have benefited myself and my family. During this time of high stress from the COVID-19 pandemic, it has really helped me manage my stress to keep going strong for myself and my family. I absolutely love it. Well worth the money!

title: Its good but..
review: Its a great app and helps me get to sleep but i just wish that i could pick more than one issue im having when signing up. My main issue is sleep but im also struggling with stress and a lack of energy. I havent tried the subscription yet because im a broke high school student whos constantly under pressure and has no time for a job so correct me if im wrong and you just need the subscription to get help with multiple issues. I will continue to use it i just dont want the hassle of creating multiple accounts.

title: Life-Changing. More free options than ever before.
review:
With a higher rating than Calm, the money-hungry pain-in-a-neck meditation app, Headspace is always my go-to for high-quality, soothing meditations. It has helped me calmed down in the COVID-19 crisis, and Headspace is none other. People say British accents are distracting, but I used to have one. And I love the new Wake-Ups too. They help me understand different situations, more in-depth. God bless you Headspace. You‚Äôre so good I think I might get Premium. 

Best regards,
The Awesome Review Master

title: Game changing!
review: Headspace has been a game changer for me. I‚Äôve become more mindful and at peace with the challenges that arise every day. I‚Äôve been able to encourage others to tackle their anxiety and issues through mindfulness and even walked my colleagues through a focusing meditation. I didn‚Äôt realize how much I would come to appreciate taking this space and time for silence until I started to reap the benefits! Would recommend using this app every day 10/10!

title: Thank you, all at Headspace!
review:
Am so grateful for this app!!  I am an entry level practitioner, and I appreciate the guided meditations, as well as, the group meditations.  I love the sound meditations, particularly the ocean pier recordings,  which help me to relax before sleeping.  One day, maybe I will be fit enough to try the exercisesüòú.   
 Headspace has been a much-appreciated respite from the stress of frontline covid and from 24/7 political stress.  Truly.
Thank you for all that you do to make this practice  understandable and available!üôÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Amazing App
review:
I love this app and I would definitely recommend it to anyone that might be interested in exploring mindfulness. 

I‚Äôm very new to mindfulness having just been introduced to it during a week in rehab for anxiety and depression. After I got out I started looking for guided meditation apps and came across Headspace. After using the free app for only a day I recognized that this app has so much to offer and I wanted to unlock all of the features! I have not been disappointed!

title: Life changing app
review:
I tried meditation for the first time with this app. Thankfully, I‚Äôve been managing to meditate everyday for over about a month and I can feel a tremendous difference on my life in terms of peace, organizing my thoughts, being much more patient and comfortable with myself and others. I love how they introduce every session. I appreciate the fact they respect all religions by not bringing up Buddha beliefs like many meditation guided sessions out there. 
Shout out to the app founder :)
Highly recommend it.

title: Great app but one issue
review: This is a great app and the only reason i tried it was because you say that you are offering a free year subscription to anyone who is unemployed but there is nothing in your app about how to receive that. Being unemployed it would be nice to have an app that can keep my head clear and not have to pay for it until i can truly afford it. Please let me know of any information about how to receive the unemployed free year. Thank you

title: Best Meditation App Ever!
review: Sometimes I put off meditation like I put off calling my blabbery aunt who never stops talking. I know I need to do it, but ‚Äúlater‚Äù always seems like a better time. Headspace helps by making the experience way easier by providing a fun and intuitive user interface, and with amazing guided meditations that leave me feeling all warm and fuzzy on the inside. It feels like a massage for my brain, and I keep coming back for more after all these years.

title: Essential Companion for a Healthier and Happier Life
review: Like any tool or technique, mindfulness is as useful as your ability to practice, build new capabilities, and the. enact this in everyday life.  Headspace makes it easy and inviting to make common knowledge into common practice with a variety of teachers, programs and content that will invite you back over and over.  I can‚Äôt think of an aspect of life that hasn‚Äôt improved a little or a lot as a result of consistently practicing with Headspace.  Thank you!

title: Very helpful and useful!
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for months and am very pleased with it. I struggle with a lot of anxiety and using this app daily really helps to calm me down during the meditations. I use the practices they‚Äôve taught me on my own outside of the app as well when I feel I need to reign back in my thoughts and emotions. Andy and Eve‚Äôs voices are so soothing to me and it‚Äôs comforting to have a partner or two on this journey of trying to achieve a calm mind and calm being! Highly recommend!

title: Grateful for Andy and Headspace
review: I've been using the app for about two years and love everything it offers, but I have one suggestion. The sleep meditations and sleep music are in night mode on their menus, but as soon as you are able to click play they go to a white screen. It messes with my eyes every night, and I use it at bedtime and in the middle of the night. Thank you for your consideration! Just hearing Andy's voice on TV commercials relaxes me. I'm so thankful for Headspace.

title: So grateful for this app
review: This app is so much more than a meditation app. It‚Äôs therapy at the tip of your fingers. The daily meditations are great because theres always something new and you can adjust the time to be as short or as long as you want. The courses are amazing for when you‚Äôre going through a rough patch and need a reminder that things are going to be alright. I love this so much and am so grateful for the people who are behind this. Thank you, thank you, thank you!

title: What I think
review: I think that headspace is a great meditation app but only if you pay the subscription honestly I wish there was more sleepcast and other more sleep things as that is what the majority of the people on this app use it for I hate paying subscription for things I honestly just like to own things maybe putting a one time pay can really be better because if a persons in debt and can‚Äôt pay that is the end of their subscription. Headspace community if you are reading this please make more free sleepcasts THANKS!

title: Thank you üôè
review: I am unemployed and struggling financially so It was a true blessing to get this extraordinary, life changing app for free for one year. I have stayed committed and I am feeling much better since I have started, more than a month ago. I have been recommended it to my family and friends and shared my 2 free months that I received as a gift for staying committed. Thank you Andy for everything you do to make this world a better place and help us with our human struggles.

title: Lifesaver
review:
I downloaded this app several years ago and almost immediately purchased the full version. 

Learning to meditate via the app has seen me through a slew of personal and professional crises. No matter what is going on in my life, I know I can carve out even just a few minutes for this important self-care.

I owe an incredible debt of gratitude to Andy and all the people behind the app for helping me learn how to meditate and allowing me to discover how to just BE.

title: A Christian who loves this app
review: I have heard many Christians speak so poorly of this app as anti-Christian or pushing another religious agenda. Now, I haven‚Äôt tried any of the yoga and I have only had this app for a little over a week, but I have found the meditations to be SUPER helpful for my anxiety and it leaves plenty of room for me to insert my beliefs about Jesus without feeling at all pressured to compromise my strong beliefs. The Lord has been using this app in my life and I believe He can use it in yours too!

title: Money
review: If your going to make have to buy everything then why don‚Äôt you make us pay for it at the App Store? 3:16 In the morning, everyone is sleeping but me, my ears are saying yes, but my brain is saying no. I started searching ways to sleep, I saw the headspace ad, I downloaded it and had the feeling ‚ÄúFinally! Jeez.‚Äù I signed up, and wanted to listen to the 43 minute sleep cast. It said I needed a free trial. Then I went to the sleep library and pressed a cast WITH NO LOCK and I said ‚Äúwhat? So what does the lock mean?‚Äù If your going to have to pay for everything, why don‚Äôt we pay when we download the app? It doesn‚Äôt make sense. If that‚Äôs the case, is sleep space a up logger? If I could rate this 0 stars, I would.

title: Great app for meditation
review:
Wonderful variety of guided meditations for a fair price. This is the perfect app for all skill levels in meditation, from beginner to expert. My favorite part is their videos, because of the incredible insights they give us that pertain to our lives. Also great deal for students. 

If you‚Äôre not convinced they have 7 meditations for free you can try. I used those 7 meditations on repeat for 6 months before I committed to buying the rest. And man was it worth it

title: 1 missing feature from perfection
review: I have ADHD and this has been one of the best ways I have to help myself. That said, I have ADHD, sometimes I lose steam for a pack and quit halfway through. I want to re-train those aspects I didn't finish working through, so sometimes I would like to reset it so I don't have to remember where I was from day to day until I catch up! Other than that, helpful in a lot of ways and not just for regular people!

title: Lifesaver
review: I love this app and have been using it over the last year, both before the pandemic hit and over the latest 11 months. It has been a lifesaver during successive lockdowns I‚Äôm my area and has given me support and structure for a meditation practice. The additional cameo appearances during ‚Äúthe wake up‚Äù have been really grounding as well. Thank you to the entire Headspace community for your inspiration and insight to navigate these challenging times.

title: Disappointed by capitalism at work in the app
review: It bothers me immensely that the free version is so limited. Meditation should be freely given. To capitalize on the lack of mindfulness/the need of people in a modern society that is sick and distressed and disconnected in order to make money is sickening in my opinion. At the very least you could offer more free sos and sleep options. And you could organize it so that you can find the free options easier without having to scroll past 30 locked meditations that aren‚Äôt available unless you pay. Also too many suggestions that I start a ‚Äúfree trial‚Äù which we know is a gimmick to get at least some of my money.

title: Has become cluttered and marketing-y
review: The app used to be simple and lovely and had a soothing feel to it. This was an invaluable refuge for a type A highly strung person like me. However, something terrible has happened recently and the app is now a cluttered mess. So many tabs, so many options, it's bringing all that anxiety back again. Also I'd turned off notifications for anything but my daily reminder, yet I still keep getting "suggestions" from the app - which are really not helpful. Polluting my notifications is the last thing I need. Please fix this. Also can you make the app less cluttered somehow? I will be forever grateful.

title: Please bring back the focus section!!!
review: I love how they used to organize the app...especially the focus section which is really helpful (with nature sounds) when you want to study/focus, but the new version canceled that separate section, instead, puts it under the library:(((( I hardly even use the ‚Äúmove‚Äù part since I have other workout apps, but it could be good if the users can choose the sections that have short cuts.

title: Amazing app and customer service!
review: I was extremely frustrated over some trouble accessing the app recently, but the customer service team resolved it quickly and effectively. I‚Äôve been using the Headspace app for more than half a year now. I‚Äôm still waiting to see significant improvements in my meditation, but I can say for certain that the sleeping tracks are an absolute savior some nights when I just can‚Äôt fall asleep. Great app and great team!
developerResponse: {'id': 16546229, 'body': 'Sorry for the trouble! We did experience a bit of an outage today, but that has been fixed and you should be able to access your content now.', 'modified': '2020-07-11T00:02:45Z'}

title: Helpful, no matter the situation
review:
Headspace has helped me in my journey to find some semblance of peace within my own head. The practices and techniques the app guides you through are straightforward and easy to understand. The animations help to visualize the meaning behind the message. The streak is intimidating, but holding yourself to a routine and continuing with the practice everyday is the key to learning how to meditate. 

Highly recommend this app for its user friendly format and high quality content.

title: Love the app - one request
review: I absolutely love this app and everything Headspace is doing to ensure the medical/mental health community and now all of LA County have access to this invaluable resource during these difficult times. It definitely makes me want to continue supporting the company and become a paying member. My only request is to update how the Run Streak calculates days. I‚Äôve meditated 7 times over the past 4 days, but the app says I have a 7-day run streak, not 4-day. Other than this, no complaints! Keep up the great work.

title: Unwanted videos on home screen
review:
I use this app every day to manage daily stress at university. The recent addition on the home screen that plays videos for ‚Äúthe wake up‚Äù doesn‚Äôt fit the app and is a distracting/overstimulating part of the home screen. The video begins playing without our permission or desire like a Netflix trailer. We don‚Äôt use headspace to watch videos! If anything, the app is a respite from all the screen stimulation we‚Äôre bombarded with in our lives!

This feature isn‚Äôt necessary and is turning the app into something it wasn‚Äôt designed for. Please remove the self-playing video in the home screen!

title: I have some complaints
review:
Okay so let‚Äôs get started.

Almost everything in this app you have to pay for. I do understand that in an app, you want to make a bit of money off of it by making premium. But I do think that you should have more of the sleep songs for free. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs the best to have people playing for being able to get a good nights rest. I don‚Äôt want to sound to picky. The concept of this app is good. And I enjoy having it. But you see, if I can‚Äôt use it for free, (or at least some of it) I won‚Äôt take much intest.

Thanks for your time.

title: Coming back
review: I started using headspace several years ago when it first came out. The app seemed to be getting a little tired and the material seemed to stagnate after an initially awesome year or two. I left. Well, I‚Äôm back and I‚Äôm absolutely delighted with the content!! This app taught me to meditate, and I feel like I‚Äôve come home again. üíï Great work, and Thank you for all you do. I think your the best meditation app on the market! (I tried all the others too)

title: Headspace for Health
review:
I started using Headspace 330 days ago never having focused on a healthy mind in my life.
I thought meditation was for unusual people who were in to an alternative lifestyle.
I never realized that they got it ,, living in the moment.. whatever the moment was . All the preexisting notions are now banished . I have been able to thrive during the pandemic not just exist . I am truly grateful that I have learned a new skill that will help me every moment of my new awareness of life !

title: Truly a great app
review: I started using Headspace a couple of years ago during a stressful time and I am so impressed I‚Äôve continued using it daily. I love everything about it. I started using the sleep wind downs to help me sleep then one of the meditation courses and now added the move part. I look forward to the wake up every day. My husband has even started using the app. Great, thought out content. Has become a real asset to every part of my life.

title: Great App.. If It Wasn‚Äôt For The Money Wall
review: I‚Äôve used this app & the techniques it has taught me on & off since 2018. I‚Äôve noticed that, despite truly being a good app with beneficial courses to improve one‚Äôs mental health, almost every single feature is now locked behind a Money Wall/Pay Wall. I can‚Äôt help but wonder if I was wrong about the people behind this app, seeing as I originally thought that their intentions were good. Now, I‚Äôm not so sure. I shouldn‚Äôt have to pay a chunk of money to be able to access courses, techniques, & patterns that can actually help me cope with my anxiety.

title: Saved my sleep schedule
review: I recently started working early mornings, and found it very difficult to fall asleep the night before. I tried just about every over the counter drug to help me sleep but it would just make me feel groggy in the morning. I had seen headspace several times and thought I‚Äôd give it a try. I got the student plan and I absolutely love it. The sleep sounds helps me fall asleep and I wake up feeling so refreshed. This app is a miracle.

title: Incredible app
review: This app is by far the best app I have ever tried. Like I would to try Calm but personally I like headspace more. Like calm is expensive when headspace isn‚Äôt as expensive. Like when I didn‚Äôt have the premium with calm it wouldn‚Äôt even let me complete what I started. When your doing headspace without premium you can finish the ten sessions of the basic and finish it. As you can see Headspace is a much better choice than any other calming apps.

title: When you‚Äôre ready to learn self awareness, Headspace is there
review: Meditation is hard. Life is distracting. I‚Äôve seen how Headspace has evolved over the years and honestly, at 25, having these little five to ten minute sessions ready and on tap to re center my brain and re-route my thinking away from negative or distressing patterns is exceptionally useful. Headspace on your phone is like keeping a first aid kit in your car: when you need it, you are super happy it‚Äôs there.

title: The absolute BEST!
review: I‚Äôve tried meditation many times over the past 30 years but never felt I was doing it right. Until listening to Andy on Headspace! There is no wrong. How about that?! Also did the grief meditation series and finally let go of the sorrow I‚Äôve been carrying surrounding the death of my mother when I was 13. I now have been able to picture her smiling which is so very rewarding. Give Headspace a go! I‚Äôm confident you will thoroughly enjoy it!

title: The best mindfulness app according to scientific research!
review: Headspace is an amazing mindfulness app. Not only is Andy vastly knowledgeable and has an insane amount of experience in meditation and mindfulness practice. And not only are the animations helpful and cute! But when I found out that there was a research study done to see if mindfulness apps on the market actually follow mindfulness precepts so to speak - Headspace was rated as #1. (Most other apps didn‚Äôt even qualify!) That finding convinced me to get the premium account!üòä

title: Good content, outdated app
review: I really like head space. I enjoy the guided meditation and focus music. On the plus side, content is good with regular updates. But only three stars as they need to update their app. Specifically for iOS. App feels clunky and old. Suggestions: 1. Allow app to rotate in landscape. 2. Dark mode would be nice 3. White home line on bottom of recent iPhones and iPads should fade out. Some really basic updates. Considering it‚Äôs a paid subscription service and they have quite a following, I would expect these most basic of features to be standard.

title: Bookmark Feature?
review: I would love to be able to easily be able to navigate back to the videos that helped me in recent days, and even specific meditation videos that really worked for me. Instead of going to ‚Äúrecents‚Äù I think it would be very valuable to have a bookmark feature and a new tab at the bottom for saved/bookmarked videos. It would make the app MUCH easier to navigate and overall improve the user experience. The app seems a little confusing to navigate with the subscription based version.

title: It‚Äôs literally the best thing for my sleep schedule but paying?
review: My sleep schedule was been very... Off balance. From me going to sleep at 12 to 1 a.m. However I had seen many adds about this so one night I had so much trouble sleeping that I decided to download. I sign in as fast as possible and click the first thing that I can listen to and get in a comfortable position. And it was almost like magic! I was able to wind down and go to sleep. That was the earliest I‚Äôve woken up in a while!! I really like the results of this app but why paying? Why tho?

title: Life changing!
review:
Meditation has completely changed my life/reality/perspective. I had started meditating on my own when I can across Headspace and decided to give it a try. 
Headspace is such a fantastic app. It's my favorite, by far. 'The Wake-ups' have become one of the first things I do in the morning. They are usually soo beautiful and full of love, half of them make me tear up a little.
Headspace helped me understand myself better and for that I will be eternally grateful üôè

title: This really works
review: I feel so much calmer and happier when I use this regularly. It‚Äôs perfectly named. Meditation really does just give me a tiny bit of space between stuff that happens and my emotional reaction to it. I tend to internalize things a lot, which then makes me really anxious. Using Headspace has a measurable positive impact on my mental state. I‚Äôm more productive at work, more patient with my kids, and more present with my husband when I use the meditations daily.

title: Poor customer service - pray nothing goes wrong
review:
I was on  Headspace for 2 months and paid an annual subscription.  Earlier today I finished a meditation, and the app crashed, deleted all my data and locked as if I hadn‚Äôt paid for access.  

Things happen, and you expect to be able to get back up and running.  Sadly the restore purchases function didn‚Äôt work and when I submitted a request for something as easy as that - the response was four to six days!  Totally unacceptable.  I recommend you instead choose from the variety of excellent mediation apps and skip this one unless you want extra stress from a glitchy app and poor customer support.

title: Best Meditation App Ever
review:
I‚Äôve used many apps for so long, Headspace was the best so far, It‚Äôs got a well organized system for 0-100 meditation in every situation, And a lovely theme ‚ò∫Ô∏èand also I love both the male and female calm voices.

The only reason that I‚Äôm giving a 4star rate is that, I‚Äôve payed for the premium account recently, and started the (365) program, in every session the app crashes and ruin the whole meditation process!!! It‚Äôs been 3 days that I‚Äôm into (365), and it crashed every-time

title: Neat Idea, Too Expensive
review: I love the idea of guided meditation apps, which is why I downloaded this in the first place. However, almost every course is locked for paying users and as a broke high school student I can‚Äôt afford the subscription. There‚Äôs a lot of neat features I want to try, but I can‚Äôt because almost all of them are restricted. If there were some more basic courses available for free, I‚Äôd be more excited to use the app. Not sure if it‚Äôs worth it yet, but it definitely would be if free users could access more content.

title: A great investment!
review: This is one of those rare apps that is truly worth every penny. Headspace has supported me in building a legitimate mediation practice. I use this app almost daily to help manage my anxiety. I do almost all my meditations with Andy. I love the consistency and the option to choose your preferred voice. I‚Äôve also been getting into their sleep scapes which are a great way to slow down your mind if you‚Äôre having trouble winding down.

title: Love this app
review:
This is the only app I have ever paid for and it is so worth. It has been a vital piece to learning to
Manage my anxiety and taking care of my mental health. I am Not an amazing meditator and eat distracted easily but I absolutely love listening to Andy talk. His voice is so soothing. They all are, but especially him.
I have recommended this to many friends and will continue to do so. 
I‚Äôve also used it to get my kids back to sleep in the middle of the night!

title: Great Changes Ahead!
review: This is a program which is different from the other apps like this one. It is simple but not easy. If you truly want to make changes in your life, this is the app for you. The guided meditations are done in a way that you can progress at your own pace but strive to exceed and succeed. There are so many options for meditation, music, stories and ambient sounds that it is sometimes hard to choose. The best app!!!

title: Boom shak a laka some body call the doc doc cus headspace is the bomBa
review: I loveeeeeeeeeeeee hard space I really enjoy it it‚Äôs fun and helpful and any age can use it I‚Äôm only 10 it also helpful to help me fall asleep and when I‚Äôm getting ready for school when I‚Äôm eating breakfast like watching the daily video sorry forgot what it‚Äôs called and every day at school I do the mindful moments there are course focus music sleep casts sleep music meditations live meditations and more I really injoy it

title: Finding peace and quiet
review: Headspace has been quite a change for me, I am grateful that there is somewhere I can go to meditate and find those quiet moments. I try to use reflection to start the day off feeling positive.  For this I am happy. The process is slow and sometimes I‚Äôm really not sure if I got the message, but the one thing for sure is usually I feel better after I meditate.  So thanks to Head space. I wish I had found you sooner.

title: Good
review: I like this app. The thing is, it‚Äôs pretty expensive if you want all of the meditations. With the sleep casts, it said there was 3 free ones but when I tried one the rest weren‚Äôt. I also had a problem with the notifications as if I kept swiping up on them they would come back down again and didn‚Äôt stop until I turned off the notifications in the settings. I do, overall, like this app though. It‚Äôs just that you have to pay if you want most of it.

title: Headspace makes meditating as easy as pressing play
review: As a long time yoga practitioner, I knew how helpful meditation is, but with the stress of the pandemic and even before that I just wasn‚Äôt doing it. Headspace got me back to sitting again. I love and his voice, I love all the choices they give you in terms of what you wanna focus on or how long you want to practice. The basics one course with its three minute meditations was exactly what I needed to rememberHow good it feels to just sit.

title: Perfect for all ages
review: Was brand new to meditating when I first got this app a few years ago. Even though I have some experience now, I still continue to use it. I really like that they are moving meditations and different series to help you through the various challenges in life. I also love that there‚Äôs a children‚Äôs section. My children ask for Andy by name when they have a nightmare or when they‚Äôve had a rough day.

title: Headspace works
review: The self awareness developed in this course brings peace, focus, freedom from cravings. I originally started during covid because I couldn‚Äôt sleep. It was amazingly effective. Then I found how much more it had to offer. It isn‚Äôt magic, it isn‚Äôt metaphysical, but it is the most practical, effective approach to meditation I have ever found. If you are looking for something more, release from anxiety, acceptance of what you think is unbearable....try it.

title: Love it! And some ideas!
review: I absolutely love this app! I use it everyday and then some more! I do have a suggestion I would love to see in this app! I love using the soundscapes but I wish I could use that as well as listen to the ‚Äúteacher‚Äù or ‚Äúnarrator‚Äù at the same time! That would be amazing in my eyes because even while meditating I could have a little background noise like rain or etc. same goes for sleeping! Again this app is really amazing!

title: PLEASE GO BACK TO YOUR OLD LAYOUT
review:
Please go back to your old layout. I am a massive here on the app, however, The new layout utterly disgusts me. I mean sure, it‚Äôs still usable. But it‚Äôs very disappointing to see that you have taken away The old one because it was far more appealing. It just looked better. I mean I guess other people might like it, but I simply do not. And I beg of you, please please please please please please please go back to your old layout. Please know that the only reason I read it one star is because I wanted it to be seen by y‚Äôall. I think it is a grand and nifty app and I would normally rated four or even five stars.

Sincerely, you‚Äôre number one fan

title: Worth It
review: I am a healthcare provider and finding out that Headspace is supporting front line providers by giving them access to their programs was wonderful. I do think it has definitely made a difference for me as I used it during this very trying year. I would recommend it to anyone and find it not only easy to use, but customizable and not hokey at all. Truly a great way to begin the journey of practicing meditation. Thanks, Headspace.

title: Best Meditation App
review: I‚Äôve tried numerous medications apps to help with trouble sleeping and chronic pain. I love the ease and variety of Headspace, especially the Sleep Music. There‚Äôs so many to choose from!! On nights when I can‚Äôt get back to sleep the Nighttime SOS has been amazing and I‚Äôm back asleep before the guided meditation is complete. I only with the Watch app had a sleep option like the other meditation options that are on it, other than that the app is perfect!!

title: Amazing!!!
review: Okay so... there‚Äôs nothing to say to this app but AMAZING AWESOME IT IS THE BEST! Lol. Okay so yeah I love this app! It‚Äôs really helps me turn off my body and go to sleep. It is really helpful because I haven‚Äôt gone to sleep in the past week! My only complaint is the memberships. I get that you wanna make money but at least cabin downpour free! Anyways other than that I think this is probably the best app. Not probably. FOR SURE the best meditation app! I recommend this to... well... everyone! Thanks for reading!

title: This app is SUPER helpful!!!!
review: Imma just begin with saying that this app is really helpful!!!! It has so many remedies and things to help you: stay active, sleep better, manage stress/ anxiety and MORE!!!!  For staying active they have workout plans, for sleeping they have stories, and sounds, and for staying active they have really helpful tips!!!! Once again this is only a little bit of what their app contains!!!! Well ya, that is my review I hope you download it!!!!:D

title: The App is perfect BUT
review: I REALLY love this app. I tried so many meditation apps, but without success. One day I was watching TED talks and I really got inspired and also hopeful by this Andy Puddicombe guy. So I bought his audiobook. After that I was sure that his app would be worth it. I have only one complaint: The app screen doesn‚Äôt rotate on my ipad. It stays vertically, and my ipad‚Äôs position is always horizontally placed on my smart keyboard. That is my only complaint. But in general the app is AMAZING and I love it.

title: Too pricey, only one thing is free within the sleep tab
review: I was really excited to try this app as I wake in the middle of the night quite often and for an app to have things specifically for that was a first for me. I let having only one sleepcast slide because it was long enough to be effective but to have ZERO free options in any of the other sleep subcategories is ridiculous. Not to mention the price you‚Äôre charging monthly/annually to unlock all of this. I understand that you‚Äôre a company and you need to make money, but I‚Äôd rather have softly spoken ads in the middle of what I‚Äôm listening to than that.

title: Headspace is great for anyone
review: Weather you are a beginner,intermediate, or expert at meditating headspace is great! I started with headspace at the beginning or the quarantine! As everything went into lockdown I was spending a lot more time at home and that allowed me to get inside of my head too much. Started having massive anxiety attacks. I recognized that I needed to do something about this. I turned to headspace! With the help of headspace, my attacks have become almost non existent! Thank you!

title: The best app ever
review: A bit of back information, I have anger issues, really bad, and when my sister and I get into fights I use this app to calm me down. I go to my room. And let this app carry me away. It is amazing and please support this app. It deserves so much for how much it helps people. This app will not waste your time. Meditating is so good for the mind. And there are free sessions. Please get this app. I think if everyone had a dose of meditation a day, it would help a lot.

title: Life Changing
review:
This app has changed my life for the better. That seems like a weird thing to say about a program on your phone, but the fact that it is so easy to use has helped me make meditation a part of my daily life. That in turn helped my anxiety and my life overall. 

The only thing I would like to see done, is for them to add a favorites button, so I can keep track of my fav meditations more easily!

title: I am a beginner.
review:
I am at the very beginning of my meditation practice. My husband has meditated on and off for many years.  Even as I go about my daily life, I can be doing one thing, and my head is someplace totally different, often ‚Äútalking ‚Äú to me nonstop. 
For me, Headspace is calming. In part bc i am learning not to judge myself so harshly..it‚Äôs ok if I lose focus bc I can just keep coming back to my breath.  Sometimes that is multiple times during one breath. I‚Äôm ok with it.

title: A must have App for mindfulness
review: If you have never tried meditation, the you must give it a try right now. It will allow you to discover your inner self. It will give you confidence, increase your focus, improve your stamina, and much more. We all should be spending at least 5 to 10 minutes every day, no matter what‚Äôs happening in your life. I just reached 500 days streak. The feeling is unique. Try it today!

title: A Bright New Perspective
review: This app and the amazing teachers, lessons, sleep casts, and more have changed my life. Im finding it quite difficult to even put into words how magnificent this app has been for transforming my outlook on my relationships, myself, my presence, and just about every singular aspect of my life. It has been the best decisions I have ever made and I have never once had a doubt in my mind that this wasn‚Äôt the best choice I ever made for myself.

title: Download This App!
review: I was new to meditations when I found this app, but was looking for something that was less spiritual. The user friendliness of it instantly caught my attention. I love having daily reminders and fun short, digestible videos to help recenter me. I support anyone who is looking for a meditation app that is more like cognitive therapy to give this an opportunity. With new videos, subject matters, and playlist I‚Äôm exciting to continue my journey with this supportive app.

title: Just plain wonderful
review: I tried it.  I love the way Andy explains things, so I used this app to get a friend meditating who was new to it.  The animations in the beginning are very helpful for my friend, and I'm getting a lot out of the anxiety and sleep modules. I'm looking forward to trying out the cooking one snd the like.  Anyway, Andy's voice is lovely, the way he describes things is helpful and as you go on, the sessions become less guided which is wonderful too.

title: Please read‚ÄºÔ∏è
review: This app is AMAZING don‚Äôt get me wrong there is so much room for decision! But to almost get to anything you have to pay for a membership. I don‚Äôt really wanted to pay money for a stress reliever app. But almost everything is locked when you don‚Äôt sign in and pay, it‚Äôs almost like their forcing you to sign in. I‚Äôm going to delete the app, but it makes me so sad because this app had so many different options for relieving your stress. That‚Äôs why I gave this app a 3 star rating. If you want to pay then definitely download this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 21150508, 'body': "We suggest checking out our complimentary sessions, these require no payment information! Here's what's included in the free trial: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-", 'modified': '2021-02-19T00:12:38Z'}

title: My Time
review:
I have learned I need to meditate every day to feel centered. I like the different places available for various situations. I have one question... where is The Wakeup? That alone encouraged me to begin my morning meditation. Each presentation was interesting, the people knowledgeable and friendly, and the subject matter always informative. Even the little opening jingle was pleasant and I looked forward to it every day.
Thank you for Headspace.

title: True life changer
review: Since 2016, I found I struggled with depression and anxiety. I wasn‚Äôt able to see a therapist when I needed one, but my sister recommended headspace and it was at a perfect time. By the time I was able to see a therapist it ended up being more just to learn than it was to feel rescued. Not saying this replaces therapy, but I believe headspace is a powerful tool and a big blessing that we have something like this in our lives

title: Helps me sleep much better
review: It is really awesome I thought it wouldn‚Äôt help me sleep but when I tried it at first I fell asleep instantly thank you for helping me sleep I usually struggle to sleep since I‚Äôm on my phone when I‚Äôm about to sleep but now I just click on this app and listen to smooth music and I just fall asleep thank you so much  for making this app I would recommend people to use this app since it helps people a lot.

title: Amazing!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review: This app is so simple to use and I love everything about it. I look forward to using it everyday. As someone who has a hard time building self care habits, this app has been a game changer. I‚Äôm a college student so I only pay $10 a year for it which is an amazing discount and I‚Äôm so grateful for it. I struggle with anxiety, ADHD, and overthinking; this has been helping me manage and see things from a greater and less judgmental perspective

title: I absolutely love every SINGLE thing... but one
review: I have honestly changed for the better with this app and I use the tools I‚Äôve learned every day. It is truly life-changing. Any way you can make an ipad friendly app? What I mean by that is, when I have my ipad in the landscape orientation, the graphics stay locked in portrait orientation. Thats really the ONLY thing this app is missing. We love all of its features and use it day and night.

title: Love it but‚Ä¶
review: Yes it is a amazing app and I could make a list about the things they did to relax me but a lot of things you need a membership for. I know you need to make money but your main thing should be people‚Äôs relaxation. For example I have trouble sleeping and the calming music is memberships only‚Ä¶why should members have a quick sleep? Once again this app is so calming and would 100% recommend but (if the president of the app is reading this) please stop the membership stuff‚Ä¶. :)

title: Love the daily meditation schedule
review:
I‚Äôm in love with this new version of Headspace with a pre-made schedule of meditations. I‚Äôve been sporadically using the app mostly because I never knew what to choose to meditate on. Now it‚Äôs just so much easier to use the app. I love it!
The only piece of feedback I have is that I would also love to see a tool that would help me recognize how or what I am feeling and then recommend a meditation based on that.

title: Life Changing
review: Headspace has changed my life for the better. Making mediation part of my everyday has helped to alleviate the symptoms of my anxiety and my medical conditions. It is excellent for everyone from beginners to those who are experienced with the art of meditation. I find the stats helpful and the streak keeps me motivated to meditate even on days I may not feel like it. For anyone on fence, it is well worth the investment. Invest in yourself, you deserve it.

title: More relaxed
review: I used to meditate all the time a few years ago. Then I started doing it less and less. Since I downloaded headspace and started at the basic level I have noticed that my mind has become less cluttered with the mundane thoughts and way more relaxed. This app is really great, and if you are looking for something to help calms the storms in your mind or just to help you relax form a long day. This is a great place to start.

title: Love the content but interface needs work
review: I wish you could navigate through the courses by skipping levels. Some of the entry levels are the same for each course, and it‚Äôs unfortunate you can‚Äôt have the power over your own practice. The interface is also REALLY confusing to navigate through. I wish you could ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù things or put them into a queue. I see one that looks interesting while I‚Äôm browsing for something else and then I can never find it again.
developerResponse: {'id': 20842437, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback, the good news is you are now able to favorite courses in English! Please make sure you are on the most updated version of the app and then click the heart icon next to the course title. You can then access them under the Today tab!', 'modified': '2021-02-03T21:02:58Z'}

title: An Absolute Necessity
review: My family had been using Headspace for several years. At this point we will never stop because it provides such valuable resources, especially for our 9 year old daughter. She watches the wake-up every day, and uses Sleepcasts every night to fall asleep. the mindfulness skills she is developing through using Headspace show up in so many really cool ways. I would recommend Headspace to absolutely everyone!

title: MIRACLE app!!!
review:
I absolutely love this app and the headspace team/experience. 

As someone who frequently struggles with anxiety and academic stress, this app really helps me sleep. Yes, the subscription is worth it! Headspace has become part of my routine (I have a 218 day streak!) and greatly improved my mental health- particularly during the school year.

I would love to see the sleep section expanded- specifically the wind downs. I also wish there were more meditations for students and/or teens.

title: Needs better accessibility to low-income people
review: This is a great app, but for how much they talk about being there for people they don‚Äôt mean people unable to afford the subscription for full content. Other apps get around this with ads etc, which I will gladly view to give them the revenue they need to continue the app‚Äôs maintenance. But it‚Äôs a very cold shoulder: either you have enough disposable income for something like this, or you don‚Äôt so don‚Äôt expect our help. Just surprising to see from such a popular app and gives off a cruddy ‚Äúyou‚Äôre not worth it to us‚Äù message.
developerResponse: {'id': 18581586, 'body': 'Thank you for your review regarding accessibility to the app. Our team has received this feedback, but please let us know if you have any other questions/ suggestions by sending us a note to help@headspace.com.', 'modified': '2020-10-20T00:07:18Z'}

title: Please Read üòä
review:
Please put your meditations in buyable packs, like just the sleep, just the meditations, only the workouts, etc. Only rich people are getting all the benefits of this incredible app with the 65 a year thing. If you want to REALLY HELP people, but still make money, this is a great option!! I would DIE if you did this I would be so excited üòÜüòÉüôèüôè I would literally share this with EVERYONE 
Please please please!!!!! 
Or, just had a really pricey, but straight up flat fee! Like 200 but it‚Äôs not a subscription, just 200 and it‚Äôs done! That would be great too
