title: Truly love it !
review:
The Best ! Amazing and perfect for me! I was introduced to meditation in a class setting and loved it.  Unfortunately the instructor moved, and no class.   After open heart surgery and and a stroke 3 years ago, I search the App Store for a meditation app that would work for me, HEADSPACE is it, worth every penny!  I really love the new features, the Wake Up and the Move section.  
 As I am over 70, I would like to see specific courses directed towards ‚Äú older‚Äú people.  Thanks

title: Life changing
review: I been going through really bad panic attacks and depression to the point it seriously affected my life. After looking through all the different meditations apps I settled on this one. I have tried different ones but one doesn‚Äôt compare to Headspace. Its the best because it  guides you through mediation. I now think and feel different about my life. I highly really recommend  it changes your way of thinking.

title: So THIS is what it feels like to meditate
review:
I‚Äôve tried so many times over the years to learn how to meditate, but no one has been able to explain it so that it made sense - until Andy. It‚Äôs silly, right? Meditation is such a simple concept, but people like to make it complicated. All it takes is understanding a few simple concepts and then consistency in practice. 

Grateful for Headspace and the ability to work with my mind and body in concert!

title: Best app ever
review: Of all the apps I have on my phone, Headspace is the best! It has made my meditation practice consistent (I‚Äôm on a 200 day streak), and it has helped me change my mindset in so many positive ways. There are so many wonderful features in addition to meditation sessions (focus music, the wake up, mindful moments, etc) that I use everyday. I also use the meditations for kids with my children. Best app! It‚Äôs really helped me stay sane and healthy during Covid.

title: Great, but where‚Äôs the support?
review: I‚Äôve been enjoying using the Headspace app for at least 17 days in a row... until today, when the app keeps buffering. I searched the app for app help, but there‚Äôs none to be found. I came here to the App Store and found an update, I updated, but still it is buffering. I went to the Headspace Facebook group, the FAQ freezes at a point saying Safari has to accept cookies (I already have Safari set properly). Headspace should be calming stress, not causing it.
developerResponse: {'id': 22270643, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about the trouble with your app. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com so we can further assist. ", 'modified': '2021-04-16T00:11:43Z'}

title: Just want to say thank you!!
review: I graduated this year and can‚Äôt find a job. And I cannot continue to work in the restaurant because of the pandemic. I thought I was ok until I start losing my sleep. I wonder more and more when will I be able to work and I decide to pick up meditation again. Thank you so much for the free subscription, when everything else crashes me, I get my little head space here :)

title: Upset
review:
I would have given it a five star review, because it has helped me get to sleep multiple nights, if only for one problem. 

I'd signed up for the monthly subscription of $12 per month. Next thing I know when my trial is over, it's taking $75 out of my account because for some reason I'd been switched to the yearly subscription. I did not switch. I did not want nearly $100 of my savings to be taken. Now, I guess I have to use it until my subscription is up, or it'd just be a waste of money. 

Hopefully this hasn't happened to anyone else and I hope it won't happen in the future either.

title: Headspace has changed my life
review: As a single mom and full time teacher, this app has made my life different, better, more real and more valued. I bought a lifetime membership two years ago and have used it almost everyday since. Headspace has helped me through some of life‚Äôs most difficult challenges and made me a more present Mom, art teacher, friend and family member. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Opening video is distressing
review: I am a highly sensitive person. I carefully manage what video and audio I ingest and I want to choose when. The updated app forces a video on me as soon as the app is opened. It's so distressing that I rarely use the app anymore. Moving images of any sort are inappropriate in this context *without my consent*. Please make these videos optional. I literally get stressed just clicking the orange app button knowing I have to go through this. I'm annoyed that this app change was made do soon after I payed the annual fee. Our brains are already too oriented to visual cues that reduce our subtle awareness. I just can't understand why you've chosen to do this.

title: Great for sleep
review: My 6 year old and I absolutely love the sleep music and sleepcasts. On my own time I‚Äôve started the basics course and I‚Äôm halfway through the first collectio, already I am noticing a difference. I sleep better and I‚Äôm more mindful. I saw ads for Headspace for awhile and always thought about it, now I wish I had gotten it sooner! I just paid for a year subscription and I can‚Äôt wait to see where this journey takes me! üôÇ

title: Great app
review:
Headspace was the first app that introduced me to mindfulness meditation. Fast forward 6 years later, It‚Äôs still one of the best meditation apps out there and I still use it everyday. I started from doing it one a day for 10 min to twice a day for 20. It changed my life. 

One flaw I wish their product team will look into is having a timer feature for when you want to meditate on your own but would still like to get subtle nudges of the time in set intervals.

title: Love it, but not worth getting your subscription erased.
review:
I adore Headspace. I feel like it opened the door to mediation, and has had a genuine positive impact on my day-to-day mood. Having this kind of escape in my pocket has been so powerful. 

However‚Äîfor the high price point (almost $100 per year) its absolutely ridiculous to have my subscription and progress vanish from the app once a month, and then have to email back and forth 8 times over the course of weeks just to get it restored. I‚Äôm heartbroken to have to switch to Calm because of this massive error in the system.

title: Love it
review:
At first I was skeptical of meditation. Where would I find the time? How long do I have to sit still? But honestly it starts you off slow enough that you ease into and you find the time. Gradually you find more time and what‚Äôs the best time to meditate. 

I usually meditate every morning but sometimes, after a long day I meditate at night also. 

It‚Äôs really helping me guide myself to the person I want to become in 2021.

title: The best
review: I‚Äôve used a couple of different meditation apps, but Headspace is my favorite. I like how they aren‚Äôt overly-philosophical or mystical in their approach to their meditation exercises. They keep it relatively simple and offer a variety of exercises and courses for different situations. I also really like the narrators‚Äô voices and styles. I‚Äôve used some of the Sleepcasts too; they‚Äôre nice, but the meditation exercises are the best part of the app and the most life-changing for me personally.

title: Better than Calm
review:
Maybe it‚Äôs the satisfying smooth graphics, or the lack of weird celebrity stories, but this app feels far more user friendly. I‚Äôve never been appreciative of every single feature and tab in an app until now. 

I‚Äôve always thought mindfulness was too simple and boring, but now I realize there are sooooo many ways to be more in-tune with my mind. I feel.... creative??? Headspace empowers me to independently build build out my mindfulness practice and routines. 

Finally, I REALLY appreciate the whole section on sleep. Ive procrastinated going to bed my entire life, but Headspace is changing that. I‚Äôve used the SOS feature, sound scapes, wind down stories, all of it. 

Thank you guys so so so so so so so much. This is an app I truly cannot live without.

title: Impressed
review: I received a year subscription through one of my migraine support organizations.  I‚Äôve tried several guided meditation apps and find that I have a hard time finding a voice that is easier to relax to and follow as many times the voices are either distracting to the practice or irritating.  I have thoroughly enjoyed the daily moments and the male voice has been perfect for me.  I am finding it easy to relax.

title: Not a great experience as a user or consumer
review:
The interface is confusing and makes actually using the apps an endeavor in futility. I downloaded it to help me with my anxiety, but there weren‚Äôt any anxiety exercises I could find through the menus and even searched. Not sure what‚Äôs up with that.

Additionally, when I tried to cancel my subscriptions because I was very much not satisfied with my experience, I was given the run around and ultimately told there was nothing Headspace could do since I‚Äôm charged through Apple and not a credit card. 

Subscriptions are for a Year by default BTW. So yeah, not a great experience as a user or a consumer.

title: Versatile and fun
review: II really have enjoyed this app. I have other mental health and meditation apps, and this one is so quick and easy to use. I really enjoy the group everybody meditation. The graphics are fun and uplifting, the variety of material and supports provide me with anything I might need for a challenging moment. And I just discovered there are workouts as well. I will have to look into those. They seem perfect for travel! Highly recommend it.

title: Amazing for Beginners and more seasoned to meditation
review: Headspace is teaching me from the very beginning. I‚Äôm learning how to meditate but I also have a choice on how much time to spend on each session. My children listen to the sleepscapes at night and I listen to the ocean sounds during the day. There‚Äôs even mini workouts to help you connect mind and body. I love the choices you can make with a male or female voice depending on your mood or preferences.

title: Couldn't be better, but continues to get better
review: The Headspace app has continued to evolve over the past few years without losing its simple, clear fundamentals. It's a great way to help maintain or develop a practice of meditation. I've started introducing my kids and they love their Andy time! Please add longer kids' sessions. They can handle it. And more variety for adults. I‚Äôm pretty tapped out on the main lessons after 9,000+ minutes.

title: Repetitive
review: Although it‚Äôs beneficial to have a guided meditation, I feel it‚Äôs a waste of money and time to subscribe to this app. I admit it is positive to have a ‚Äú voice‚Äù guidance and making you sit down or walk around and try to meditate but I still think it‚Äôs not worth my money. Tell you the truth someone needs to give it a try for a couple of months maximum and even so I will get to the conclusion I don‚Äôt want to subscribe anymore

title: Terrific for helping me get to sleep- would love more content
review: I have been loving using this app- just wish there was more! Although the sleepcasts are slightly different each night it would be nice to have more variants of rainy nights. Also, it would be nice to have the choice between narrator gender on each of the sleepcasts, similar to how they have the other mediations set up. This is all small potatoes long term. It‚Äôs a good app! Would recommend. Four stars because there‚Äôs room for growth!

title: You can‚Äôt do anything without paying.
review: I see so many reviews for the app that say it‚Äôs wonderful and you can do almost everything without paying for it. So I downloaded the app expecting there to be reasonable free options to choose from, and guess what? It‚Äôs just like every other app that makes you buy premium and keeps everything under wraps so you can‚Äôt enjoy it without paying. There are only three or four free options tops, and it‚Äôs extremely limited. Very disappointed. The reviews are so fake I wonder if they are genuine people or just bots. Don‚Äôt get the app unless you want to pay for premium because there‚Äôs no point.

title: Amazing!
review: I recently went through the loss of a love one and I was left with a lot of emotional and mental pain, which impacted my health overall. Headspace has helped me with controlling the stress I‚Äôve been dealing with the past two months and helped with my sleep too! I will say that it is a bit pricy, I am fortunate enough to have the two-month trial. Overall, though, it‚Äôs a great app for meditation and sleep, which it is advertised as.

title: Insomnia
review:
I have struggled with falling to sleep my whole life and have tried medication and melatonin and other options, but with my ADHD nothing has worked, except this app. I listen to a sleepcast every night and fall asleep before it‚Äôs even over! They are so relaxing and calming, and there are so many options to chose from (10/10 recommend getting the full version, it‚Äôs worth it) 
Thank you headspace !!

title: Great App, wish things were more free
review: I‚Äôve had this app for about a week so far, and I am enjoying it. I just wish things were more free, instead of having to get a free trial of Headspace Plus, or buying it. I get why not everything is free, but I think it would be better if there was one or two things that were free in everything you get for Headspace Plus. I feel like that would make my Headspace experience a lot better. Otherwise, I think it is a great app!

title: Making me pay for a course called, ‚ÄúDealing with Cancer‚Äù
review: I don‚Äôt have cancer. I would like to point that out right away, but as I was scrolling down trying to find a course for stress (that I had to pay for) I found one that was called ‚ÄúDealing with Cancer‚Äù or something along those lines, the only problem is that it costs money! People with cancer already pay a lot of money for the chemotherapy and it‚Äôs not cheap. They should make courses about cancer free in my opinion because something like cancer is NOT cheap! That‚Äôs why this stupid app deserves 2 stars.

title: Good for anyone who meditates or wants to learn
review: I used to meditate years ago then life got in the way and I hadn‚Äôt done it for years.  I recently started to meditate now that I am retired.  I had mentioned to my daughter that I was meditating and she had said she had seen this program that she thought would be good Ford the family.  We got the family plan and it is now helping 3 generations of us!  It works for any level of knowledge.  Fantastic app!

title: I Love Headspace
review:
When I am focused and intentional in my daily routine Headspace helps me start my day grounded.  Unfortunately from time to time I let life get in the way of my self-care. I‚Äôm still working on that so I always find my way back. 

The meditations are easy to follow while providing foundational principles and practices that resonate with me. In addition to the meditations there are many other life enhancing resources available in the Headspace app.

title: Absolutely Amazing
review: I‚Äôve recently been having a lot of trouble sleeping and I‚Äôve tried many things. This app is absolutely incredible, I‚Äôve tried it for a week and I‚Äôve been sleeping amazing and had no problems at all. If you have had trouble sleeping or just need to relieve stress from your day, use this app. Thank you for making this app, it‚Äôs helped me out so much in such a short amount of time

title: Added Closed Captioning! Added Dora Kamau to several new Courses
review:
Thank you for adding captions for deaf and hard of hearing people!!!!!!

Thank you for paying Dora Kamau hopefully lots of money and inviting her to record the courses: Basics 2, 3, Managing Anxiety, and maybe more I haven‚Äôt yet discovered and downloaded!!!

Her light shines bright and I‚Äôm thankful the universe has aligned so she could share her gifts through this app.  
‚Äî

Feedback:

Have y‚Äôall considered adding organization to the favorites section? Check out Spotify‚Äôs new library filtering material design. Right now it‚Äôs hard to parse my lessons, singles, & visualizations from just the thumbnail and name. 

I have the same request for the ‚ÄúCourses‚Äù tab. I wish to filter it by teacher availability (i.e. Does Dora yet teach this?)

Thank you
developerResponse: {'id': 21933402, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback regarding the accessibility of our content. We've passed this onto our team and hope to have a feature like this available soon!", 'modified': '2021-03-29T19:23:52Z'}

title: Awesome medication resource!!!!
review: The app user experience is top notch- well organized, really aesthetically pleasing graphics and fun animations. LOVE all the guides, different focuses and the ability to sort through and choose a series or one off. Bedtime sleep casts are AMAZING! My daughter and I listen to one every night as she falls asleep. This has made incorporating meditation into my life so painless and joyful and it‚Äôs genuinely changing me for the better! Thank you Headspace!!! üíï

title: It was great until..
review: Ive been using Headspace for quiet some bit and it had really changed and benefited me in such many positive ways-well I had a bit of a pause and lost tracks but when I came back to continue my journey to find out that most of the packs and sessions I used to use were all locked now. It‚Äôs just a bit too much for a person who is just trying to genuinely better themselves and having to pay with this type of pricing - Sorry-will try again when improved!

title: A wonderful platform‚Äî Thank you!
review:
I was doubtful to try Headspace at first, but my company has offered us a complimentary annual subscription to Headspace so I decided to give it a shot.

It‚Äôs been very difficult to find available appointments for therapy so I ventured to trying Headspace out of desperation. I have been exploring the different features such as listening to the calming soundscapes and I also just tried for the ‚ÄúReleasing the Wounds‚Äù meditation‚Äî Which was incredibly helpful and it motivated me to write this review.

Thank you for creating this wholesome platform. It has helped me from losing my mind to anxiety and I hope that it can continue to aid me in my journey of healing. 

I hope you know you are making a positive impact on people‚Äôs lives. Cheers to the new year!

title: Love This App
review: I use this app for my daily meditation. This has definitely helped me to establish and maintain my practice. I do wish there was some more variety in the meditations; however. They all seem to share the same approach for every issue, for example, the meditation for self-esteem seems almost the same as the meditation for stress.i would like to see some other variations in the future, e.g., with music and more guidance.

title: Phenomenal app
review:
It‚Äôs truly astonishing how well-designed and effective this app is. I always found excuses to avoid a meditation practice, but headspace makes it fun and almost addictive to sit down every day. The advice and directions in the guided sessions and courses are fantastic if you feel like you struggle to ‚Äúget it right‚Äù. 

I also really love the sleep content. I go to bed with sleepcasts every night and they helped me get over a bout of heavy insomnia.

title: I love this app
review: I do like this app, and think that for other people, it helps in the best ways. But unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt help me as much as I needed it to. It‚Äôs not the app‚Äôs fault, it‚Äôs my own fault. However, i only used the app for one night so far, it didn‚Äôt make me fall asleep, but it definitely helped in the best of ways. I hope this app does more for others to help with stress, health, falling asleep, staying asleep, and much more.

title: Needs full airplay support
review: The only issue I have with this app is a technical one. I like to stream either the sound, or both sound and video, to airplay devices like Apple TV or my Sonos speaker. But when I use the iOS swipe up feature and try to use the interface there to send audio to my Sonos via Airplay, sometimes whole segments of the meditation or the soundscape is just missing. Full support built into the app for Airplay would make a huge difference.

title: most life-changing app
review: Stressful moments have always been very present in my life, from school to work or friendships, etc. This app has transformed the way I think and view my thinking, and is always there when I need a moment of peace. Whenever I feel myself becoming too overwhelmed, I open Headspace. The app has become part of my daily routine. The meditations are simple yet so effective for me. Worth every penny :)

title: Great but expensive
review: AWESOME app!!! I would highly recommend both the unpaid and paid version. The paid version is just too expensive on top of all the other bills I have to pay :/ this should be like 5.99... especially for broke people who just need help falling asleep or relaxing/meditating or for college students like myself. I also wish there were more options, especially for sleep when I‚Äôm paying over $10/mo but apart from that, great app :)

title: The App that changed my life
review: That‚Äôs a bold statement to make, but the knowledge I‚Äôve gained from actually learning how to meditate and apply it to my everyday life has been invaluable. I‚Äôd highly recommend this app for anyone looking to better understand how to meditate and to utilize it to address depression, anxiety, worrying, fear, or any other number of issues we all deal with each and every day.

title: Don‚Äôt like being told what to do
review: I really really don‚Äôt like being told what to do by privileged clinicians. So it‚Äôs nice to still have access to helpful resources. There‚Äôs a lot of life skills this app can help with. My work pays for it idk if I would pay for it myself. The voices and advice aren‚Äôt too pushy. A little bit uppity but at least not pushy. no matter what your background everyone wants more control in their life learning to work with yourself is how to get real control

title: Harassing notifications
review:
I have turned off all notifications in settings except for a daily meditation reminder. But every day I get notifications pushing Move Mode which I have zero interest in.

Is the only way to opt out of your marketing spam to turn notifications off entirely? Because if so, I don‚Äôt think I have any use for this app. Isn‚Äôt the point of subscription models to be FREE from harassment?

This is dishonest behavior, and making me reconsider my subscription.

Edit: sent a messge to support as suggested. Been a week and no response, probably because the answer is, sorry you can‚Äôt just get a simple daily meditation reminder, we‚Äôll stuff our extra marketing down your throat no matter what. Canceled my subscription, deleted the app, downloaded Insight Timer instead.

Yet another vampire app trying to deceive you into giving it every moment of your waking life, to justify subscribing to endless variations of the same meditation script.

title: Worth every penny
review: This is one app that I have purchased and have actually use everyday. The music, meditation and even the move offers a wide variety of ways to open the mind, and calm the soul with out making you feel like it was wasted time 5 minutes later. I take the teachings with me through out the day to keep me aware but nonjudgmental. I truly appreciate this form of instruction guidance.

title: Had a problem
review:
I tried the one week free trial and was not informed properly that it ended until the day after. Ended up wasting $75 for a years subscription with no way of recalling it. My email was given but I was not sent a notice or reminded at any point. Might be a fault of mine and I was even considering the monthly subscription.
 
Edit.
They have great customer support and helped the best they can.

title: Tremendous app
review: Everything from the design to the program itself is so well-made, it‚Äôs a pleasure to use. I left for awhile to try a different, free app offered through my employer, but came back to Headspace for its superior quality. Also, thank you for offering the unemployment deal to my spouse during this pandemic. It made the decision affordable for us both, and is helping us deal with the situation with more clarity.

title: Thank you
review:
I heard about this app after seeing an article about how it‚Äôs free for those that have lost their jobs. I was recently laid off due to COVID-19 and haven‚Äôt been able to sleep well since. 

This has been so helpful at night when I‚Äôm trying to sleep. The sleep podcasts are my favorite, sounds are good too. While I‚Äôm still not sleeping enough, this does relax me enough to sleep a couple hours.

title: great!
review: I love this app and it‚Äôs very useful, but i wish that there were more options for non premium users. I was thinking that maybe for the sleepcasts, the four free options could rotate each week so that users can get a variety of things without having them all available at once. I think that there should at least be one free yoga lesson as well because not everyone can afford paying that high of a price for the subscription.

title: Things that make me think about the future
review:
When I‚Äôm listening to some of the nighttime stories the future is mentioned and even though I know it is irrational to think about 10,000 years into the future it still makes worry that I‚Äôm not going To be here. I appreciate the app and what you are doing but anything that can be changed to make the stories so that they are more benign would be appreciated. 
Thank You, 
Keep up the good work

title: Omg awesome!!!
review: This app is so awesome i have felt so much more at peace! My favorite is the rain day  antiques sleep sound! The only thing would be is that there is so many things you have to pay for! People please for the people who can‚Äôt afford it make more things free!! Overall so great app! Totally recommended to a stressed out person don‚Äôt matter what age! I had a really high level of stress now I don‚Äôt! Thank the good Lord for this app!

title: Feeling at peace
review: The best way I could describe what I‚Äôm feeling just after my first session is peace, I had woken up in not the best mood, feeling groggy and aggressive towards any thoughts. I would try to fight them back as I have mental health issues but they always seem to come back to battle me. Then after this session they sort of just left my mind for even just a few seconds and those seconds felt great ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Headspace changed my life
review: Learning to quiet your mind is incredible useful for stopping the momentum behind and negative thought patterns. By using a 15 minute meditation each morning, I‚Äôve been able to re-direct those reactionary thoughts we all get, and train my mind to focus on thoughts that serve me. Paired with the Law of Attraction teachings, you can learn to manifest anything you want, using the power (and pleasure) of your thoughts backed by positive emotion.

title: So relaxing!
review: Being 12 years old, I try to make a habit of meditating. Headspace is a great way for beginning and more experience people to get a quick moment of calm in there day before the business. The sessions range from long to short and even include some kid ones, although I would probably not recommend those for anyone above 8. Headspace is a very beneficial app and I would recommend it.

title: One year in, still love headspace!
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for more than a year but since the chaos started last year I‚Äôve been really looking for ways to help reduce my anxiety, keep focused while working from home and sleep better.  I can‚Äôt say I use headspace every single day but on the days I do, I feel better!  Love the newer additions of the daily plan, focus playlists and even exercises.

title: Wonderful!
review: As someone who suffers from anxiety and depression, Headspace has helped me through dealing with many difficult situations when they flare up. The courses are great to learn different techniques and methods to cope, and I love the feature that sets up a schedule for you each day with activities to meditate and reflect. The sleep section is amazing, and I use their sleep casts every night to sleep. I highly recommend Headspace!

title: Helped with my cancer diagnosis
review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for about 2 years and it‚Äôs been so helpful in centering me in my life. But when I was diagnosed with stage 4 throat cancer last fall, the anxiety pack and cancer pack were enormously helpful in getting me through some really tough times! I was so much more calm, reflective and less anxious throughout my treatments. I can‚Äôt imagine having gone through that without Headspace. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: This Works, Helps Me Sleep Finally
review: I got this on recommendation from a friend. I have been suffering with anxiety induced insomnia for years now. Sometimes it‚Äôs getting to sleep and sometimes it‚Äôs waking in the night and not being able to go back to sleep. The sleep casts and sleep radio have become my friend and I drift off peacefully now every night and have been a lot more rested. A HUGE THANK YOU for this wonderful app.

title: Five Stars
review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for a few months to help me fall asleep & stay asleep. I love the abundance of topics, as well as the fact that you can do a single meditation or do a course over 10 session. I have completed a few courses & practice the techniques when I‚Äôm stressed or anxious. I haven‚Äôt explored all aspects of the app, there‚Äôs so much offered. This is a keeper. I recommended the app to friends & family. It helps!

title: The Best Meditation App
review: Honestly, this is the best app for meditation. It‚Äôs easy to use and has many aspects to choose from. Along with exercise, this is a daily routine I‚Äôve added to achieve a healthy lifestyle. Headspace has been more important in this past year during these crazy pandemic/quarantine times.  I used to use the app sporadically but now it has become a welcome routine that has kept my sanity! I highly recommend.

title: Headspace review
review: I can‚Äôt explain how much and in how ways Headspace has changed the way I feel and react to many situations in my life.  I only have one small concern.  It seems to me the morning wake-up has changed.  It seems shorter and too have much less content regard stories I can only define as ‚Äú human interest stories ‚Äú ?  Other than that Headspace has all I need to become a better person!

title: Sanity in the palm of your hand.
review: I‚Äôve made a decision this year that if I‚Äôm feeling a need for a ‚Äúdistraction‚Äù or ‚Äúquick phone check‚Äù I turn it into a 2 min meditation or look at some of the video content on this app rather than mindlessly looking through socials. Thank you Headspace team for the fresh content, the tried & true meditations & the beautiful sleep sounds. I utilize all three of these very often. üåà

title: Very annoying
review: I have headspace and pay for your monthly service but i switched iPhones recently and now I can not put my head space on this phone because I already had it set up on an older phone this is ridiculous I have many apps that can be loaded on several different devices I will return this to a 5 star rating when you fix this issue
developerResponse: {'id': 19984949, 'body': 'Sorry to hear about the trouble with downloading the app, we recommend reaching out to Apple for support with this. Once you download the app, our support team at help@headspace.com can help you access your account once more!', 'modified': '2020-12-24T17:32:01Z'}

title: Very Helpful
review: I have been struggling with anxiety recently and this app has helped a lot!  So far I have logged over 100 minutes of meditation and I‚Äôve had the app for a little over a week.  My only wish is that in the future there is a way for you to ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù or bookmark courses that you have an interest in that you may want to do in the future.  Otherwise a great app!

title: An amazing thing for students!
review: if you are a student, look into the discount! It is only $9.99 a year, instead of $69. I personally use it mostly for the sleep category, but everything else is great too! The only thing I wish was different was the ability to sort through everything. I think it would be great if you could sort by voice, background noise, etc. overall a great app and I use it to sleep every night!

title: Life changing
review:
I use this app 3 times a day. I do a morning stretch Move exercise when I wake up, and another higher intensity Move workout after the day is over, and I fall asleep to a sleep cast every night. This app has truly become an integral part of my life, and has made me feel so much better. 

It has completely helped me reframe anxiety and stress and I can‚Äôt be thankful enough. Thank you headspace!

title: Aesthetically Unappealing
review: I like the idea of this app but the jarring color scheme and cartoonish graphics are kind of cringe - not a relaxing, zen-like space at all. I tried the meditation timer and I found the sound to be very poor quality and not something I‚Äôd want to use as a meditation tool. There‚Äôs also not much customization if I want to set a timer for a specific duration or want to adjust the type of sound I hear. The quality of the gong sound is surprisingly quite irritating. I prefer an app to be aesthetically pleasing so that I will want to use it every day. I will stick to the Calm app.

title: No way to cancel subscription easily!!!
review: Not only is the interface and usability terrible (can‚Äôt find things, I download things for offline that get deleted), but the last straw is when I went to cancel my auto renewal for their annual subscription and they have the balls to not have any unsubscribe button available! It says to email them to unsubscribe but then I don‚Äôt get a response for over 4 days and counting. Soon my subscription auto renewal date will arrive and I‚Äôll have to call my credit card company. And what if I emailed them with a day to go to cancel? This company is clearly a mess and needs to be better run.
developerResponse: {'id': 13297069, 'body': "Thank you for reaching out and sharing your feedback. We apologize for any trouble with canceling your subscription. If this hasn't already been sorted, please send us a note to help@headspace.com so we can assist you better. ", 'modified': '2020-02-04T23:39:32Z'}

title: An important support to my mental health
review: I‚Äôm really enjoying guided meditations and mindfulness activities throughout the day. The app is easy to navigate. The wake up videos are interesting and inspiring- it‚Äôs so nice to take a brain break from the pattern of stress I often find myself in. The sound scapes are perfect for quieting my mind in order to sleep. I can feel my overall stress decreasing by hopping back into Headspace throughout the day.

title: Pretty Good
review: I used this app for a long time. The foundation was great so I bought it and I love everything they have for sleep. It really helped me get over my insomnia. However, I lot of the programs are EXTREMELY similar and it begins to feel repetitive. That‚Äôs fine for just a meditation practice, I get that meditation alone leads to a lot of mental health benefits, but I was looking for the more specific help that each package claimed to help with but it felt like I was just getting more of the same.

title: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù
review: I have been meditating with head space for a little over 3 years now. It has become, in that slow, gentle way, a necessity. Many things may get dropped from a busy day, but not meditation; even if I have to shorten the time. Meditation is such a powerful instigator, and yet so quiet as it moves. Yes! It moves quietly and surely like the breathüòäit makes changes within that seem to have occurred on their own. Namaste

title: Amazing
review: I love headspace I would not call it a tool because meditation is very powerful and helps me get through life one day at a time for only a few minutes helps clear my mind helps me feel light less stressed more at ease helps me connect with my senses. Headspace is amazing on how it guides you through the meditation. For beginners to advanced. It has many options to explore. I‚Äôm in love with the peace it gives me!!!!

title: Snow sound & National Parks
review:
Snow in Snowfall>Soundscapes>Sleep sounds like heavy rain. But Snow in Snowville>Sleepcast> Sleep sounds like snow. Seems like the snow sounds need a bit of an adjustment. Snow through a forest would be a nice Sleepcast too.
Also, it would be nice if mindspace had Sleepcasts from all National Parks. In Acadia from Blackwoods Campground at night you can hear the buoy, ocean waves, deer through forest, quiet fire going, and the slight wind through the trees-it's magical and always puts me to sleep. And it can show how important our national parks are.

title: This helped me so much
review: So im a child and i have anger issues and when i started using this app the anger just disappeared and i am so glad of that and i have a tiny bit of social exiaty and this has helped me with that too. This app is really useful when you have anger issues or social exiaty or even depresi√≥n i had a friend go through depression and i showed her the app she is free from it know thanks to headspace.

title: From anxiety to peace
review: I‚Äôve struggled with anxiety and panic attacks for 15 years and have tried meditation before, but never got the same results as other people I talked to. By the end of the first 10 minute course, I went from stressed and anxious to fully relaxed as the tension melted away. Andy‚Äôs voice is very soft and soothing. Will definitely be starting my days with these courses from now on! Highly recommend!

title: I get to sleep
review: I got to sleep better than I usually do because I can‚Äôt I don‚Äôt take breathers anymore I just like before I go to bed I will take a breather but I can‚Äôt anymore because I don‚Äôt do that because I have a brother in my room so I can freeze but now I have my own room I can‚Äôt buy forgot to do it so I heard this app was on commercial and I downloaded it then it gets me back to bed better

title: Ye of little sleep
review: My daughter gave me a month of Headspace because she knew I was having trouble sleeping and stressed out over trying to sell our house. The 1st night I listened to a 45 min story. I listened to maybe 10 minutes, the next thing I knew it was 8 am!!! Did a meditation session today and it was so relaxing. I‚Äôm already thinking about different friends I can give this to. What a wonderful gift!

title: Great for the experienced, too.
review: I absolutely love this app, and use it twice a day minimum! This subscription was gifted to me. I‚Äôve had a daily meditation practice for years already. Originally, I assumed I wouldn‚Äôt get anything out of it since it seemed to target beginners. After just 18 days of using the app, I feel like I have deepened my practice significantly. I recommend this for all levels, beginner and experienced.

title: Too Expensive
review: First of all, this app should either be free or, like, $5.00 a month. If you think about it, maybe some parents were going to try and use this for their kids that can‚Äôt sleep, or they couldn‚Äôt sleep because of have ing a headache, they thought this would be a great app, but can‚Äôt use it because it costed money. I know it may not be a lot of money for a lot of people, but I think this app would get a lot more downloads if it was free. I am just stating my opinion and it may not be what others think, but I‚Äôm being completely honest.

title: Free premium headspace
review: This year has been really rough with the pandemic and now with the racism. It‚Äôs disgusting to see people getting killed just because the color of their skin. Please if your reading this stop racism. I‚Äôm really happy that headspace is completely free now until the end of the year do to so much stress there is in people lives right now. This will help a lot of people. Thank u headspace. #blacklivesmatter ‚úäüèª‚úäüèº‚úäüèΩ‚úäüèæ‚úäüèø

title: Love this app but have to give it 2 stars because of new feature
review:
Headspace has a feature that I love, the run streak, which records how many days in a row you meditate and how many hours you‚Äôve meditated. But now they‚Äôve changed it, and listening to focus music on the app or rain sounds for when you go to sleep counts as meditation and streak days! 

This completely ruins the motivating factor behind the run streaks and now I can‚Äôt see how many hours I‚Äôve actually meditated versus listening to rain sounds for sleep. Please fix this and I will go back to a five star rating!
developerResponse: {'id': 19528195, 'body': 'Thank you for feedback and apologies for the trouble this feature has caused. We will be sure to pass this along to our team!', 'modified': '2020-12-03T23:52:47Z'}

title: I love it!
review: I love head space I downloaded it to sleep because I have trouble sleeping and it worked! I was able to sleep soundly and all night! It felt so good to sleep all night! I haven‚Äôt gotten sleep in 2 weeks! I recommend you buying this I love it so much!  My favorite is dose it makes me dose off into a good sleep! And I listen to it a lot! It‚Äôs my favorite one! I recommend listening to it! And buy it it‚Äôs really great!

title: üî• The Guided Runs üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
review: During this quarantine I haven‚Äôt been able to focus enough to workout at home. So I decided to start running. I noticed headspace has guided runs and let me tell you what, those prerecorded coaching sessions are a game changer! 10/10 would recommend! I‚Äôm still working on my daily meditation though, that one is a bit tough. Overall, headspace is totally worth it. Thanks guys üëçüèº

title: like headspace but wish there was more zen
review:
Wish there was more zen woven through the meditation practices. A greater emphasis on letting go would be helpful.

Also I think the happiness, and relationship courses are a little heavy on the visualization technique. It gets repetitive and not incrementally helpful. 

But overall I like that headspace is always there, and has a variety of helpful videos, tips, reminders, and sleepcasts. (Love the rainy one!!)

title: Best So Far üíö
review: I have tried a few different meditation apps, this one by far is the best. Actually after just trying a couple of the sessions they offer I was feeling much more at ease. The app also features sessions for sleep with easy exercises one can do at home if woken up by various intrusions including nightmares, pain, tossing/turning, etc. I recommend at least giving this one a try!

title: Great for guided meditation and daily tracking.
review: I joined headspace at the start of quarantine and I have found myself coming back to it regularly. I got another year after my year was up and I am so glad. It helps me center myself and makes meditation approachable. I recommend it if you are looking for a way to find relaxation throughout your day as well as just increasing your mindfulness.

title: Life Changing
review: Using the Headspace app meditations to start and end my days has been life changing. I have been using the app daily close to a year and a half. I have gotten to know myself better as my mind has opened and calmed thanks to what I am learning on Headspace to train my mind. Thank you to Andy, Eve and all the wonderful people at Headspace that make it possible for us to become regular meditators and learners.

title: New to daily meditation
review: This was day four and I noticed last time and this time that it‚Äôs giving me such a feeling of calmness. I‚Äôm starting to use this in the morning one of the first things I do and it says such a nice tone for the day. I do prayer after meditation and then I am just so happy and just psyched for a positive productive day. Thank you so much. I‚Äôm loving this. Eventually I‚Äôd like to do it before bed as well.

title: My life saver
review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for about 3 years now. I first downloaded this app when I worked in retail, I first began experiencing overwhelming anxiety. On my breaks I started using headspace with my ear buds in and it made the biggest difference. I still use it for my daily guided meditation, it even has specific guided meditations for different experiences. I highly recommend this app, especially Andy‚Äôs meditation exercises !

title: Thank you Headspace
review: Thanks to Headspace for offering this to healthcare providers in 2020. As a psychologist, my job has had much more added stress due to the pandemic and in order to keep others calm, I need to find stillness and peace within myself. Headspace has helped me with that. I hope they continue to offer this to mental health providers, as it is an invaluable tool to help with the overload of stress the job brings. Cheers to you headspace!

title: Teaches great skills to add to your tool belt
review: Headspace is a great app to learn tools for stress and anxiety management. Also, I love the courses on self esteem and the options to join live meditations! I highly recommend headspace if you‚Äôre working on improving your wellbeing! There are so many courses you can take, including those that are geared towards helping you fall asleep which I greatly appreciate. Keep up the amazing work headspace!

title: Very useful tool
review: Overall great app and tool to use. It can get repetitive and nothing is new once you understand the true basics of it.  Sometimes you just need a voice to carry you through meditation and relaxation. I recommend this app if you don‚Äôt have the resources or emotional ability to reach out for a therapist, consoler, or someone to help you to get your head in a manageable space.

title: Confusing, no Family Plan in Apple
review: Apple says I have a premium subscription but lots of locks.   Maybe because I need a family plan?  Can‚Äôt get through Apple.  Pop ups slow me down when trying to get to where I want to go.  This app is frustrating.  The meditation I have been able to listen to are effective and good quality.  Just needs work on flow
developerResponse: {'id': 14908666, 'body': "Sorry for any trouble accessing your subscription! Please send our team a note at help@headspace.com and we'll help you out.", 'modified': '2020-04-25T20:01:54Z'}

title: DO NOT FALL FOR FREE PREMIUM VERSION‚Äîfalse advertising
review: Headspace is shamelessly exploiting fear and anxiety around the current crisis for their own benefit. They‚Äôre advertising that the premium version of the app is available for free during the covid-19 outbreak. But after selecting that I would like to try the premium version for free, it charged me after a week‚Äîsuggesting there is no change from their typical policies. I am quite frustrated because this app is not cheap- $13 a month to access all the content!!! I‚Äôve been trying many meditation apps recently and for a more honest one with more access to free content I suggest insight timer.

title: Great app, prohibitive pricing
review: Headspace has been amazingly helpful in my journey to understand my mind, manage my anxiety, and be more deliberate in how I spend my time. I wish it were more affordable as there are periods when I go without a subscription, which are typically the ones when I need it most. The free version is a great introduction, but you get so much more with access to the full platform.

title: Literally No Support
review: I purchased a year subscription for this app using my Apple ID. Guess what? Their app doesn‚Äôt support logging in with an Apple ID. So I wanted help with figuring this out? Guess what? All support is email based. No live support. It took me two days to figure out you can only use Headspace with an Apple ID through the web application. Oh and it‚Äôs been three days and I still haven‚Äôt heard from support.

title: Sleep
review: I have trouble sleeping and I thought this app might help me go to sleep faster. I was wrong unfortunately, because while it did have some good options that could help me sleep, it was ALL locked unless I did I free trial that would eventually charge me. They don‚Äôt even give you one option per section to see if you are willing to pay for the rest. It could be really good for me, but it‚Äôs just not worth the money when I can just try listening to something like ASMR to help me sleep. Which is free!!!

title: More calm and present in motherhood
review: Especially in these ‚Äúunprecedented times‚Äù I‚Äôve been really struggling to contain and manage my frustrations and temper as we are all (family of 6) cooped up so often with so many small babies. Headspace practice has helped me be more mindful and present in my daily activities and is certainly helping me live my vocation of motherhood more fully and positively. Highly recommend.

title: Really helpful!
review: The only thing I have a problem with is that every time I try to click on ‚Äòtoday‚Äôs meditation‚Äô, my whole app glitches and I can never click on it again that day. I do not have a subscription, I tried deleting the app from my history, I turned off my wifi, etc. Everything else works but it‚Äôs just when I click on that one specific area then everything stops.

title: Good luck with support
review: Let me start by saying the app itself is great, support is almost useless. One month after buying the one year subscription, my 15 year old daughter asked if she could start using headspace. I‚Äôve emailed twice, which both took a week to get a response. The third email never even got a response. And their only advise for upgrading to the family plan is to cancel my membership and wait for it to expire and then signing up for the family plan. Waiting 11 months before my girl can use it is a bit ridiculous.
developerResponse: {'id': 21781269, 'body': 'Apologies for any trouble! For assistance managing your iTunes subscription, we ask that you reach out directly to Apple. To learn more about upgrading, you can check out this article: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/360011895334.', 'modified': '2021-03-21T19:18:38Z'}

title: So Happy I Found Headspace
review: I am so happy to start each morning with Headspace. So much so that I have gifted it to four family members (with their approval). I wish I would have had this app 30 years ago when a doctor suggested that I might benefit from taking up the practice. I tried unsuccessfully at the time. The doctor was right; but I apparently needed Headspace to make it happen. Thank you, Headspace!

title: WAY WORTH IT !! (at least for sleep)
review:
Personally, I never write reviews, but this app is honestly that good. I have a hard time falling asleep, so I use their sleep casts and my absolute favorite is Night Town. It puts me to sleep so fast every time and I never remember how I fell asleep. I have used some of their meditations and they are good. I like their animations, so peaceful and cute. Alright that's about it. I don't really
know how to end a review lol bye

title: Not worth 70 dollars...
review: Although it‚Äôs ‚Äúfree‚Äù it rolls with the clear ‚Äúpay to win‚Äù scheme. It would be nice if the devs were upfront about the actual price... downloading and setting up the app very quickly you‚Äôll see what I mean. I was almost immediately turned off when I saw the subscribe - subscribe, pushing me to buy in... it would be much more enticing if I could buy selected meditations for like 0.99 cents and go from there or buy the 70 dollars worth of content and just ya know own it. But alas this is a ‚Äúservice pay to win‚Äù kind of deal. I knew it was too good to be true :(

title: Highly Recommend
review: This app has absolutely changed my life. I‚Äôve recommended this app to friends ,family , and complete strangers when we all struggle to find peace in this chaotic world. The secret that many have known and this app teaches us is, only in our minds can we find a resemblance of peace and even that impermanent.  Thank you headspace for being that bridge over troubled waters. This app is truly a God send.

title: BEST THING FOR MENTAL HEALTH
review: My mental health has been pretty bad, but my therapist, psychiatrist, family, you name it‚Äîthey all agree Headspace is such a great support for strengthening mental health. As a college student, this really helps me get through the days by teaching me about mindfulness and living in and for the moment. I‚Äôve even started showing this to my college friends at Rice who have never meditated before, and they find it super useful, too. YOU HAVE TO DOWNLOAD HEADSPACE!

title: Headspace
review: I am really enjoying this 6 month free trial and will be purchasing it in 5 months from now. I look forward to the exercises that are available and am so thankful for the time I‚Äôm allowed to use it for free and same up for when I have to pay in 5 months. Thanks to my doctor who brought this to my attention and to headspace for bringing so many good and helpful subjects to me.

title: Amazing direction
review: I have always been interested in meditation and tried several different thing, but it still never clicked. I use to get frustrated with ‚Äúfocus on your breath‚Äù.... what in earth does that even mean!?!? Andy describes it perfectly though along with all the other directions that they give you to finally wrap your head around what meditation actually is.

title: Meditation made easy
review: I‚Äôve used headspace for a few years now (sometimes maybe only 10 times in that year but I‚Äôve always come back to it). I feel like the presentation of information is done in a really tangible way and the ability to pick your time and series helps really make it work for you. Also been loving the Netflix show too!

title: Real review :) plz read headspace
review: Literally love this app! Being in the military and a firefighter i have many restless nights of sleep and this app sure does help a lot. The 2 thing I‚Äôll say is maybe drop the price a little for a subscription if possible and please add a sleepcast for a rain and thunder storm (I know there‚Äôs a few rain ones but none have thunder). Otherwise I recommend to a lot of people!

title: Head space review
review: I absolutely love head space! I feel way calmer if I‚Äôm doing homework, sleeping or just trying to be happier! Headspace helps my mom and I just wind down after stressful days, even prevent from having stressful days!! It helps in so many ways! My personal favorite use is the sleep meditations and songs! They make me feel so calm a ready to wind down!! Thank you so much head space!!

title: It‚Äôs ok not the best
review: It‚Äôs a really good game and the meditation really helps and it‚Äôs easier to fall asleep but one of the reasons why I don‚Äôt like it is because you have to get a trial and it‚Äôs two weeks for free but then you have to pay every single month afterwords and if you don‚Äôt pay to get the trial thing it won‚Äôt let you do some of the stuff like there is a live meditation going on right now but I can‚Äôt do it because I don‚Äôt have the trial.

title: good app! but...
review: so i have used this app for 2-3 years now, (on different devices). and ive been LOVING it. up until they added more things that need the subscription. i have really really bad anxiety but i cant really do anything to hep that sadly. it would be amazing if you guys could make at least one thing from each category free, so people with that problem could try and attempt to get rid of it. thank you so much if you can.

title: Simple yet powerful app for achieving clarity
review: Great app for taking short breaks from busy schedule to reset and find piece. Highly recommend for anyone moving at full speed 24/7, be it an entrepreneur, executive, consultant, doctor and alike. Commitment is the key. Give this app at least 30 days without breaks and you will feel a completely different quality of your mind and spirit üòá

title: Daily Meditation is life changing
review: Meditation is one of those things that seems more intimidating than it is. Just taking five minutes out of your day to sit and be still has made an enormous positive impact on my life. Stick with it, and it will be one of the best things for you. Headspace has a variety of tools and meditation styles no matter what you're feeling, or what you're doing.

title: Great App
review: This app is great. After watching the Netflix series over 8 days I loved it and downloaded the app and really enjoy it. I only wish it would work with google home so that way I could play the sleep music from here on my google home at night, or set the meditations to go through there. I would check out adding a casting option besides just Apple in the app, but overall I do love it and it‚Äôs 100% worth the download.

title: Thank you!
review: Due to the pandemic I‚Äôm teaching from home virtually using an online platform that is unfamiliar to me. It‚Äôs like starting all over again as a first year teacher. I was super-stressed until another teacher recommended Headspace to me. This has been a lifesaver emotionally. Every program, from meditation to sleep, helps me unwind and stay calmer which benefits my students, too. This app is a keeper!

title: I‚Äôm so disappointed.
review: This app is supposed to help people, yet all the content is locked behind a subscription paywall. Honestly, this would be fine by me if it was a one-time deal, or even if it wasn‚Äôt seventy freaking dollars per year (money I and a lot of the people who work minimum wage or lost their job thanks to covid‚Äî people who need it the most‚Äî probably can‚Äôt afford) but it‚Äôs so discouraging seeing a company that is supposed to be making my life better actually just trying to enrich their pockets by using this greedy tactic. I think I‚Äôll find some free guides online or go to the library :/

title: Too expensive
review: I absolutely loved the sleepcast ‚Äúmidnight launderette‚Äù and got used to it - listening to it at least three nights a week when I had trouble falling asleep. It was part of the free version which was great because, unless you buy a year subscription upfront ($70), the app is $13 a month! I listened to this particular sleepcast for months and then tonight, at 3am when I went to listen to it I was locked out. I literally only use the app for that ONE thing and they want to charge me a fortune for it... I have about 20 bucks to my name and I just want to sleep ffs. Thanks headspace, you‚Äôre a real peach.

title: It‚Äôs a great app, but...
review: I love this app. I think it‚Äôs a really special resource. However, I‚Äôve been having an issue where it frequently crashes during my meditations and it really takes me out of the ‚Äúzone‚Äù when I realize that it‚Äôs been a little too long since I‚Äôve heard the guy‚Äôs voice...I just updated, so I hope that helps, since being worried about the app during the whole meditation kind of defeats the point...

title: Keeps me grounded every day
review: I looked up all the app from calm to ten percent happier and finally picked headspace after reading multiple online reviews and found that it‚Äôs the one that keeps it real - love the talks and the mix of breathing techniques as I get bored and distracted with just breathing techniques .. also the music and section on movement is great. Highly recommend headspace if you are looking to subscribe

title: I love this app
review: This app has a special place in my heart because it truly taught me how to meditate, by meditating I found another perspective of life and this app showed me the path to that mindful peace I was looking for at that time. I really appreciate this app, I would like to subscribe yearly but for my budget right now is a little expensive but this app is WORTH EVERY PENNY! If I could give it 10 stars I would, thank you headspace!

title: Good
review: This app helped a lot. I was going though a rough time since my parents are getting divorced and I was under a lot of stress. My sister was a all around pain and did not listen. She also Verbalee abused saying I was ugly and she side I will kill you. But I stilll live because she has a mental health issue and has really bad anger issues. But the app helped me not be on the verge of tears all day long. It help to relieve stress and anxiety.

title: Now a regular part of my day
review: Headspace is like the anti-doomscrolling device. I move and meditate with this app twice daily and it‚Äôs really helped me focus and relax during the pandemic. It‚Äôs also nice to make my own routine when everything is so uncertain. I also LOVE the sleep casts, they are the best part. They keep adding excellent new ones as well. Try it out, you‚Äôll find something you like!

title: Student discount
review:
If you‚Äôre a student, there is a discount available to you. 

I love this app. I appreciate the daily little reminders and have found these guided meditations to be helpful. There‚Äôs a variety of lengths to choose from. And courses are available for download. As I am often camping and working outdoors, I find being able to use this app offline very comforting.

title: Pretty cool
review: This app is, as the title says, pretty cool. I haven't had it for long, but I really like the focus music. I just wish you got more things without paying. I don‚Äôt know if I want a membership yet! You only gave me a couple things to try! I don‚Äôt know, that‚Äôs my opinion. I‚Äôm sure I would like it if I did buy it, but I. Not 100% sure yet. I guess what I‚Äôm asking is just to have a couple more no-pay things in the app so I could really know if I want to pay or not. Thanks for reading my comment! :)

title: Locked out and frustrated
review: It all started when I tried to change my email on the account I have had for several years. This turned into a hassle, but over a few days app support responded and enabled me to do this. However, following the email reset,  I was required to log in and the password I have been using didn‚Äôt work. When I clicked ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù the app was unable to send a reset password link to my new email. Eventually, I was locked out and again the app was unable to reach my mew email address to send me instructions on how to get back in. So now, I wait.

title: Don‚Äôt hesitate get this app
review: I took me years before I actually started meditating after wanting to start. Headspace helped me get there. High quality program with beautiful videos, great tips, and easy to follow meditation. I have been using the appreciation jog and shut down every day! Love this app, my life has changed for the better due to it. Start today, no time like the present.

title: Sleep and mindfulness
review: I live in a dorm this year and things can be loud outside when I‚Äôm trying to sleep. Headspace gives me something positive to focus on that helps me drift off to sleep. I‚Äôm excited about taking the basics course to train my mind and grateful for the resources to sleep well. The ‚Äúwaking up in the middle of the night‚Äù meditations are particularly helpful and I go to them when I have bad dreams.

title: Tons of hype but zero delivery üëéüèª
review:
I‚Äôve been using Insight Timer almost nightly, and I actually enjoy it a lot. It runs the gamut w choices from guided meditations to soundscapes etc... You can filter w a ton of options, like outcome desired, voice tone, with or w out music, length, and a lot more. 

However, I kept seeing this advertised, so I decided I‚Äôd check it out. In less than 10 mins I saw a sad excuse for an app promising calm! After reading reviews, I believe they‚Äôre stealing you blind to pay for advertising, not your relaxation!

I‚Äôm shocked how primitive it is, compared to many similar apps I‚Äôve tried. You can't filter, and you can‚Äôt fast forward or rewind. The meditations are all short, w the same voice, and the graphics look like a child's game. 

If you‚Äôre looking to unwind and/or ascend the ladder of skill, this isn‚Äôt it. I‚Äôve tried many apps in this category, and I‚Äôm more resolute I‚Äôll stay w Insight Timer and stop comparison shopping!

title: Lifetime membership, huge fan
review: I bought a lifetime membership to headspace years ago and it‚Äôs one of the best purchases I‚Äôve ever made. I‚Äôve been meditating almost every day in quarantine and it has helped me immensely. Headspace is always adding new content and it‚Äôs all really great. I love the new meditation teachers, especially Dora and Kassonga. Just try it out if you‚Äôre at all interested in meditation.

title: Can you give me advice
review: So when I was 7 I started to have the thoughts that threatened me and it got much worse today because I always want to kill the thought person that existed in my mind but the kept coming and I tried to calm down but I just can‚Äôt calm down so can you please upload a meditation of coming down when these thoughts appear

title: Fantastic Meditation
review: I have really enjoyed headspace and Andy‚Äôs approach to meditation for years now.  I‚Äôm finally getting around to writing a long overdo review.  This type of meditation is very helpful for creating presence and space in your head.  Thanks to all involved at headspace for creating a brilliant meditation resource at a fair and reasonable price!  I appreciate the whole team that works to make this such a great thing!!

title: Great app
review: Headspace is my place to go when I need to get away sometimes. Wether I‚Äôm in a car with my family or my bed. You can even mend the time of the meditation to fit your schedule. I highly recommend that everyone should use this app, for it does not require any skill. It gently guides you through a meditation, or a sleep story, and many more options. 5 stars for me!

title: The best app for getting mindfulness!
review:
Headspace is a great app that has everything you may need to get some mindfulness in your life. There‚Äôs everything to learn meditating, sleep well, start your day right and even more. Also I like the design very much, it‚Äôs easy to use and pleasant to look at.
I want to thank Andy and all the members of the Headspace team for this amazing work they have made!

title: Only one suggestion
review: I love this app a lot for both meditations and exercises! My only complaint is that doing exercises doesn‚Äôt keep your daily streak going, only meditations can keep your streak. Keeping a streak has great benefits like the ability to give friends a free headspace trial. But some days I like to just do a workout and then my streak disappears! Overall I do super recommend this app.

title: Great but pricey...
review: I really loved headspace when I first got it. There was a good amount (but still lacking) of free content I could access. As I have used the app for a few years, headspace has been taking more and more of this away! For example, there were three sleepcasts available for free (which really helped me sleep) but now there is only one. I paid for a subscription for around a year which was great but I no longer have a subscription. Please offer a little more free resources

title: Like the voices, expected more content
review: Would have expected many more classes or learning paths for specific goals, maybe more science and learning intermingled would be an eye opening change too.. overall though if you‚Äôre not doing any meditation it really will change your life just helping to manage stresses and feel more natural as intended.
