title: Life Changing!!!
review: This app has changed my life! I‚Äôve been on anti-depressants for the past 3 years. I‚Äôve always wanted to try a more wholistic way of treating my anxiety and depression but nothing was working. I downloaded the headspace app and 2 weeks later I was off my medication and symptom free. I have not missed a single day of meditation since I started and I‚Äôm happier and more aware of my emotions and thoughts.

title: Amazing
review: I love this app so much. A dr. Recommended it to me for high stress that was impacting my body and heart. I‚Äôve never fallen asleep so quickly. I‚Äôve never felt so alert and calm. I know I had the power to enjoy my life but this app has guided me especially when I really needed it most. My only FEEDBACK is I wish there was a way to save mediations I enjoy or an option to save them to listen to later.

title: HeadSpace
review: This meditation app is a helpful way to conveniently meditate on the go. It comes with a variety of guides and subjects to lessen stress and enhance sleep. Even if your new to meditation, the exercises are easy to understand and will teach you the basics of breathing techniques and mindfulness. However, the one downside to this app is that it‚Äôs subscription based. If your looking to get into meditation, HeadSpace is the app for you.

title: Finding Peace
review: I like issuing this app so much. I love the nighttime bed stories and how they incorporate meditation ans adult bedtime stories to help lull you to sleep. And the session they made to help you focus on each this at a time. I‚Äôm doing the Kindness one now and loved the visualization of filling yourself up with light. Highly recommend, I have Calm app also but I use this more and will stick to in the future. Be well

title: Amazing
review:
I‚Äôve used different applications in order to get used to meditating on a daily basis. This app finally did the job. The library is growing on a good pace and I really enjoy the wakeup.

However, recently I can‚Äôt access the wakeup and it‚Äôs really bothering me. And apparently other people are experiencing the same problem. I hope the bug gets fixed soon.

title: Anxiety and panic attacks
review: I had a stressful job that I recently left that caused me to develop anxiety and panic attacks. It was a nightmare because I never knew when the attacks would come, and sometimes, there weren‚Äôt even any triggers. Headspace has helped me tremendously and is my go to when I‚Äôm feeling anxious. I go listen to an episode before my heart starts to race and lately it stops my panic attacks in its tracks.

title: Great customer service!
review: I had forgotten to cancel my annual subscription and was charged this past January for an annual subscription.  I loved the app but didn‚Äôt have the time nor dedication to continue with it.  When I emailed their customer service about my subscription, they got back with me in a timely manner and gave me a full refund as well as canceling my subscription for me!

title: Headspace
review:
I Love it. For me, it was a means to start meditation. I had been wanting to meditate for years and always felt intimidated thinking I couldn‚Äôt sit still and think of ‚Äúnothing‚Äù. I didn‚Äôt understand what meditation was. 
 Headspace let me start our at 2 or 3 minute sessions and as I felt the benefits (immediately ) I was able to gradually increase session time. 
  I now regularly do 20 minute sessions

title: i love this app!
review: i‚Äôve been meditating for some time now and i originally saw the Netflix series  on how to meditate and it was very well put together and helpful so much. I have the best meditations when following these guided meditations and it really helps me so much through my day! I LOVE everyone who was a part to make headspace and to help other people. mwuah good job on this app it‚Äôs my favorite thing ever.

title: The Space Feels Amazing in Head!
review: I started using Headspace regularly 3 months ago. I didn‚Äôt know how cluttered my mind was until I tried to sit in silence for 10 minutes.... That one experience changed my perception of myself and the category of meditation. I‚Äôve got a long ways to go, but headspace scales with my learning. It really is the holistic packageüëåüèª u the techniques behind the practice!

title: Life changing
review: I‚Äôve been dancing with anxiety my whole life. Not until I started meditating with the help of Headspace did I realize that my pursuit to rid myself of anxiety was a fool‚Äôs errand. Instead, I‚Äôve learned how to embrace it and dance with it. I‚Äôve also learned how to experience the world from the seat of the self, and understand my own consciousness more. I‚Äôm able to experience joy, and sustain it.

title: 5 Stars From a Teacher
review:
Ever since I found out I received a free subscription to Headspace for teachers, I decided to give it a try. This app is beautifully made for me as an adult and for my elementary students as well. In a time where mindfulness is as important as ever, this app delivers. Here are some of my favorite features:

- meditation ‚Äúpacks‚Äù that deal with everything from the basics to coping with cravings
- a daily ‚Äúwake-up‚Äù which always teaches me something new and helps me prep for the day
- amazing nighttime sleep casts and wind downs 
- music for mindfulness

I could go on and on. Even if you are not an educator I would recommend getting the subscription - the full suite of amazing features are extremely worth it.

title: Love this App!
review: Love this app, thank you for offering your services free to healthcare workers that‚Äôs just amazing. You help me stay calm during these tough days and assist me in winding down for bed. I would love the option to cast through a speaker or airplay to other speakers. It would be great for my partner and I to listen to it at the same time for winding down for bed. Thanks again, keep up the amazing work.

title: Always handy to have Andy
review: Headspace has been so helpful in my life. I‚Äôm a teacher and mother and have also been suffering from deep depression and anxiety for years. This app is a motivational compliment to any self help regimen. I use the kids meditation for my highly active 3 yr old and practice the movement series with my partner. We use our headspace every day and recommend it highly to anyone. Thank you Andy!

title: Amazing! Honest, it‚Äôs good.
review: I‚Äôve used different apps but this one was the first and by far the best! I mean you know they want to help you if they‚Äôre providing the free basics. I‚Äôve payed for the premium version and it‚Äôs worth every cent. After some time life became life and I wasn‚Äôt using the app so I canceled the subscription and when life becomes too much.. you go back to the basics. It‚Äôs freaking amazing!

title: Headspace = Mental Spa
review: I must say that through all of the wellness apps, this particular one became favorable because they show how deep they care for individuals to not only understand and learn to meditate (or as I call it, Mental Yoga), but with baby steps of practice it will take you far. I just started  for 5 minutes and after that, I passed it on to coworkers and family who I know are all in need of meditating. I LOVE IT!

title: The BEST
review: I lost my job due to Covid19 pandemic and was going through a lot of anxiety and rage. This application has been like a miracle and helped me with focusing on the positive things, gain a good focus, work on my self esteem, and overall live a better life. Lots of great tools and tips and techniques are provided in this app. Thank you for developing such an awesome application and making it free to people like me in these unusual times.

title: Small steps, big change
review: Believe it: meditation makes a difference every day. This app makes the practice approachable and keeps the tone light. I‚Äôm approaching 7,000 minutes of practice over years. My only complaint is the inability to turn off the ‚Äúrun streak‚Äù feature; it‚Äôs discouraging. Do that and I‚Äôll renew my subscription again. And give the app 5 stars!

title: The Wake Up is the BEST
review: I kind of strayed away from using this app because I felt like I didn‚Äôt know where to start, but the Wake Up show every morning is my favorite thing now. I wake up, have my coffee, and start my day off right. The best part? That quick jolt of fresh mindful content every morning makes me want to meditate even more, so I keep on using the app. Love you guys. Peace ‚úåüèª

title: Life Changing
review:
This app is helping change my life. I‚Äôm in my 40s and have struggled with depression, anxiety, and negativity my whole life. If you ever met me, you‚Äôd never suspect it because I‚Äôve trained myself to hide these things. But, on the inside I‚Äôm freaking out, fighting to hold it all together. 
When I feel like I‚Äôm about to shatter under the stress of this, I sit down for 10, sometimes 15 minutes and go through one of the sessions. Afterwards, (most of the time) I am calm with a sense of perspective. 

I‚Äôve yet to discipline myself to make this a daily part of life, but I will. I see the positive effects it has on my fianc√© and my stepsons. I know this app is helping me be the person I want to be. 

Please give it a try!

title: Mindfulness
review: I downloaded this app for my Mindfulness course that I am taking currently. I really enjoyed this app because it guides me through different breathing and meditations. The only thing I dislike about Headspace is that it‚Äôs a one month free trial. For a college student who is broke its hard to add even the smallest amounts into my budget. However, if I continue to enjoy this app I may just have to!

title: Amazing and useful
review: Honestly this app has been so amazing. To be truthful an app doesn‚Äôt change your life but this definitely helps guide you to be mindful and just managing my stress. I struggle with a lot of anxiety with school and work. This app has given me tools to help manage it but again you have to put the work in but I think it‚Äôs worth it.

title: Landscape Mode For iPad Please!
review:
Everything about the app is great and would be a 5 star rating if the iPad app supported Landscape mode. I use a Smart Keyboard and rarely orient my device in portrait except for when I have to in the morning for headspace. Thanks.

Update 2021! Nothing has changed. Still lacks landscape mode. I know its petty, and I should be mindful of my frustrations, but it would be cool if this app functioned like 99% of other iPad apps I use. I raised it to 3 stars in the event that might make the review more visible.

title: Headspace changed my life
review: My favorite thing about this app is that it is not just a guided meditation app, it becomes your private meditation teacher that teaches you about the practice. Also, there is such a variety of content that I have been meditating with it everyday for 556 days in a row and I'm still finding new things courses and packs to keep things interesting.

title: Life Changing
review: I held off using this for so long and I regret that wasted time. Headspace is a great tool to build and endlessly sharpen your meditation skills. Ever since I started I have become calmer, more focused, more confident, more creative, and genuinely more in touch with myself and those around me. The teachers are amazing and the sleepcasts are a fantastic tool if you have problems falling asleep some nights.

title: Peace üòå
review: This app truly is amazing. I think there is still much work to be done. However, the timeless effort and hard work by these people are amazing. The team had really put meaning and love behind the healing and prowess of progression. I could be happier but due to their hard work and determination to better human life, it‚Äôs a 5 star for me. It really is worth every penny.

title: I‚Äôm in love already...
review: It‚Äôs been hmm... 5 days since I started meditating and my life has already changed. I love it. It makes you feel whole. The happiness course is really up my alley. I have a different outlook on life. I have already bought the year membership and am planning on never stopping meditating for the rest of my life. Thank you so much headspace. Highly recommend.

title: Vital during the times.
review: I have chronic pain and had to continue to work full speed at the hospital thru the pandemic.  Unable to seek therapy or treatment for myself, I turned to headspace, The pain series meditation los has allowed me to live with my pain and remain sane and healthy.  Thank you for providing this service at no cost to us in the medical service.  Our patients thank you as well.

title: Love this app.
review: Since I've been diagnosed with Turner's sydrome I don't have a great memory which makes me have anxiety. I've also been diagnosed with anxiety disorder bc of my memory. This is just what I needed for my anxiety. I've started meditating yesterday and just did one today. I like how you can do it anytime you want to as well and do as many sessions as you want. Great app keep up the good work!

title: 10/10 would recommend
review:
I love this app SO much. It‚Äôs been with me through some great -and not so great- moments. Love how there are a wide variety of meditations to choose from, but not so many that you feel overwhelmed. Also, the sleepcasts are a game changer! Only wish there was a ‚Äòfavorite‚Äô functionality so I could save my most commonly used meditations. 

Keep being great Team Headspace üòå

title: Well done!
review: My career was in Psychotherapy, and now that I am older, retired, a breast cancer survivor, the lessons on living with cancer are calming, interesting, and show results! Difficult for a healer to heal oneself... i appreciate the pace, the absence of expectations, and the calming voice of the narrator. I have finished part one and am able to let my breathing take center stage, now that I can manage thoughts and feelings. Thank you!

title: Like learning a science
review:
My university was giving out free Pro accounts ‚Äî I recommend checking your school too!

The quality of Andy‚Äôs lessons are incredible. He presents the practice of meditation so measured, so thoughtfully and well understood that even myself as a completely non-spiritual person I am able to appreciate meditation simply for the techniques and strategies it is. Wonderful stuff.

title: Can we cast to a device?
review: I am a daily user, I am enjoying practicing meditation. I would like to start to use the yoga or other workout videos, however since I use it on my phone, it‚Äôs very hard to see when I‚Äôm trying to move. Can you please add the ability to cast to the television device? We have a Google Chromecast and it would be great to be able to cast the workout videos to a larger screen.

title: 8500+ mins (6 years of use and counting!)
review: I can‚Äôt tell you how much Headspace has changed my life! It helped me to get through life as a medical worker in the midst of Covid-19. It has helped with my anxiety, my anger management and my relationships with others and myself. If you haven‚Äôt tried it- I challenge you to try meditation using this app every day for 30 days. It is truly life altering!

title: Simple and powerful
review:
Andy is great. No bells and whistles just what you need. Definitely worth a try for anyone who is looking for an everyday guided meditation to help with mindfulness.

Disclaimer: Everyone is different and has different styles. I think headspace is great and could help a lot of people, but that doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs for everyone. Recommend just to try me see if it‚Äôs right for you.

title: Life changing
review: I started using this app at least 6 years ago.  I now use it daily. I find that it helps me understand and cope with my everyday emotions as well as have better relationships with my friends and family. I also feel more productive because I am able to focus on one task at a time. This app has been life changing for me.

title: Where would I be w/o
review:
I truly cannot imagine a better meditation companion. The tips and tricks learned are great. It helps keep you accountable. They really seem to have thought of everything. Always updating to offer more and more. 
I couldn‚Äôt recommend more. The world will be a better place the more people that meditate. And I would rec every westerner to start here.

title: The best meditation app
review: I‚Äôve tried MANY meditation apps and Headspace is by far my favorite and keeps me the most consistent. I also feel the biggest difference in my everyday life which I believe is because of the different techniques that are always changing. I have a significant anxiety disorder and Headspace has helped me recenter and cope in a way I haven‚Äôt been able to before ü§ç

title: Astounding.
review: There are so many wonderful packs that really help you along once you've completed the basics. I love this! I found that even after 1,000 minutes of mediation on the app I really do love being led through the sessions and cues even though they can be repetitive. In fact it is that repetition I‚Äôm starting to like because that is how we learn new skills.

title: RIP Random Sleep Option
review:
Love this app, very intuitive- the only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars is because a feature on the sleep page to ‚ÄúPlay Random‚Äù sleep-related track was removed.
I love that teeny detail, I used it every night to listen to new options that weren‚Äôt my go-to‚Äôs. Haven‚Äôt seen another app with that feature that made so much sense.

title: Great app for beginners and regular meditators
review: I recommend this app to everyone I know. The fact that they have such a huge range of meditations that range from 1 minute to 45 minutes is the BEST. Plus the exercise meditations have made running so much easier. I can‚Äôt emphasize enough, this is a great app. I couldn‚Äôt imagine something that‚Äôs more worth the annual fee. 5/5 stars for sure

title: Helps to improve my mental health
review: This app has helped me by giving me the tools to take control of my mental health and get it back on track. Compared to the other meditation apps I have tired, this one works the best for me because the methods are pretty consistent and the instruction is very clear. I love Headspace! I don‚Äôt know what quality of life I would have right now without it.

title: Engaging, insightful, great product execution
review: I absolutely love this app. I've been using it for 5 years now and I'm constantly learning, feeling more in tune with myself, and inspired to remain mindful throughout the day (although this is much easier said than done). Andy is fabulous and the product team did a fantastic job at making a beautiful, easy to use, engaging app.

title: Great meditation app with many varieties
review: Headspace has a nice interface and great content about meditation. I love the way by giving you an intro about the essence of meditation first for most of the session, so letting me to understand more about life and meditation. Love the variety, focus, happiness, sleep etc. and the group meditation session. Meditation needs practice. I start feeling of the benefit of it to my work and my life.

title: It is worth the time and the investment.
review: As someone who does struggle with anxiety/depression, this app does help me manage and control my stress and attacks. I use it when I go to sleep and when I‚Äôm overworked at work and life. It helps calm me down and focus on improvement and being overall happier. I would recommend this to everyone, to give it a shot and try it out.

title: Amazing App!
review: Headspace is incredible! I‚Äôm an engineer so I have always been skeptical of the mind how people who believe in things like manifestation might have been crazy. BUT they aren‚Äôt! Every time I do a meditation I figure out something new about myself, or it helps me uncover a solution to problem that had been concerning me. Trust in yourself and in your mind, you are powerful!

title: Fantastic for my insomnia
review:
I‚Äôve had chronic insomnia for many years and tried the sleepcasts as a last resort. I was pleasantly surprised and very happy to find that most nights I am asleep before the story ends.
Four stars because unfortunately I am now basically addicted to Eve‚Äôs voice and can only fall asleep to her stories. I‚Äôd love it if you could please provide an choice for male/female (Eve) voice selection like the mediations offer. 
Thank you!!

title: Morning meditation
review: I have been using this app Headspace for a number of years. I observed myself a noticeable difference on mornings that I do not take time to sit. This app helps me set a positive tone in which to begin my day openly and with calmness. I am a 64-year-old high school special education teacher. It is imperative that I stay centered in my work. I am grateful for this app to help me make that happen.

title: New to meditation? yes.
review: This app helped me start my journey on meditation. It made the initial resistance I had met away with it‚Äôs easy tradition and guided supervision. I feel like I am in the room with Andy when listening to the app. I am very grateful for this app and eagerly look forward to using it each morning. Absolutely superb! look forward to using it each morning. Absolutely superb!

title: Great app to start with meditation.
review:
A lot of good quality guided meditations for all levels. New Focus tab is actually great, and I enjoy using it.

Would like to see AirPlay support, especially for Move section, because it‚Äôs a bit uncomfortable to look at a small screen for the instructions.

And missing dark mode, which right now is becoming a necessity.

title: pricey
review: hi. i'm pretty young, high school age. i recently got diagnosed with major anxiety and depression, so i wanted to try something to help me cope with it. the first couple of basic courses were alright, but i had a hard time following it because i can't sit still for very long. however, i saw that in the library, there were things that can help whenever my anxiety or depression is really bothering me. but guess what? you have to subscribe to get most of it! i'm a kid, and i don't have a credit card. besides, my parents wouldn't pay that much for some meditation app. i always get sorta upset whenever these self care apps make the actually helpful things premium features that you have to buy. i shouldn't have to buy peace of mind.

title: Highly recommend.
review: I love Headspace. I am a psychotherapist and I came across headspace during my practice as a means to help teach my clients the art of mindfulness. I now use Headspace myself almost daily and frequently use it with clients in session and they choose to use on their own as well. I love the animations that teach/guide as well as all the different variations of practice. I highly recommend.

title: This app is amazing
review: Recently I‚Äôve been having a lot of stress and didn‚Äôt know how to handle it, I‚Äôve also been having trouble with unhealthy habits I‚Äôve been having. When I saw an ad for this app and see if could help me, it has changed my life for the better, I‚Äôve only done 3 sessions and I‚Äôm already feeling so much better than before.üòå

title: Helps with My Auto emune deficiency and related health problems
review: I struggle a lot with medical. I love music, so the music in the back helps me so much. They should add queen into this. It helps when I breathe üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I like paying money for this because it‚Äôs worth it. I don‚Äôt like hospitals, but i Am always in them do this is awesome for me to chill out. Thank you for reading. please buy a red iPhone to support aids

title: Life changing and worth it.
review: It‚Äôs rare to find something self help like that truly works. This is worth all the time I can throw at it. My day to day life can be so much calmer because the time I take to meditate. I have had horrible anger issues for as long as I can remember and I actually feel them easing. I stopped yelling so much. Maybe soon I will begin to smile more.

title: Okay but could improve
review: I really like this app, it helps a lot with calming down, falling asleep and things like that. The only problem for me personally is that most of the sessions on anxiety are locked. I get anxiety at night so I was hoping this would help me but, considering most of the the anxiety ones ( that I saw at least) were locked I was a bit disappointed. Other than that though great app.

title: Incredible- you will love it
review: I didn‚Äôt know how to meditate in a real way, which this app has easily guided me through, but it also helped me learn so many tricks that therapists have also taught me to deal with stress and anxiety throughout the day. It‚Äôs such a godsend and has focuses on so many things to help you improve your life. I love it, thank you for making this app!

title: Unearthed By Headspace
review:
I work at home and live with a four year old 24/7. Add that single reality to many other surprisingly gruesome variables and you have my life. 

This app brought me back to the land of the trying-to-be-skillful-living and for that, I give it four stars. 

The fifth star is for the delicious fact that the sound of Andy‚Äôs voice puts my daughter to sleep like a shot.

title: Daily practice: a year and a half later
review: My husband and I began our Headspace journey shortly after we retired. Now 18 months later,  it‚Äôs an essential part of how we start our day. We would never have predicted how the global pandemic would change our lives but amid the challenges is consistent peaceful grounding that begins our day. Thank you, Andy for offering Headspace!

title: Best Meditation App Out There
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 3 years after looking for something to help me deal with my anxiety. Andy‚Äôs soothing voice and tips on meditating/breathing/relaxing have helped me even when I‚Äôm not meditating. I recently updated the app and the new version cuts Andy off at the end. I hope the developers fix this with the next version.

title: What an amazing app and company
review: I used the free app for a few months and saw a difference but can I say how much I commend this company for positively impacting victims of unemployment in such an amazing and insightful way? What an amazing company for putting individuals mental health over profits and giving the app away for free if you are unemployed. What an amazing way to give back to the community, keep doing great things Headspace, I love you ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Awesome! More AMSR!
review:
I love HeadSpace! It really helps me calm down every night, and my sleep has improved tremendously! I just wish there were more ASMR sleepcasts! Out of all of them, there are only 2. Personally, I find that ASMR helps me fall asleep the best, but I practically know all the ASMR sleepcasts word for word now! I also wish the ASMR sleepcasts had more binaural sounds to drift off to.

I love this app though, I can barely make it through a full episode without falling asleep :)
developerResponse: {'id': 17080448, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We'll be sure to pass along these Sleepcast requests to our team!", 'modified': '2020-08-04T17:51:49Z'}

title: Be very careful about your subscription choices!
review: I have purchased headspace for a year and I accidentally got signed out. I cannot go back unless I pay for another year. I am not getting any service although I my subscription doesn‚Äô t end until August 2020.  I have been asking for help from customer service for weeks now, no answer ! They took my money and won‚Äôt give me any service. I will write this message in every platform I can so they know how an app that is supposed to give you peace becomes a stress resource itself! I am so mad for I feel like I have been scammed!
developerResponse: {'id': 12693248, 'body': "We're so sorry for the delay in our response. We are seeing higher than normal volume and replying to inquiries in the order in which we receive them. You will hear from us soon. Thank you for your patience!", 'modified': '2020-01-02T19:50:48Z'}

title: Life changing
review: Everything about this app is the perfect introduction to meditation. I‚Äôm still working on my ability to keep focus but every SOS and course I‚Äôve tried when I needed it has been very helpful. I just opened the app to see if they had a meditation about having a difficult conversation and of course they did!! Thanks

title: Great app! If you pay for it
review: The meditation basics they give you for free are wonderful! However, you do need to buy the subscription in order to do anything else. Maybe if you were to buy the app, instead of it being free, then get everything after you have a 1 time purchase it would be 5 stars. Still though, I‚Äôm seriously considering buying the subscription ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Do not recommend
review:
Headspace is cool. Don‚Äôt get me wrong‚ÄîI love the idea and the concepts that it‚Äôs built around but the paywall is ridiculous. That‚Äôs my only problem with it. I‚Äôve deleted this app and redownloaded it multiple times in the past few years and every time I‚Äôve deleted‚Äîit‚Äôs because there is nothing to do.

Sure, there are four or five short meditations, sounds, and headspaces, but there is so much content unavailable to non-premium users. It‚Äôs annoying and the app is, essentially, useless unless you pay the expensive fee. As a minor going into highschool I don‚Äôt have the money or the time. 

If you‚Äôre considering getting this app, by all means, get it. Try the premium. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs helpful.

My only objection is the paywall. If that‚Äôs ever removed (or at least lessened, because I understand you need money) then maybe I‚Äôll consider this app again and boosting my review. 

Thank you for your time.

title: Love this app
review: I‚Äôve been meditating for a few years now I just got this app three days ago. I‚Äôm still figuring out all the cool settings and such, but I love that the app is really good at working with MY schedule. I can set alarms for times to meditate and put it on my calendar with just a few buttons in the app. Super efficient. I definitely recommend so far.

title: Worth every minute
review: Thank you for making this free for educators. It has made such a difference in finding some peace every day. I am currently going through infertility treatments and my anxiety has gone though the roof. Mediation is one of the things I have found that genuinely help bring me down and help me work through what I‚Äôm dealing with minute to minute.

title: New to this
review: New to learning about meditation . And I love all the lessons and info found in this app. There is also children lessons which is great too ! Love it from just scheming and listening to a few lessons and seeing a few relaxing clips. Everything is doable for even a busy mommy like me. Definitely recommend especially during this pandemic.

title: I ALWAYS come back here
review: I have used Headspace on and off for 2 years.  Finally got a yearly subscription and committed to using it daily.  Now I may not always use it daily, but when remember my commitment to self and take the time to sit, I am always an glad for having meditation. In my life.  There are so many tools in Headspace, something for every day!

title: Amazing!
review: I am a 7th grader and I have a lot of stress on my shoulders from my advanced classes and I have anxiety for different papers last night I worried myself so much I couldn‚Äôt sleep so I turned on this app went to the calming sounds in 5 minutes I was asleep. This has helped me with so many things since I barely get any sleep at night! Totally recommend

title: New update is....not great.
review: Let me start by saying how much I have loved working with this app. My current streak is over 200 days... My only complaint is that the newest update just made the app impossible to navigate. I literally can‚Äôt find half of the things I‚Äôve been using so frequently. Packs and single meditations have disappeared. Yikes, Headspace.

title: Life changing!!
review: I‚Äôve been trying to mediate for years without building the habit and within weeks of getting this app it‚Äôs changed my life. Not only does it help you build the habit but it also shows you why meditation can be valuable. It is easy to use, enjoyable, and well designed! Love this app.. I‚Äôve been using it every single day.

title: Expensive- people who need it and can‚Äôt afford it.
review: I remember when this app was starting out and I used it everyday. Although they had paid parts, they still had free access to a lot, and I couldn‚Äôt afford therapy or mediations or whatever, so I would use this and it helped. Now, whenever I need to sleep or to calm my head, I can‚Äôt turn to the app I once did because I can‚Äôt afford it. Guess money goes over health. App? Great. Loss of care for human mental health? Completed.

title: New to this.
review:
I am fully enjoying headspace and the fact that it is offered at no fees makes it even better. Thank you.
My ten year old granddaughter started using guided sleep meditation and taking God moments weeks before I started Headspace. She is a big reason I started my journey. I would like to find a Headspace for her to help her stay on the path she started.

title: Calming with coaching
review:
Have found this app to be effective in calming and settling.  The format works into my schedule and gives me the freedom to adjust when and where to access the site.  
Understanding does help to improve adequately dealing with anxiety.  The lessons, in order build a familiarity with how the program works.  It is easier each time upon returning.

title: Headspace
review:
About 2 years now, many forward steps , many standing still.  Offers a full & ever expanding menu - though lately have felt it‚Äôs too much.  Too many choices trying to match everyone‚Äôs need & tastes.  Perhaps  a smaller window is best for the scattered unsettled mind, especially during this unsettled worldwide pandemic.

Still after a while the message of stillness lingers.  Breathe - saunter away - breathe.

Just breathe.

title: App Usage
review:
Hi there, 

Does this app allow users to project the videos you are currently playing on ur phone onto TV screen through Bluetooth? I rather not hold my phone on my hand while working on activities with one of your cool videos. especially when you are trying to follow the workout steps and sweaty. Help us with that! Otherwise this is the best app I have seen in its class! Thank you for the awesomeness!

title: Headspace
review: I cannot recommend this app enough! I love everything about it and it has drastically helped with my anxiety. I use it to relax and when I can feel my mind starting to race. The analogies they use put everything into a different perspective and truly help me. I could never thank this app enough for the support it has given me. 10/10.

title: The best meditation-and-more app
review: I wasn‚Äôt able to access silent meditation as a personal practice until finding this app, and it‚Äôs so much more than just that. Every phone should come with this pre-downloaded, it has something for everyone. Definitely worth the yearly subscription price for access to all content!
developerResponse: {'id': 15661712, 'body': "So sorry for any trouble! Please send our team a note at help@headspace.com and we'd be more than happy to look into this for you.", 'modified': '2020-05-30T00:46:35Z'}

title: Ok start but missing some options
review:
A decent and general all around app but is missing some features.... 
No deep sleep or hypnosis that many popular sleep and meditation apps have like Breethe. 

Also lacks the ability to Chromecast or push any of the workout videos to TV streaming devices from phone. This is a pretty standard video feature these days and it was surprising that an app as popular as this doesn't have support for casting to screen.

title: Lifelong practice
review:
I was recommended Headspace by my physical therapist. It came from a casual conversation, and when I gave it a try, it resolved the tension around my neck that drove me to go to physical therapy in the first place.

Ever since, I went on and off this app until one day, the tension around the neck returned to the degree that I had experienced earlier on.

I quickly took up Headspace once more, and it has since been a daily tool for me to let go of tension, and return to the present.

I cannot thank Andy and the team enough for the courses that changed the subjective experience of my life.

Whether you are tense or fine but curious, I recommend a try to see how you feel.

title: I love Headspace!!!
review: I have been very overwhelmed lately with work and Headspace have helped me so much to wind down!! Taking a couple minutes off to meditate everyday in between my work is my new hobby!! Much more energy, much more relaxed! It helps immediately! And the fact that there is a meditation to every situation or emotion you might have is priceless! ‚ú® Thank you Headspace!

title: Unacceptable integration to Apple health
review:
I have been a headspace user for five years now, I wanted to connect it to Apple health to have some analysis of data. The instructions to integrate are to delete the app, remove all associated data, start from scratch, listen to the day 1, and then accept the Apple health integration.

I will update to 5 stars when they have a better workflow.
developerResponse: {'id': 20762903, 'body': "Apologies for any confusion with this process, the good news is you don't need to start from scratch. Please send us a message to help@headspace.com so we can further assist you with this!", 'modified': '2021-01-31T22:59:22Z'}

title: Life changing
review:
Headspace has been a life changing app for me.
I depend on the sounds and the stories to send me off to sleep . My sleep has I improved greatly from the breathing exercises. I did try a few of the other apps that are available and most definitely think Headspace is the one that seems almost custom made for me and my lifestyle

title: Headspace for a clinical therapist
review: II have a very busy practice seeing clients in psychotherapy. It‚Äôs emotionally draining. Doing Headspace in the morning helps me fully be present and focused on my clients. In addition, I end the day feeling calm. If I miss a day, I often end my day with a headache. At this point, I prefer to do thePro offerings, but I love to intersperse other themed meditation series to give more variety and motivation for my practice.

title: $9.99 a whole year for college student!!!
review: In-app purchase is so pricey so I tryna find a student discount from their website on google. They have it! I‚Äôm literally sooo happy and I paid subscription immediately! I listen to their sleep podcast, I use them to focus studying, I start my morning with their stories. I‚Äôm so grateful to be a student and to afford Headspace with great price! :)

title: Headspace
review: I have been wanting to start a meditation practice for over 20 years when I first started reading about its benefits.  This AP has guided me easily toward making mindfulness a habit which is, for me, just what I wanted but procrastinated against.  I bought a subscription.  I have spent more money foolishly.  This investment has been more than worth the money I spent.

title: Excellent!
review: Highly recommended! I‚Äôve been using Headspace for several years and it has been incredibly helpful in dealing with anxiety for me. Andy and the Headspace team make meditation very accessible (the animations are the best!) and there is a noticeable improvement in my ability to manage stress when I have been regularly using headspace versus when I haven‚Äôt.

title: Very nice calming app. I really like it. but..
review: This app is nice, dont get me wrong! but i feel like u should add more options for ppl who dont have the trial. I dont have the trial so i would just be scrolling down options i can choose to help me sleep and meditate but like half of them u need the trial. so i would be listening to the same ones over and over again. but i would love it if u would add more options. thanks!

title: A learner‚Äôs observation
review: I‚Äôd toyed with meditating since a groovy teacher, many years ago, introduced my middle school choral class to it. But not until using this app, with these fantastic teachers to gently instruct me through the process did I begin to understand how to meditate. It took a while but it has helped me so much. Headspace is a great tool for peace within, which radiates out.

title: A Worthwhile Practice
review:
I appreciate how this app has helped me make space for mindfulness in my life. Consequently, my life is better. The app has features, like targeted meditations, quick pauses, and reminders, that makes stopping to be mindful a manageable, even habitual, part of my day. 

If you want to add a daily practice that will really change your life, try this app out.

title: It‚Äôs life changing
review: When I first started to use headspace I thought it was useless but as soon as I got more into it it started to calm me down and make my head light when I had a lot to deal with you should try it when you first start it doesn‚Äôt really feel right  but As soon as you get really into it it starts to get good

title: Worthless without paying for subscription
review: I had this app a couple years ago and used it daily to wind down at night. I redownloaded recently due to stress and help falling asleep. However, I was SHOCKED when I tried to listen to the sleep programs like I used to and I was asked to pay $13 just for a month. Honestly, that is an outrageous fee for something that used to be free. If it was a $5 one time fee, I‚Äôd gladly pay it. I am honestly embarrassed that I used to recommend this app to my friends and family and talked about it up until recently.

title: It‚Äôs changed how I experience life üòå
review:
I love the consistency of the teaching. I have been mediating for about 2 years with this application. started with the basics , did the different courses , pro and now I meditate with just the timer
I recommend this application to anyone who is interested in mindfulness 
10/10 would recommend 
And thank you‚ù§Ô∏è

title: My most used app
review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for years now and it‚Äôs been such a pleasure. It‚Äôs really developed my meditation practice as well as all the side effects you hear about. And his voice is so peaceful and all the sleep casts really have saved my night and sleepless adventures. I‚Äôve learned so much through this app and it‚Äôs been a great tool of self discovery

title: Continuing as ‚ÄúFrozen Echos‚Äù And replying to the dev
review:
-Review-    
To the dev that wrote to me. I feel nice that I got a response to my original review just I don‚Äôt have problems signing up or logging in, which makes me believe that their going of a script of responses or the ‚Äúdev responses‚Äù are bots responding I am currently not sure of either if they are a bot or whatever.
