title: The most used app on my phone.
review:
I highly recommend this app for anyone seeking balance. There is always so much going on in our heads, in the world, and just in general. This is a great tool to compartmentalize everything and keep you connected to your reality. 

It helps me start my day, think of new insights, take a break from a stressful moment, use focus music to keep centered in order to not get distracted, and be able to enjoy a peaceful human experience. 

Life isn‚Äôt easy but the guided meditation combined with the many other things this app offers helps you keep perspective through the good and bad of life. 

I love Headspace and can‚Äôt imagine my life without it.

title: Life changing! THIS IS WORTH EVERYTHING.
review: I can‚Äôt even begin to say how great headspace is. It‚Äôs one of the best guided oracrices and it‚Äôs honestly changed my life. I have less anxiety more peace and feel f so much happier. Thank you headspace for this wonderful app and thank you for being and working so hard to create this well thought out and  and life changing app! Thank you thank you thank you!!!

title: Almost perfect.
review: The app is super helpful if you are here to meditate & control your mental stress & anxiety then it‚Äôs exactly what you should download. One star is missing because of the subscription. Headspace doesn‚Äôt offer lifetime subscription like other meditation apps which make it fall Behind the competition for me. I also tried to reach the support for this many times but they only let me down.

title: Best Mindfulness App Yet!
review: This app isn‚Äôt like all the others where it just plays music or expects that you already understand meditation. It guides you step by step! It explains how it works, how to use mindfulness skills, and how it can help you. You can even pick which voice you prefer, as long as the length of time in with you meditate. Thanks Headspace!

title: Sleepcasts are the cure for insomnia
review: I used to only used the courses, mostly in the basics and stress categories. These were amazing and taught me a lot. Now I have made less time for those but have really enjoyed the sleepcasts. Unless I am completely exhausted, I play one every night and fall asleep so much quicker and have less anxiety about falling asleep. Make more! (Please)

title: Clarity
review: Headspace has given me the opportunity to be more at peace with my thoughts and emotions and I feel so much better throughout my day now. The thoughts and emotions don‚Äôt go away, but they are more easily managed and I feel I have more clarity when thinking and making decisions. Guided meditation has been one of the best steps I‚Äôve taken for my mental health. Thanks Headspace!

title: Thank you! üôèüèΩ‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®
review: This app has really helped me to mediate more than I would without it. The voice is calm and soothing and I find the guidance helpful when meditating. I don‚Äôt even do it regularly but I really would like to. This was my 5th time and I finally did 10 minutes and it felt like nothing. Yay me! Thoughts are so interesting. The guide‚Äôs words of wisdom grow and impacted me. It‚Äôs dope!

title: Wonderful guidance for a peaceful mind
review: Headspace has been part of my life for a few years. It has strengthened me through very difficult life events, and helped me enjoy the good days more. I have a much more balanced mind to return to, and the practice gives me peace in the midst of chaos. I highly recommend Andy‚Äôs soothing voice, as well as the wonderful sleep meditations

title: Why I use Headspace
review:
I live alone and have just retired. The pandemic has made my life rather small. There is much to read, study, and watch, but I don‚Äôt want to just fill time. I want to LIVE and appreciate every moment I have left.  Headspace points me in a direction that helps me see possibilities. I meditate, and I also appreciate the beauty of the nature videos. Kevin Hart helps, too

NYC

title: Wow!
review: I tired it for the first time and didn‚Äôt even realize I was falling asleep until the guy stopped talking, I want to say I actually fell asleep naturally within the first 30 mins. I usually have horrible insomnia and need medication to sleep which I hate taking because it makes me feel groggy the next day but wow! For sure will be using this nightly!

title: Overwhelming and cluttered app
review:
The app was great when it first came out. I‚Äôve been using it for at least 5-6 years. It was simple in those days. You open the app and your next session was right on the front. Today, the app is a cluttered mess. 

Year after year they add more and more features. I feel that they gone with a philosophy of ‚Äúmore‚Äù rather than ‚Äúdeeper‚Äù ‚Äî quantity over quality. 

In one word, the app is overwhelming.

title: Best meditation app!!
review:
I loved this app from the start, it has helped me so much.  There is so much variety as well, so many different meditations to choose from it‚Äôs unbelievable.  I‚Äôve tried other apps and this one beats them all hands down.  The sleep meditation are awesome to, they always put me out quickly.  
No regrets choosing this app.  Try it out!

title: The perfect meditation app exists, and this it it.
review:
I‚Äôve spent a couple years testing meditation apps, this is far and away the best I‚Äôve ever used.
Many options for different types of meditation, relaxation, sleep help. If you‚Äôve been thinking about downloading and paying for this app, stop thinking and do it, you‚Äôll be happier (and more relaxed) in no time.

title: Very good
review:
Headspace has helped me develop and maintain my meditation practice, leading me to numerous benefits and I couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied.

I removed one star because there seem to be frequent layout changes that make it hard to become too familiar with the app.

One feature request I would love to see would be a Sonos integration. Competing meditation applications have it, and it would be really nice if Headspace did as well.

title: Great App!
review: Headspace has helped me tremendously with my anxiety. The animations are very enlightening and enjoyable to watch. Learning to meditate through the guided courses makes it easy to commit and learn! The night time stories are my go to every night. And The Wake Up helps me start my day on the right foot. I can‚Äôt say enough about this app! Love it! Worth every penny to pay for it.

title: Thank you from a Healthcare Provider
review: Headspace offered free meditation to healthcare providers through 2020, and I‚Äôve been really grateful! It‚Äôs helped with some of the racing thoughts and worrying as my entire routine has been turned upside down as my hospital prepares for COVID19. And it has helped me be more thankful for what I do have and for things I can control in my life. Thank you!

title: Please eliminate video....
review: ...on the home screen.  I truly love this app and the soothing animations it has.  However, the recent addition of a video on the home screen with a watch button option makes it feel like I'm being shown a commercial.  Instead of soothing illustrations and animations, I'm greeted with a jarring and annoying video.  It's not conducive to relaxing meditation at all.  Thanks for your time.

title: A pillar in my life
review: One of the single greatest things I have ever started for myself, my relationship with God, marriage, family, career and life in general. I only wish I would have started this earlier in life. Not always pretty or perfect. Sometimes you fall off the wagon and become inconsistent but it will never go away and will stay in your life forever.

title: Everyone needs this app.
review: I have no words for how much Headspace has helped me deepen my Meditation practice on all levels. It has helped me be more creative abs productive at work, sleep better, reduce body tension and pain, and simply love life and other people more. Thanks to the Headspace team for everything. You change the world by changing yourself! üíñ

title: Good stuff
review: Top-notch app. It feels like a high quality experience, with fun illustrations. The library is impressive with lots of good content. One minor gripe I have with the iPad app is that I‚Äôd love to be able to use it in landscape view. I use my iPad in landscape all the time and it‚Äôs a hassle to rotate it just for this app. Otherwise, the app is a pretty flawless experience.

title: BUY RIGHT NOW
review: Now Imma tell you this this thing WORK cause I really trying to get more energy when I go to sleep cause I always stay up all night and barely get any sleep and this help me so well I didn‚Äôt subscribe but I rather listen to the two things over and over again I prefer you get this right now before it‚Äôs too late.

title: Change my life
review: I spent a lot of money on a Mindfulness class in 2013. It was a horrible experience and I gave up on meditation. In 2018 I found Headspace and it change my life. I am able to deal with so many situations differently now. It allows me to witness my thoughts and emotions without judging them and has helped me observe instead of acting on my emotions

title: Very helpful to me
review: I love Headspace. The daily practice of meditation has made me more calm and better able to deal with whatever comes along. There is so much good content and something new every day. It is presented in a Iight hearted way that really works for me. I highly recommend the service and the app. It is making a big difference in my life.

title: Love this app so much
review: Anytime I feel anxious or overwhelmed this is my go-to to ensure I start my day off on the right foot. I am trying to make it a daily habit because I definitely notice a change for the better when I mediate even for 5 minutes. And his voice is soooo relaxing. Also love the focus playlist as background music!

title: Thankyou
review: Thankyou to Andy and all the other voices for helping me. I‚Äôve been having a lot of trouble with work and friends and it felt so amazing to clear my head for the first time in several weeks. I recommend this app to anyone feeling stressed or upset. It really does help. Thankyou once again for helping me and many other people.

title: The only app I cannot live without.
review: Andy - wow, if I could only meet you to thank you in person. During times like these - homebound and stir crazy - this has been a daily joy to rely on. It impacts every aspect of my days and evenings. As long as I always have the ability to pay the small annual fee, I will never go without Headspace.

title: Changed my life
review: I started using headspace as a way to de-stress during nursing school 3 years ago and it changed my life. Meditation helps me control my emotions and give me a sense of calm when stress is high especially in the hospital. The accessibility, ease of use, types of mediation for different situations is superb. I will continue to use headspace as my mediation app for years to come.

title: Nice way to calm yourself
review: At first I felt meditation was completely related to spiritual experience, but I just wanted to try head space because I liked there way of explaining meditation using animations. Today even when  I get lost in a busy day there gentle reminder help me to take a break for myself and listen to my body, about what it feels.

title: It‚Äôs great in MOST ways
review: The quality, thoughtfulness and guidance is stellar and I love whoever is the animation - brilliant - and truly a treasure of interests.  That said (and I bet you knew that was coming) the website design is convulsed and terribly challenging to transverse- simply finding their available catalog  requires effort that will quickly bring you out of that relaxed state-of-mind, the one  motivated you to begin a search for yet more mental refreshment.

title: Thoroughly enjoying my trial, expect to subscribe
review: My only hiccups are the fact that I must stop listening to search for my next option and the dead noise when silent, I would love the option to have background sound, if possible. Otherwise, content is incredible and extremely useful for any situation. Keep up the good work over there and thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 17585243, 'body': "Thank you for your review, we'll be sure to pass along this feedback to our team. If you have any other questions or suggestions, send us a note to help@headspace.com. ", 'modified': '2020-08-30T19:56:06Z'}

title: A Good And Relaxing App
review: If your deciding to find an app to calm yourself down from stress or anger, use headspace to clear those problems, if we could have everything free, it would be perfect, but still, it includes a good amount of things to do if you are not subscribed to their app, so just download the app, and let headspace clear your mind from anger.

title: Great app, but ...
review:
5 stars for everything. Love the app, love the sleep features. Happy to pay for it. Give everyone a raise and a weighted blanket. 

-1 star because I‚Äôd really like to be able to cast audio (to a Google Home, for example) rather than playing it through Bluetooth. Since bluetooth won‚Äôt support playing audio through multiple speakers at once.  

Any chance that‚Äôs in the works?

title: Thank you
review: Thank you Headspace, for making your incredible resources available to teachers for free. I would never be able to afford it otherwise. I use Headspace all the time with my students, who suffer from trauma and have difficult home-lives. I use it all the time for myself as well, as part of my self-care routine.

title: Great updates!!
review: Since social distancing and working from home - I really appreciate ‚Äúthe wake up.‚Äù I would normally grab my phone first thing in the morning and struggle with avoiding the spirals of distraction. Now I wake up with headspace, put my phone down after and it‚Äôs even easier for me to stay mindful about my tasks throughout the day.

title: App not worth the money for several reasons
review:
I really regret wasting $70 on the Headspace app. I‚Äôve moved on to ‚ÄúUnplug‚Äù and ‚ÄúInsight Timer‚Äù both superior in terms of functionality and content. These are my main beefs:

1) Headspace still doesn‚Äôt work in landscape mode on the iPad. It‚Äôs 2020, come on. Lots of folks have an iPad propped landscape mode next to them in bed at night. It‚Äôs very cumbersome and not conducive to relaxation or sleep to keep rotating your iPad, or your head.

2) For advanced meditators there is no way to search by time for 40 minute or longer meditations.

3) The customer support is appalling. They don‚Äôt respond during your free trial. And once you‚Äôve paid their responses are dismissive and curt, at least this was my experience when I tried to find out when the app will work in landscape mode. Both the apps I mention above DO work just great in landscape mode.

title: It‚Äôs so good!! but...
review: I love this app and it helps me fall asleep, but I don‚Äôt want to make my parents pay money every month, it‚Äôs too expensive!!! This app could help so many people!!! And I love it so much but I can‚Äôt listen to ones that will help me sleep better because they‚Äôre all locked! :( I would do anything for more too be free instead of a couple because it would be helpful for everyoneü•∫

title: This app is life changing
review: I have been using headspace for over 5 years and it has helped me through so many things like stress, anxiety, control issues, pregnancy. I sleep better, I work better, and I have a better relationship with myself and everything/everyone around me when I use headspace

title: Music uses up storage
review: I like the 1 free song included in this app and I like that you can download the song to listen to offline but just downloading 1 song uses up like 553MB of storage. I think it would have been better if they just made the song 15 or 25 minutes long and then repeat and loop the track and give the user to pick a custom sleep timer instead of making the song 8 hours long.

title: Love it
review:
I absolutely love this app and try to use it everyday. Meditation through Headspace has helped me a lot with my own mental health and I have found a new appreciation for life. 

Their support team is always top notch. I had an issue with my account and couldn‚Äôt remember the email address I used. Two of their members went above and beyond for me.

title: Great Meditations!
review: I appreciate all of the meditations that I can get to even though I don‚Äôt have a membership, but I thought that membership was free for teacher?    I can‚Äôt see what I am writing so I hope it is grammatically correct!  Let me know if there is a way for teachers to sign up for free!  Thank you for what we can get from the sotw though!

title: Amazing app, can change your life
review: I never write reviews, but this has been one of the most important apps I have ever used. Andy‚Äôs voice and explanations are clear, calming, and stress-reducing. Headspace has made what has been one of the most demanding years of my life, starting a business and raising 2 babies, one of much more inner tranquility. Thanks Andy!

title: Headspace Meditation App
review: As someone who suffers from depression and anxiety, this app has helped me form new relationships with all my emotions, thoughts, and feelings. I still have a long way to go, but the repetition, structure, and calmness that the lessons and instruction bring to my life is unparalleled. It is worth the subscription price - everything about the app is premium and beautiful, thank you!

title: Distractingly busy interface
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for over 5 years (meaning I‚Äôve invested about 500 bucks into the service). I used to LOVE it, but I‚Äôll likely be switching to something else. The app is now exceeding overcrowded with pop-ups, random blog posts and stories, etc. I just want to meditate, work through courses, and track my journey. They‚Äôve tried to stuff this app so full of features and content that they‚Äôve gotten WORSE at the core purpose of the app.

title: Free for health care providers
review: I‚Äôm a nurse practitioner and received free access to Headspace about two weeks ago because of my profession. I LOVE IT. I‚Äôve been going through the ‚Äúbasics‚Äù courses and I can‚Äôt say enough how just 5-10 minutes every morning carries peace throughout my day! Highly recommend (even if I had to pay for a subscription!)

title: Awesome app!
review: I really do love this app. I listen to it most nights, and it helps me fall asleep wonderfully.  The only thing I would change is the ability to make my own custom playlist, similar to the Sleep Radio feature, and build from the stories, sounds and music I want. But, in the meantime, I highly recommend this app!

title: Best app for my body
review: This app has helped me fall asleep after every session.I really enjoy the sessions and I like how sometimes they give you a video. It‚Äôs tells you what you need help with, for example what I chose was sleeping. I have never slept so well in my whole life before I started using the app Headspace. I really love the app so much and I hop you do too!üôÇüòä

title: Peace of mind
review: Headspace has become part of my daily routine. I look forward to hearing Andy‚Äôs voice walk me through the daily meditation. This is the single best thing that I have done for myself. I have clarity and peace. I appreciate the authenticity of Headspace. There is no such thing as perfection. Remembering there is blue sky behind the clouds has helped me greatly. Thank you Headspace!

title: Share & Search
review: I am loving the headspace app and have shared it with several family and friends who also enjoy it very much. GREAT way to start and/or end a day. It would be wonderful if I could share specific meditations or other features with my buddies... The search function doesn‚Äôt work well. That would be my only critique. Maybe in the next update!

title: Love, but now too many things
review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for more than three years (maybe four?). I love it but have been getting increasingly frustrated. Why do I have a tab for movement? I can‚Äôt even find the unguided sessions anymore. This is not an exercise app ‚Äî make a new app for that, please, or else let me customize this one.

title: My favorite sleep aid
review:
If one app can drastically change your life, this is the best investment.
I use the sleep casts to get to sleep and for someone who has racing thoughts at night, this method works wonders.
I have one piece of advice for the sleep casts and that‚Äôs to provide a variety of voices for each sleep cast rather than just one. Some of the voices aren‚Äôt as pleasing for me.

title: Thankful & Grateful
review: I had a patient tell me about this app, I am thankful to her because I use it every day.  I allowed for the reminders & I am grateful I did!  I love my morning messages!!! Sometimes they are even what I have going on in my life.  I have insomnia...so the sleep part of the app helps me sleep & helps me go back to sleep.  Thank you for all you do.

title: Download Glitch
review:
Love the app and meditations.

However it has a glitch with downloads. They take forever and often don‚Äôt download, then half the time I‚Äôve been out of service and gone to use my downloaded meditations, they‚Äôre not there. I‚Äôm of out service quite often so it‚Äôs a bit of a bummer.

title: Lifesaver app
review: I‚Äôve been using Headspace for almost two years to manage my anxiety and migraine. I recommend it to anyone who wants to try a different tool to deal with daily challenges. Please roll out some meditation sessions in Chinese because I‚Äôve been wanting to have my family try it!!

title: It‚Äôs great at first
review: While Andy is good at what he does, the meditations get repetitive and after a while you will notice it‚Äôs the same exact routine over and over and you will basically know what he will say before he says it.  To me it was not worth doing the same meditation a bazillion times over.

title: Subtle but Impactful Changes
review: I notice subtle but impactful changes. Requires commitment and discipline to actually set time aside to do it each day. I find it best to do in the morning before the kids wake up. Otherwise I attempt to get through it with them awake and sometimes my 3 year old joins me for a few minutes which melts my heart.

title: The customer service is top notch
review: My daughter was having a few issues getting the family plan to work (user error on my part, I think) and within two hours at night after emailing them it was fixed! And they were so nice. Above and beyond my expectations.

title: 5 stars! Absolutely amazing!
review: Sometimes I feel at night that I shouldn‚Äôt go to sleep and keeping using devices, I saw this app and wanted to try it out. I downloaded the app one night, and complete success! I put a rain soundscape on and I fell asleep in less then 2 minutes! Definitely recommend to Donald this fantastic app! üòÅüíï

title: 15,000 Meditation Minutes Later...
review: Changed my life. No, not the sole arbiter of life change. But definitely a critical ingredient. I have been consistently using Headspace for several years, logging over 15,200 minutes in over 1,000 sessions. Do something long enough and it changes you; I recommend letting Headspace into your life. So awesome!

title: Great meditations, need better sleep stories
review: I‚Äôm enjoying the daily meditations. They have great pace, great teachers and I love the option to choose the length of time. I wish they had better story options for sleep though. The sleep casts are ok but I prefer actual stories, not just describing a place. The incorporation of a wind down at the beginning is a great feature, however.

title: Wonderful
review: This app has a ton of potential to help with everything from sleeplessness to relationships to anxiety. Like most things worth doing it requires patience and persistence, but even if you‚Äôre thinking meditation isn‚Äôt for you, stick with this because it can be life-changing. Andy and his team are wonderful. And the sleepcasts are the best!

title: Movement and focus!
review: A lot of people don‚Äôt know that there are now workouts on headspace - they‚Äôre mellow but effective and help to do before sitting to meditate if I‚Äôm having trouble settling down. I also love the focus music on headphones for doing homework in my small apt when other people are doing noisy things. It‚Äôs like being in another room!

title: Daily gem
review: This app has become part of my daily routine. It has helped with so many aspects of my life. But, most of all has improved my mental health dramatically. I struggle with anxiety and depression, particularly depression. It has helped me fortify my mind and use joy to inoculate my mind. It‚Äôs a top to step outside of depressive thoughts and see the silly stories they tell.

title: The best meditation app
review: I love this and if you have anxiety it can help you! I love this when I get stressed I go to the ‚ÄúSOS‚Äù area and it helps me cope with the stress and also to just relax and sleep like if I have a long drive to sit through I will just turn on one of these and then it‚Äôs just a really good app, I would recommend this app to anyone and everyone!

title: Life Changing
review: This app is the best purchase I‚Äôve ever made, and continues to be year after year. Meditation has been the most useful tool I‚Äôve ever discovered for living a happier, more peaceful, less anxious life and I will forever be grateful to Headspace for introducing me to it and dispelling my false ideas about how complicated and hard it is. Thank you Headspace!

title: Focus
review: With headspace I‚Äôve been able to slow my mind down with guided meditation even to the point I would meditate on my own...and the focus part of it I love the different place from really interesting people gets me through my day I‚Äôve been able to read more I love headspace

title: Calm in chaos
review: My mom was the first to use headspace when she was going through cancer. I started headspace before this year to deal with the stressors this year has to offer. I have learned some basic skills that help calm me down and help me cope. I wish I had these before but I am thankful for headspace to help me through this difficult time.

title: Fastest I‚Äôve fallen asleep
review: I‚Äôm notorious for being awake for hours before finally falling asleep. However since downloading the app I have never heard the end of a sleep cast because I‚Äôm out within 10-15 minutes. The stories can be a little cheesy but who cares since I‚Äôm sleeping through them anyways. Totally transformed my sleep!

title: ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è I‚Äôd recommend this to anyone!
review: I think this app is amazing! It‚Äôs helped me calm down especially from tough days at school and gives me a better mindset before my gymnastics competitions. I also like how you still get to have access to a lot of the stuff without needing to pay. Thank you for this amazing experience.

title: This has changed my life!!!
review: This simple app has enabled me to let go of emotional baggage and identify my toxic traits that have been sabotaging my marriage and other relationships. I feel lighter, happier, and I‚Äôm able to witness myself living life, which then allows me to live in the moment and soak up every bit of positivity while letting the negative float on by.

title: This app CHANGED my life, FOREVER  grateful
review: I cannot put into words how grateful and happy meditation has made me, this practice has changed my life and it was all possible thanks to the headspace app, I look up to the founders and would like to thank them for making this app, they have no idea how many lives they‚Äôve changed for good.

title: Better than Calm for one reason
review: Please change the home screen to its original design if it‚Äôs not broke don‚Äôt fix it!!! It looks like Moodnotes and way too bubbly cartoony... let‚Äôs go back to clean design. Anyway still a great app and love the sleeping soundscapes. But the design choices knocked off 2 stars as we all know design correlates with ‚Äúcalmness‚Äù

title: So many options!
review: I‚Äôm enjoying the ability to improve different areas at one time with this app. Bot only meditations but a variety of movement choices, helpful topics and support for common areas if concern. The group meditation is nice, too. New to this app so I‚Äôm hoping I will be able to discover all it has to offer. Thanks!

title: Great app
review: Even if mindfulness might not be for everyone (I still recommend to give it a try), this app has a lot to offer. Lots of resources (guided meditations, timer for unguided meditations, music, videos to give a break from the urban, rushing pace... Lots of offers and constant updates. A kind, graphic environment. It is really useful and helpful.

title: Mindfulness is a must-have skill
review: This app saved my life. I am eternally thankful for having such a privileged opportunity to help myself. This application is the best one for practicing meditation and mindfulness, and I cannot emphasize its usefulness in my life. Can recommend it to anyone who wants to make an impactful change for themselves and others around them.

title: Make compatible with other apps
review: I sleep with a white noise sound on my phone with headphones and Headspace's SOS always knock me out BUT I find myself having to wake up in the middle of the night because the  meditation ended and my loud environment wakes me up. I will happily give 5 stars IF all the nighttime meditations can play while another music app can play in the background, so I don't have to constantly wake up in the middle of the night. Thank you!

title: Very relaxing
review: Life for me is especially stressful these days with COVID-19, politics, and work. These meditations are wonderful. They don‚Äôt take very long, and really help get me relaxed and in a better space. Then I can either sleep better, enjoy time with my family, or work more efficiently, depending on the situation and time of day. Highly recommended.

title: Amazing and life changing
review: Listening to Headspace has made a significant impact on my life.  The courses, wake-ups, sleepcasts, and mindful moments help me to start and end each day with a focused mind. I use the lessons throughout the day to stay more relaxed when issues arise. I have gifted it to friends and highly recommend it to anyone willing to use it wisely.

title: Amazing!!
review: I first learned about this app 2 years ago, when I first attempted to meditate. I loved the trial courses so much that I ended up getting a yearly subscription. I love that there is so much content on Headspace that I never run out of new meditations to try or new meditation courses to do. It‚Äôs amazing what setting aside 5 minutes a day to meditate can do for me!

title: Extremely effective
review: I only just started meditating mostly as a means to calm my easily stressed mind from college and I can say that every time I use it I feel a great sense of calm. It has only been a week and I am beginning to have a whole now look on life and how to approach it. This app is definitely worth the money.

title: Great for beginners but then?
review: Excellent courses to get you started. I finally learned how to meditate from this app. There is a lot of guidance as you are starting and learning for first 3 months or so. Once you get through the initial courses, there is no guidance that I can find. Just an overwhelming menu of choices. I would like recommendations on what to do after you complete the pro courses. But I will always be thankful for Andy making it click!
developerResponse: {'id': 20611923, 'body': 'Sorry about the trouble, you can always start the Pro-Level packs or start a pack that could help you work through a specific issue. If you still need some help, you can send our team a note to help@headspace.com!', 'modified': '2021-01-24T21:03:33Z'}

title: Request for a feature
review: Hello! Love love the app. I use the sleep stories to help me fall asleep by shutting up the chatter in my head. I‚Äôd love it if the loading screen + other tabs followed night mode. While the sleep stories tab is dark, it‚Äôs very jarring to meet a bright white screen while I‚Äôm trying to use something to help me sleep.

title: Helped me deal with panic attacks
review: I have an anxiety disorder and sometimes I get panic attacks out of the blue, even in the middle of the night while I‚Äôm sleeping. Using this app to meditate every morning and before I go to bed has been so helpful in increasing my mindfulness and my ability to cope with anxiety and panic attacks. It‚Äôs definitely worth the $6 a month for me!

title: Daily Practice Made Easy
review: I've been trying to incorporate meditation into my daily habit for years but could never stick to it. Headspace has made it so incredibly easy to incorporate meditation into every single day by offering so many options. The sleepcasts help me calm my racing mind. My favorite ones are the ones I can't remember!

title: Mornings?
review: I could be missing something but it appears they have removed any and all traces of morning and waking up meditations, I used the search function and all they have ‚ÄúGood morning‚Äù set for children. I‚Äôm 20, and I don‚Äôt see any waking up meditations available anywhere in the app. A little confusing considering they encourage you to meditate first thing in the morning.

title: App logged me out and won‚Äôt let me log in
review: So I‚Äôve kept headspace mainly because I‚Äôm about 14 days from 365 days of doing headspace every day. Even after updates degraded the quality of headspace I decided to keep it to achieve the 365 days streak goal. If the streak is broken due to a log in glitch then I‚Äôm obviously canceling my subscription. Was finally able to log in after multiple attempts. Why was I logged out in the first place?

title: Good app but charged $100 to renew
review: It was a wonderful app to use. I bought a one year subscription. Was never told it automatically renewed the subscription. Found out last night it is and saw a $100 charge for Apple which is more than I originally paid for a year. It took me a hot minute to figure out it was headspace. Canceled before the official renew day but can‚Äôt get a refund apparently

title: More free ones.
review: Hi! I really really love this app a lot but, there‚Äôs something I want to point out. There‚Äôs not enough free ones. I‚Äôm pretty sure there are only 2 free ones to use to help sleep. All I really needed this app for was for my sleep. I tried to find more apps that had free ones but, they also required premium or membership. I really hope they can put out more free ones. Thank you!

title: Meditation for all!
review: I genuinely can‚Äôt praise this app enough.  From guidance for beginners to daily meditations (that somehow always seem to touch on the exact area I need to work on that day) this app has it all.  Even workouts to move you, relax you, or unwind you and meditations to help you sleep.  Plus Kevin Hart motivational moments??  Come on, this app is phenomenal!!

title: Worth it!
review: I have struggled with anxiety for almost a year now, loud noises and certain people stress me out and make me a shell of my outgoing self. Through this app I am able to learn and Focus more in class and my grades and improved because of that! Yes there is a monthly fee if you want full access but in my eyes it is so very worth it!

title: A life saver.
review:
Until Headspace I was never able to successfully meditate or get the benefits. With so many helpful techniques and approaches to mindfulness, I learn something new every day and feel better. I am so grateful for the creators and their generosity. 

Thank you Headspace for helping so many of us weather this storm we are in together.

title: Helpful for sleep
review: I‚Äôve had plenty of trouble falling asleep since having my son a year ago. Since using the sleep stories for the last few weeks I‚Äôve been able to fall asleep more easily. I still wake up in the middle of the night 1-2 times but at least I‚Äôve fallen asleep within 20-30 minutes instead of 1-2 hours!!

title: The exercise app your mind needs
review: I have been using headspace for 5+ years now. Meditation every day leverages the power of compound interest. Done consistently over time will have life changing effects. It will not only benefit you but your loved ones. The one piece of my self care I never skip on is my daily headspace.

title: Awesome.
review: I love this app! It helped me view my anxiety and my issues in a different perspective. Andy is knowledgeable and talks about things you never imagined. I think paying for the subscription is worth it, I know some people complain about it because you can‚Äôt access everything for free. But I think it‚Äôs worth it.

title: WHY IS EVERYTHING LOCKED
review: I love this app, and it‚Äôs overall great. I used to have little to no complaints, but now it‚Äôs insane. I get that you need money for your business, but everything is locked. It‚Äôs expensive and very sad. I used to listen to beachcomber every night until everything was locked and you needed to pay for it. It‚Äôs fine to have some payment things, but at least leave 1/3 of them free. I don‚Äôt want to pay a lot of money just to listen to music or a sleep cast.

title: Relaxation Vacation
review: I love this app. It has tons of choices to choose from. I started with the letting go of stress course and it‚Äôs like broken up into 3 sessions with multiple session within each of these 3 sessions. I feel more relaxed than I have been in months. I tried the calm app and wasn‚Äôt satisfied but I feel like this app is the real winner! Can‚Äôt wait to do some more meditation

title: Feel better already
review: After feeling extremely anxious one day I decided to buy this app.  I used all 7 day free trial and felt extremely at ease.   I also tried the sleep stories and they are wonderful.  I have sleeping problems and typically take some type of vitamin Or drug to help me sleep but it was not needed.  Love this app

title: A new friend
review: Very helpful in trying to make meditation part of my life. I typical would seek out the free portions of meditation apps, but I purchased the annual subscription after a 2 week trial.  What I think sets this app apart is some of the content that changes day to day. I love the morning wake up.  It feels like it‚Äôs a friend I check in with daily!

title: Epilepsy brain
review: There are days where I can‚Äôt focus until my doctor recommended headspace. I‚Äôm angry, mad and frustrated at even the littlest things, but headspace has helped me tremendously. I‚Äôve had more calm days each week since I‚Äôve began using it. If you have days like this I recommend trying this app out. Thank you Headspace!

title: Thank you!
review: I saw your ad for free membership to those in healthcare. I figured why not it‚Äôs free and on my time. I never could have imagined how much I needed Headapace. Life has changed for me since Covid-19 and you help me stop the world from spinning. I can not thank you enough. I wake up with you, work with you, and I go to sleep with you.  Praise God for Headspace.

title: Better than therapy
review: This creator of this app is Genius. It‚Äôs probably the app I use the most on my phone now. I was HAPPY to pay for the premium because it is now so helpful in my day to day life with anxiety. I always wanted to try meditation but never could really stick with it, this gave me the tool to know how and to do so everyday.

title: Great but ...
review: I don‚Äôt know why this app costs. I see the value in it costing and getting what you pay for but they have some really good courses that would help me and so many other people but the Gaga is.......... you have to pay to learn how to deal with anxiety? Not really my cup of tea but the beginning parts/sessions are great. I just wann explore more.

title: Great!
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for nearly two and a half years and have LOVED it! One thing, however, is I would like to see the option for sounds while meditating‚Äî rain, waves, etc. I would also like to see an option for classes with other teachers‚Äî Sharon Salzburg, for example.

title: Awesome
review: Aloha. This app is awesome. Never knew much about meditation and how it helps with stress. Being a father and a firefighter brings on a lot of stress sometimes. This app has helped me learn meditation and it's helped me improve my over all mood and also helped me deal with some anxiety and I've been getting better sleep thank you headspace. ü§ôüèΩ

title: Amazing app!
review: This app has helped me so much through my life. Because if this app I have learned how to mediate, think and process my emotions instead of being controlled by them, and (arguably the most important part) it‚Äôs helping me be more mindful not just for myself, but for others too. I highly recommend this app.

title: I recommend this app for meditation
review: Lately I have been feeling stressed out. My parents recommended me to start mediation. I have looked for some apps for guidance for meditation and found this one. It has different sessions for mediation. It helps a lot when feeling negative or stressed. It teaches how to mediate. Overall, I think this is a good mediation app.

title: Life changing
review: Every single person needs more headspace than what they currently have in their lives. This program has changed my life in many ways for the better, and could even be recognized as something that has saved my life. Thank you to all at Headspace.

title: Changed my life
review: I love Headspace. I started using Headspace a few years ago when I did a mediation challenge. It helped me out so much that I continued to use it and have been ever since.  I have tried other mediation apps before but there‚Äôs something about this one that I prefer and always come back to.

title: Life changing
review:
Headspace is been in my life for a few years however it really changed my life in 2020.  The app helped me through a year of changes, grief and doubts.  I am now proud to say that I can‚Äôt function without it, it‚Äôs the first thing I do In the morning and the last thing I do before bed.
Thank you Headspace

title: On narrator‚Äôs names being added to Sleepcasts
review: Thank you! Some of the narrator‚Äôs voices actually help me fall asleep, but before, i‚Äôd have to guess at random which sleepcast had the same voice as the ones the helped me sleep. The addition of names under each sleepcast description has been a great tweak to an already helpful app.

title: Thank you Headspace!!!
review: I will write a better review later, when I have more time to explore the app. I just wanted to commend and thank the developers for making this free for all of us who are out of work. I am stressed beyond belief, this is just what I needed. Now every time I just see the commercial on TV, it makes me happier. Thank you!

title: Greedy
review: I used to love the app because even with the free version I got 3 sleepcasts that always helped me sleep but now only one is available and it‚Äôs not even my favorite. I seriously hate that all these apps are forcing you to pay for subscriptions that are too much. I had the subscription when I could afford it but now that I can‚Äôt y‚Äôall gotta rub salt in the wound and take away most of your free stories. And there are some stories that don‚Äôt have the locked symbol on it but aren‚Äôt actually free and are just a tease.
developerResponse: {'id': 17080593, 'body': 'We suggest checking out our other complimentary sessions: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-. Feel free to reach out to our team at help@headspace.com if you have any questions about our subscription options!', 'modified': '2020-08-04T18:08:45Z'}

title: Amazing
review: I am never one to write reviews ever but my mental health has been the best it has ever been. I honestly didn‚Äôt think I need any help but headspace has taught me that i shouldn‚Äôt wait for a mental break down to take care of my mind. Love Andy‚Äôs soothing voice and the amazing meditations and mental exercises on this app. Also love the Sleep casts. Put me right to sleep.

title: Crashing
review: Normally, I have no problem with the app. This past two weeks though I have been having some issues. When I try logging in, the app crashes. If I delete and then redownload the app, the app still crashes. If I restart my phone, the app still crashes. I can‚Äôt do anything and I have to wait and keep trying to open the app before it decides to magically do so without crashing.
developerResponse: {'id': 15174811, 'body': 'So sorry for any trouble! We did recently experience a very brief issue on May 6, but that has since been fixed. If you continue to run into any trouble with the app, please send our team a note at help@headspace.com so we can look into it for you.', 'modified': '2020-05-08T00:35:08Z'}

title: eh
review: Without getting the free trial this is ok. I wish that it would have more options for the people who don‚Äôt pay for it. I would pay but it‚Äôs hella expensive!! I used it for sleeping because I have been getting insomnia. The meditation is kinda repetitive and doesn‚Äôt help actually fall asleep. If you have money to spare then I would definitely get it but besides that....üëÄ

title: Meditate
review:
I love the product but wish the app had more features.  A bookmark feature would be nice to easily get back to the meditations I use most. Or a way to customize your home screen.

The actual meditations are wonderful. Life changing. the app does help me keep on track and find new topics of focus.

title: The app is great but.....
review: The app is very cool in a sense that it helps you relax, what i don‚Äôt like is how much is asked to pay and they only have 1 free session that only lasts 2 minutes kind of upsetting that only 1 free story is available and that‚Äôs it, it‚Äôs nice if you can pay actually pay $13 a month but some people can‚Äôt and only 1 FREE story is available, but the layout of the app and idea is cool but maybe make more stories free and add in some adds

title: It‚Äôs... okay
review: Well, the app is good, the audio is good, it helps a lot but the thing is that there is nothing to do without premium. For example, if you click sleep at the bottom of your screen, there is only one free option out of probably 25-30 options. And I get it you have to make money with the app but I think that they just went a little overboard with the premium. Other than that, really good app.

title: Will jack up prices and not let you cancel buyer beware
review:
They won‚Äôt let you cancel the subscription even if you opted out of the renewal before being charged. Reached out to their customer service 10 days ago and never heard anything. 

Not to mention they almost doubled their price without notifying me before hand. Trust me, the audio and animations are great, but their business practice borders illegal. Now my credit card company gets to fight this. 

Save yourself a lot of money and head ache and get another service.
developerResponse: {'id': 13273971, 'body': "We're so sorry for the trouble with canceling your subscription. We have been seeing higher than normal volume, but we're answering requests in the order in which we receive them. You should receive a response shortly. Thank you for your patience. ", 'modified': '2020-02-03T21:32:31Z'}

title: Headspace is part of my wellness plan for myself
review: Headspace is part of my everyday life.  I use it for going to sleeping and  meditating.  It is part of my overall well being just like a gym membership.  I feel like it is something I will use the rest of my life.  Currently my favorites are the newer sleeping tools and I like the live meditations.

title: Best Meditation App....
review:
That I have found so far. Excellent options. I especially like that you can choose a male or female voice. The Sleep Casts are AWESOME! (Loche Dormant!!) This app is fantastic for these alone!!! But adding in all the other content.....wow. This app has done it right. 
I would love to see a way to favorite items so that I can find them quickly.

title: Extremely Satisfied
review: By far my favorite mindfulness app yet. I‚Äôve tried what feels like all of the mindfulness apps over the years but keep coming back o this one. Andy‚Äôs voice and audible guidance is spot of for mindful relaxation and rewiring. The amount of course options is endless. Truly something for everyone

title: Robbery beware of fraudulent charges above the advertisements price
review:
I have been charged $140 in one day for this app. However I do not have a subscription. I just verified this by looking at my subscriptions in my account and headspace does not exist! 
The reason why? Because I canceled it at the end of my trial. Yet they are charging me for double accounts! 
Zero trust in this company. 
Avoid at all costs
Report any fraudulent charges and file complaint. I‚Äôm sick and tired of companies stealing my money. I will continue to pursue this until full restitution is made.

title: Worth it
review: Recommended, especially for teachers and high stress jobs. Continued practice has helped me to start becoming more aware of when I get distracted or to notice my feelings change in my daily life. This app, with guided meditation, visualizations, walking, and sleeping, has helped me get in touch with an inner peace even in chaotic times.

title: This app is garbage
review: I tried to see what functions this app had. Realized immediately that I needed to pay to access most of the content and deleted it after 5 minutes. I just got charged $75 for an annual subscription even though this app was on my phone for 5 minutes. This is a an awful app. I couldn‚Äôt even get back in to the app to see what was wrong, and it‚Äôs impossible to find the info on subscription charges or status of my ‚Äúsubscription‚Äù which I never agreed to.
developerResponse: {'id': 21122126, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you are having trouble managing your subscription, we recommend checking out this page: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008364988-How-do-I-cancel-my-subscription-. If you still have questions, feel free to send us a note to help@headspace.com.", 'modified': '2021-02-17T20:42:41Z'}

title: Life changing
review: Headspace changed my relationship with meditation & has been life changing in my way of being. I‚Äôve been a user of the app for 5 years & consistently meditating almost every day after a decade prior of never being able to ‚Äúget it‚Äù or stick with it. Thank you Andy & the Headspace team!

title: This app is amazing
review: This app has helped me with my anxiety and depression. It always help me stay calm whenever I feel like I‚Äôm going to have a panic attack or If I am ever having dark thoughts this app is amazing an I believe people who suffer from anxiety or depression this app will help you control it an become your normal self again with no worries.

title: Please Read developers!
review: ok i love y‚Äôall‚Äôs app it‚Äôs awesome but i know y‚Äôall want to make money but at least but a little bit more meditations because there‚Äôs only one sleepcast for me is that right? anyways y‚Äôall‚Äôs app is amazing but please take my thought into consideration because i want more meditations! thanks, hope you have a amazing rest of your day!
developerResponse: {'id': 16320933, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback, we will be sure to share this with our team. Feel free to reach out to our team at help@headspace.com if you have any questions for us!', 'modified': '2020-06-30T22:05:51Z'}

title: Taking care of yourself
review:
If you had asked me a few years ago if I would meditate I would have said no.  But through work I was able to get a subscription to Headspace and I started to meditate granted I did 3 or maximum 5 minutes but that was huge for me.  Then I got out of the habit for a few years and now I am back into the practice.  

I enjoy the 20 minutes of peaceful calm I take every day.  It is particularly important now as
my job is even more stressful than normal with responding to COVID in addition to our normal medical work.  

Give Headspace a go even if you are not into meditating you might be pleasantly surprised by the benefits you will find with a bit more headspace.

title: I found a new me
review: I recommend this app to anyone who wants to better themselves and their lives, it has so many techniques and walks you through so easily. When i started this journey i never meditated before and now when i miss a few days i feel so off its weird. Im so happy i gave it a try.

title: The Best!
review: Headspace is by far the best mindfulness meditation app out there and I have tried several. It has been live changing. There are organized options for you depending on your need. Over the last year or so additional features (I.e. movement exercises, SOS quick meditations, sleepcasts, etc) have been added as well! THANK YOU, HEADSPACE!

title: Sleep stories are so helpful but need more, please
review: I adore the sleep stories with the wind downs. They‚Äôve enabled me to stop tossing and turning for hours. However, I wish this app would add new ones... Many new ones the way Calm app does. Some of the Headspace stories are soothing to me, likely due to the British narrators. Having purchased the premium version of this app, I do expect the app do offer more

title: Charged and no access
review: They charged me a subscription fee and started me all over with the basics. Not to mention I am locked out of anything other than basics. Lag on customer support too. Disappointed for how expensive it is. Pretty basic meditations. When he says let your mind be free and to stop focusing, he continues talking about how it‚Äôs fine if thoughts pop up...would prefer he quit talking at that point.

title: Subscription issues
review: I paid for a subscription and all of the meditations were still locked. So I emailed headspace support with no answer (still waiting for an answer about two weeks since I first emailed) . I thought maybe if I just tried to buy the monthly subscription again they would unlock. It said that I couldn‚Äôt buy a month subscription because I was already subscribed. :/ I have to give it one star because of these issues which is a real bummer because this was my favorite meditation app.
developerResponse: {'id': 13297099, 'body': "We're so sorry that you experienced a delay in our response. We have been seeing higher than normal volume and doing our best to respond to inquiries in the order in which we receive them. If you have not received a reply yet, please reach back out to help@headspace.com so we can better assist. Thank you for your patience.", 'modified': '2020-02-04T23:44:22Z'}

title: Great for falling asleep!
review:
If you struggle with a hyperactive mind at night this app has great short (customizable) meditations and exercises for bedtime. 

I set my timer for 10mins and to be honest I am OUT before the meditation is over! I have been waking up feeling refreshed and without needing an alarm clock. 

Would love to see an extension (?) for laptop and Apple TV.

title: Loving the positive way to start my day!
review:
I have been using Headspace seriously for about a Month now and am loving the daily wake up. Really starts my day off well! The partnership with the Lincoln Center dancing has been awesome üëè Today I learned some Flamenco- my husband was duly impressed üíó
Thank you for creating a positive start to my day!

title: Terrific app!!
review: I don‚Äôt typically review apps but this one has really made an impact on me.  The app is easy to use and seems to reach me where I am.  They are thoughtful sessions and manageable topics.  Very easy to use!  I also like that it keeps track of use and accountability since that makes be feel even more engaged.

title: Love headspace but...
review: I use to love my morning routine where I listen to Andy‚Äôs talk on podcast and spend 30 mins of meditation on the app. But since the podcast  and some of the meditation practices switched to Eve (not that I have anything against Eve), I quit the podcast and have been unsuccessfully trying to find other programs on the app. I really like Andy and I hope he‚Äôs not trying to quit.

title: My not-so-secret superpower
review: Headspace has undoubtedly become my antidote to modern life. The app is so easy to use based on what I need in my life at any given moment, and the videos are extremely approachable to understand. I cannot speak highly enough of this platform and the power to heal and re-balance the body & mind.

title: Pretty good
review: I appreciate the small app size, play/ pause control of basic meditations from lock screen, the different recording lengths, the Sleepcasts with the audio mix control, and lo-fi music (thank you), and dark mode (love it, but an on/ off switch could be good). The price is alright, but may be a little high for some.
developerResponse: {'id': 16546241, 'body': 'Sorry for the trouble! We did experience a bit of an outage today, but that has been fixed and you should be able to access your content now.', 'modified': '2020-07-11T00:03:40Z'}

title: Calm
review: I feel so much calmer now then ever! (Especially cause I have ADHD, anxiety, and a little of depression) It really helps me walk through the steps and realize there is so much you can do with just a little meditation and time. You can learn to relax, accomplish goals, sleep better and so much more in just 15 (or less) minuets a day!!

title: Made for your benefit and not anyone elses
review: The money I spent on this app was 100% worth it. This app is incredible and I recommend it to everyone, whether you regularly deal with stressors or if your life is fairly balanced. No matter who or where you are in life currently the habits this app gives you will benefit you long term :)

title: Finally learning what mindfulness is
review: After years of owning an iPhone and numerous apps, this is the first time I feel the urge to write a review about an app! Headspace has helped me tremendously through the most difficult time of my live. I struggle with severe anxiety. Andy - I can‚Äôt thank you enough for being such an inspiration.

title: Unique and user friendly
review: I have not been very good at meditation in the past. Headspace meditations have helped me turn that around. The great 1 minute videos for tools and techniques are fun and easy to wrap my head around. The longer meditations are very relaxing and available on so many topics. Thanks, Headspace, I am hooked on your vibe! Pamela

title: Easy way to learn to meditate & grow
review: I had no idea how to mediate when I started, and this app walks you through the whole process - plus, it‚Äôs fun and informative! The daily new mediations keep the content fresh, there are so many series that relate to my life, and it‚Äôs great for my son to help him fall asleep. Bottom line - life changing!

title: Not to overreact, but life-changing app
review: Love the way it streamlines the process of meditation and makes it accessible to anyone. It does an excellent job of teaching the core skills for meditation, and teaching you how to use what you learn in your everyday life. Highly recommend for anyone looking to find some piece of mind and just be happier.

title: The best app I‚Äôve ever downloaded
review: I‚Äôm not kidding. Download this! You‚Äôll love it and you won‚Äôt regret it. I‚Äôm a student so I get it for 10$ a month. And I use it everyday sometimes twice a day. There‚Äôs thousands of meditations on here. Mindful Workouts. But my two personal favorites are the sleep casts (bedtime stories) and the wake up videos!

title: Loyal user
review: After trying to meditate on my own for many years, Headspace helped me cultivate a daily practice. I‚Äôve now used it almost every day for several years. The app has a wide selection of meditations and durations. It‚Äôs is reliable and easy to use. And I‚Äôm fortunate that my company pays for the subscription.

title: Great for meditation but the app needs some work
review: This is really great for learning to meditate. I‚Äôve gotten A LOT out of it and I couldn‚Äôt be more grateful for the peace I‚Äôve gained. The app functionality is a little underwhelming. It‚Äôs sorted, which is great. And I can search for a specific topic. But you can‚Äôt mark them for later. I wish I could just click a button to review later.

title: Great life hack
review: This app makes daily meditation possible for me. When I‚Äôm exhausted and I feel like I can‚Äôt sit still for 20 minutes on my own, this app has a way of ‚Äútricking‚Äù me into doing that very same thing. Sometimes, finding the smooth path in my life involves tricking my clever and devious brain. This app is a great life hack

title: Meditation Made Easy
review: I love how each instructor has their own unique offering in their tone of voice. But as a whole this app allows you to easy access a meditative space with a huge variety of meditation needs. From anger to a simple daily practice with variations in time as well. Thank you Headspace

title: Fabulous App
review: Quite simply - where would I be without Headspace? I‚Äôm four years into it, have done thousands of sessions and it‚Äôs been my lifeline through this current crisis. I can‚Äôt recommend it highly enough. Andy is an inspiration to us all. I say go for it.... pretty soon it will become a habit of the very best kind:).

title: Thank you so much
review: I‚Äôve only tooken 1 class and I feel great my mind is free and I feel at peace I was having troubles with my mind thinking about things I don‚Äôt want it too and then I took this class and I feel a lot better thank u so much and once I took the class I felt amazing for the rest of the day

title: Just AMAZING
review: When I first got this app I was a little skeptical but that soon changed after like 5 minutes it was amazing! Plus it helped me get to bed SO much quicker whoever developed this app thank you! If your considering getting this app a would totally get it it has helped me soo much in the past week I love it!

title: Love the daily videos
review: Headspace is a great app. I‚Äôm not especially into meditation, but I love watching the insightful and inspiring videos posted daily and listening to Rainday Antiques. I was hoping that one or two different sleepcasts could be made available on the free version, though. It‚Äôs slightly disappointing (though I LOVE listening to rainday antiques). It‚Äôs a great app other than the limited content.

title: this app is amazing.
review:
i have paid for the version to unlock everything and it was the best purchase i've ever made.
     every night i have trouble falling asleep. i used to listen to asmr but that stopped working. the sleep casts have helped me so much!! i fall asleep 10-15 minutes in. 
     i also struggle to stay asleep. i wake up every day extremely early for no good reason, the night time sos exercises send me right back to sleep. i do, however, wish there was more of them because it does get a tiny bit repetitive.
     i have not tried much of the meditation part of the app but i plan to do so soon.

title: Simply the best
review:
Of all the apps for meditation and personal time headspace is leagues ahead. The smooth voice of guided meditation helps me get through the most stressful times, even if it‚Äôs a simple 10 minute session. 

The free version offers some amazing sessions so it‚Äôs clear headspace aren‚Äôt just in it for the money, they really care.

title: A great meditation app, but too much expensive!
review: In the Headspace article thing, the creator or whatever said she was trying to keep it simple I think, well I don‚Äôt have 300 bucks just laying around... I think you should make it a free app or at least just make less of the little sound things locked. It is an amazing app!! But I just want to meditate in peace and not worry about the huge amount of money I‚Äôm paying for this.

title: Amazing!
review: I really love this app a lot! It helps me with sleep and stress and I‚Äôve been able to actually sleep through the night as an insomniac! I‚Äôm a particular fan of the ASMR options, however, there are only two. If it is possible, could you add more ASMR options? They really help me a lot and I think I can say the same for others. Other than that, amazing app! üòÅ

title: Almost a customer
review: About a week ago, I noticed that there was an option for a lifetime subscription. Went to download it today, and that option no longer exists. Was really looking forward to using this app. I wouldn‚Äôt mind paying upwards of $1k for lifetime access. Just offer it, and I‚Äôll buy it. You really missed a great opportunity. Sorry, but for now, I‚Äôll have to pass on this one.
developerResponse: {'id': 15954084, 'body': "So sorry for any inconvenience! We discontinued our Lifetime subscription in April 2020, but please feel free to reach out to our team at help@headspace.com if you're interested in our annual or monthly plans.", 'modified': '2020-06-12T23:58:33Z'}

title: Life-Saver
review: I have dealt with mild to severe anxiety over the years along with depression and insomnia and this app has been the only thing to have ever help me sleep, meditate, and survive anxiety. I use it every single day and i wouldn‚Äôt ever get rid of it. I have recommended it to my coworkers, friends, family, and my therapists to recommend to other clients.

title: It‚Äôs okay
review: Its an okay app and it kinda helps me sleep but a while ago so many things were free but now all the ones that helped me fall asleep right on the spot are now locked and you need to buy them and that‚Äôs what I don‚Äôt like about this app it‚Äôs super pricey and like I said all the good sleep sounds and others you need to pay for this app kinda just gave you great value and all the name brands are too expensive!!! üòêüò§

title: Worth It
review: I‚Äôm not kidding when I say this is the best money I‚Äôve spent in a long time! Before this I never meditated. It has truly changed me for the better. I am more present, able to focus my thoughts and control my chronic pain. Thank you so much to Andy and all the talented contributors for this wondrous gift. Love and light to you all!

title: Love the mental and physical aspect
review: I really love that you added some great workouts! Please keep that up! I‚Äôm a 26 year old healthcare professional and I would love to see more of those. I like how don‚Äôt require a lot of equipment and I really get a sweat on, especially with the ‚Äúdifficult‚Äù workouts. It would be great to see a movement video added daily or every week at least. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: My anxiety
review: When I first started Headspace I was looking for something to help me deal with my anxiety and stress. Overall this app is amazing because it organizes different categories so many ways that are very helpful and easy to understand. You should definitely get this meditation app!        ‚ù§Ô∏è     This review was by a 5th grader

title: Great Meditation, support is a headache
review: I casual used the app, which has great walk through meditations and plenty of different varieties but when it came down to dealing with support I have yet to get even an email back it‚Äôs been about two weeks now. Make sure that when you sign up you disable any type of subscription if your not committed.

title: Life changing
review: Headspace for me is life changing. Andy‚Äôs voice is so soothing and calming that even in my most anxious moments I am able to unwind and relax. So thankful for this and for the year free because this has been the most difficult year for us financially and business wise with these shutdowns in California affecting our business.

title: Best meditation app
review: I love love love Headspace. It is the best meditation out there because it has courses that build on one another, rather than having to select a one off meditation each time. It‚Äôs kept me accountable and has deepened my mindfulness practice so much. 10/10 would recommend. Has truly changed my life

title: Perfect meditation app!
review: Signed up for headspace during the pandemic and it is the best! Their sleep meditation really helps my husband to sleep. I have used some of their meditation courses and those have helped too. Lastly they‚Äôve got some white noise (like Ocean time) that helps our baby sleep as well. Win win for all of us :)

title: Extremely high quality
review: This is a very good, well-produced product. The meditations are excellent and genuinely beneficial. I had no idea there was a child section when I purchased this, but now my seven-year-old daughter and I listen to a meditation for her every night before she drifts off. It is teaching her a real life skill.

title: Grateful for Headspace
review: I‚Äôm so grateful for Headspace. My husband died in February 2020. Shortly after his death everything was shut down due to Covid-19.  I was grieving and the loneliness was unbearable.  I did the counseling course.  It helped me so much, Andy‚Äôs voice was like listening to a friend.  I‚Äôm still lonely and grieving but I‚Äôm looking forward to the future. Thank you Headspace.

title: Great But...
review: Loved using Headspace for meditation as well as a sleep aid for months. I have noticed marked improvement in my stress and anxiety levels partially due to the resources on this app. That said, it‚Äôs clear that Andy and Headspace are choosing to sell themselves out to companies that have nothing to do with meditation. Music and workouts in a meditation app? What? Stay true to yourself. Eh, I guess it‚Äôs just business.

title: An app that can change your thinking.
review:
Headspace is more than a meditation app. It uses meditation to shift your thinking to be accepting, happier, calm. It teaches about living life in a lighter more curious way. 

It gets it all done with courses that are usually 10 sessions long. Usually meditations are 10 minutes in the courses but there are also daily ones that can be as short as 3 minutes. You get to choose how long you meditate and what area you want to focus on.

If you are on the fence, try the trial, that is what I did. I liked it so much I thought it was worth to pay for it.

I hope my review helps üòä

title: Great app
review:
I love this app for many reasons. This helps me with stress and it is amazing. It‚Äôs in my routine wake up listen to this then so whatever then around lunch time I would listen to any other
one and lastly before I sleep. I probably use this app more then most apps on my phone. If you are reading this before downloading to look at the reviews I recommend to download it. Thank you for creating this wonderful app!

title: It used to be better
review: I understand that this is a thing you should be able to make money from, I have no problem with that. I remember when I first got this app though there were a lot more free things. Now I can barely do what I came here to do. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, a lot of new and a,axing courses but some that were originally free i now have to pay for and it just makes me disappointed.
