title: AWESOME GAME
review: It really did make me calm when lm sad or mad. It helped me with my feelings and emotions that l had in my mind. Took away the bad stuff and a focused mind. I always have stuff inside my mind that l want to get calm and comfy with it. Now that l used this app l always feel calm when mad or sad. So l suggest that you use this app to calm your mind and get your thoughts comfy with it.

title: Rainday Antiques
review: Right now I‚Äôm just using the free version of this app. There‚Äôs a sleep story called Rainday Antiques that talks you thru relaxation steps and then tells you a story about an antique shop. I chose a male voice. He has a slight accent and the voice is deep and soothing and I really love it. I used to just listen to white noise or the ocean. I also love it because you can hear it raining in the background.

title: Beautiful design and delivery
review: I‚Äôm new to meditation, but this app has been really helpful in getting my feet wet, and feeling comfortable with the idea that meditation is difficult sometimes. It‚Äôs been very informative, the instructors are great, and the focus seems to be on meditation through audible instruction rather than physical or visual interaction.

title: Worth every penny!
review: Fantastic, guided meditation. Simplicity at its finest. Day 5 and I feel that lifelong, transformative meditation is possible. I‚Äôve got a long way to go, but I BELIEVE it now. That I simply can become practiced and calm and happier. As an artist, I love the colors and graphics. Realism would hinder the process. Please, keep adding content, as it is precious and appreciated. Namaste.

title: Drops of love
review:
Be with myself is the best gift I can learn in my life journey. I am grateful that along the road I am finding compassion and self compassion in spaces like this. Feeling grateful for my life and for the free resources available for those who are struggling to find a way out. Thank you all who dedicates your knowledge and love through HeadSpace to the world. 
By Juliane K.

title: Good concept, horrible voices
review: The thing about this app that I really can't handle is the voices they use for the meditations and sleep casts. They are not at all soothing and many of them have this weird gargle-y scratchy tone in their voice that makes me want to scream and cry at the same time. Working for the horrible corporation of Starbucks gives me this app for free though, so I'll use it until I can't handle working for one of corporate America's demons any longer.

title: Engaging and easy to use!
review: I‚Äôm a huge fan of Headspace. I love how easy it is to get started with a new course after you‚Äôve been gone for a while. I appreciate that they keep me motivated by showing me stats such as the number of minutes I‚Äôve meditated or the number of days in a row that I‚Äôve meditated.

title: Best thing I‚Äôve ever done
review: Using this app is the one of the best things I‚Äôve ever done on this phone to help myself and those around me. This app offers many different ways to balance, become more aware, and let the body rest and recover. Unpretentious and playful, yet powerfully direct and based on ancient meditation practice.

title: Soul quenching need in covid
review: This app saved my life. As a provider working in covid, I never have time to see a therapist but these little 5 minute meditations have helped me stay healthy and sane! I am so grateful they gave it for free to health care providers, but even if I had to pay it would be worth what it has given back to me!

title: Transforming
review: This is such a perfectly set up app. Everything about it is peaceful, calm, deliberate , and organized into logical steps. I find some other meditation apps to be cluttered, chaotic, intense in graphics , etc to gain your attention. I find this to be the opposite of meditation. Headspace is a perfect ‚Äúbalance of balance‚Äù of ideas and practice. Very healing !

title: Nothing but good
review: This has been a huge shift for the positive in my daily life, and from something so simple as sitting quietly fir a short time every day. Great thoughts from Andy that definitely have helped calm my restless mind, and keep a steady focus through the day instead of feeling depleted after half of it is done.

title: A Whole New World
review: I am just beginning but I can honestly say that I have moments of peace that I was not aware of before.  I view this as a journey with many curves, the destination is a greater peace and the ability to know when I need to pull back or when I need to move one step further.

title: Great introduction to meditation
review:
I have been meditating for a while, the first app I ever use was headspace which gave me a huge introduction to meditation in a very gentle way, after that I tried a few others apps but I always coming back to headspace because of its simplicity and very warming way of meditating 
Thank you Andy and all the HEADSPACE crew!!!

title: This app is beyond worth it.
review: I‚Äôve had headspace for two years now and I couldn‚Äôt imagine life without it. It has taught me so much and helped me find so much clarity. I love the everyday wake up, the courses, and the Move section they added is a wonderful addition. Will be renewing again for next year!

title: Don‚Äôt look back
review: I love this app! Lots of courses to target issues that may be clouding your mind. I used this everyday for a short 10 minutes and found it tremendously helpful. Things that used to bother me, just roll off my back now. Download it and don‚Äôt look back!

title: 5000 Minutes Meditated
review: This app is such an incredible tool for those uninitiated to meditation. I was searching for resources on how to embark on this journey and the use of the daily guided meditations is such a good entry way to understanding what it is to sit! So many amazing guides and different focus points I can‚Äôt speak highly enough. Use it every day.

title: Life Changing
review: Everyone has something they use to decompress and relax after a long day. I‚Äôve been trying to use meditation as my decompressor and it‚Äôs been tremendously helpful. Highly recommend every try it every day for 30 days before saying meditation isn‚Äôt for you!

title: Perfect
review:
Love this App. Worth every cent.
Beggars can‚Äôt be choosers. This is a phenomenal service and I can‚Äôt believe such entitled losers think everything needs to be free to them. How? Just how? The Sleepcast voice narrators need paid...along with whoever else.

I want to make a request. Please bring Kieron (narrated Loch Dormant) back to narrate more!! Love, love, love his voice and maybe his accent!! Haha.

title: For much more than just meditation
review: The guided meditation exercises help to eep you motivated and address a lot of questions that‚Äôll come up when you begin learning. The focus music, sleepover sounds, and more keep me on this app often. It‚Äôs worth a go if you‚Äôre interested in meditation...or creating more headspace ;)

title: Life changing
review: This app/discipline can be life-changing if you allow it to be. I do now find it difficult to meditate without it (having to think about when to transition my thoughts). However, when I have it, I find it calming and instrumental in getting me to focus on the beauty of the moment.

title: Can‚Äôt Say Enough!!
review:
Andy is the Best! If you‚Äôre looking for guided meditation, this app has it all. Right now I‚Äôm on my way to my goal of the 365 challenge.  One year of daily meditation! I‚Äôm at 40+ days and already can see and feel a better me! 
This is the best app for people of all ages in all different stages of their practice üíö

title: Extremely helpful
review: I am 20 years old and was recommended this for my depression at 16 years old. I have done it every weekday since then and has completely changed the way I think. It has given me tools to handle many situations in a healthier way and I highly recommend.

title: I love it!
review: I‚Äôve been having really bad panic attacks. It felt like I could never breathe. But once I got headspace and decided to start doing it to get my mental health better. I barely started and works so well! 10/10 would recommend for anxiety, sleep deprivation, stress, etc. This app is so useful! You should download this!

title: Great variety!
review: I am re-exploring headspace after many years and am impressed with how many categories there are and how easy it is to navigate and customize what‚Äôs available. There is a lot of free content and even more available if I get the paid version, which I may do!

title: Awesome! üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº
review: I love this app. I struggle with insomnia, anxiety and depressive tendencies, and as a almost 13 year old girl, it‚Äôs really hard. My insomnia gets worse and so does my tendencies, and since getting this app, I feel like I‚Äôm getting better ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π And that thought just really comforts me. Thank you, Headspace, for making this app a reality. üëèüèº

title: Headspace changed my life
review: Mindfulness and meditation are scientifically proven practices to manage struggles with mental health. I was first introduced to these things by a therapist as a tool to address my chronic anxiety and depression. Since then, my ability to cope has only gotten better. Thanks to Headspace I have an easy, approachable way to find deeper joy in life.

title: Sad about the changes
review: The Wake Up used to be the highlight of my morning. I started watching the peaceful videos combined with breathing exercises and short meditations during quarantine in spring ‚Äò20. They started by removing the meditations, then only showed the peaceful videos once a week, and now it seems they‚Äôve removed the breathing exercises. I will really miss the old Wake Up. üò¢ I also wish more of your content had captions for the Deaf/HH folks.

title: Significant contribution to my mental well-being
review: The skills cultivated with the guidance of this app and the mental fitness that result from persistent practice of the exercises it provides are greatly valuable to me. The app and the instruction it provides are accessible and easy to use. It‚Äôs a great tool if you‚Äôre looking to lower the barrier of entry into a meaningful meditation practice.

title: Need to be able to make playlists for sleep casts
review: I got headspace for the sleepcasts. They‚Äôre really good. My problem is that I can‚Äôt make a playlist to listen to all night. Even though I fall asleep listening to one I end up waking up and having to turn another one on. It breaks up my sleep a lot. There is a competing app that lets you make playlists but I prefer the headspace playlists. Please change this!

title: Love it but slightly minor detail...
review: I actually love the app, the variety of mediations and actually workouts (!) is fascinating. I‚Äôm just asking for correcting a problem for iOS (specifically for iPhone 6x). The menu at the bottom is a little cut and it‚Äôs hard to see what the icon is. Can you please fix this?

title: Way too many notifications
review: If you do not have a paid subscription, the app sends you more than 2-3 notifications a day (not counting the meditation reminder you can enable or disable) that I could not figure out how to stop. For an app that is supposed to help people be less anxious, mindful, and calm, this achieves quite the opposite. I get enough notifications from other things already, so the last thing I need is a meditation app causing me more anxiety. I will stick to using Calm instead.

title: Best guided meditation ever!
review: Many mornings I don‚Äôt feel inspired to meditate but I put on a Headspace meditation and immediately feel a change come over me. It‚Äôs a sea change and total game-changer of an app...It‚Äôs gotten me through the Corona Virus and the anxiety of the civil unrest in my city after the death of George Floyd.  I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôd do without Headspace. :-)

title: It works!
review: Headspace allows you to center yourself and think about the moment. In these troubling times, it is a way to calm down and think about yourself. And if you‚Äôve never meditated before, don‚Äôt worry, because headspace has free beginner courses. I use it without a subscription, and I am very pleased.

title: Great for falling asleep
review: It‚Äôs an awesome app but I wish there was more things I could do with out buying the full version of the app I‚Äôm not going to spend money every month when there are other apps out there that are free but I really love that you say that it isn‚Äôt to clear the mind it is to recognize the thoughts going through the mind

title: Great medicine for difficult times
review: I was surprised to see how much headspace made available for free during this time.  headspace has made a big difference in how I am coping personally and professionally.  I look forward to subscribing to this awesome tool and supporting this company as soon as possible.  This is the best app for meditation!

title: Best investment I‚Äôve ever spent on myself!
review: Meditation came into my life during a trying time, and while I struggle with being consistent about my practice. I do find a lot of benefit from it and hope that everyone gives it a chance to find that clarity and peace we are all looking for in life.

title: Nothing calms the mind like getting robbed.
review:
I immediately cancelled my subscription in the app after downloading it for the free month promo. The app asked me to sleep on it (cute) and said it was sorry to see me go. I found out however, if you don‚Äôt go into your apple subscriptions and cancel it also, you will still be charged monthly.
Just found out I‚Äôve been paying for this for months without knowing it. Seems like a sneaky thing to do for an app that‚Äôs all about mental health.

title: Just wonderful
review: Headspace is helping me create my meditation routine and stick to it. There are so many different meditations to choose from and new ones everyday. I am in a completely different space after a year of near daily use. So easy to us and customizable to any routine

title: Kept me Alive
review:
I never write app reviews, but I had to for Headspace.  It was an app my therapist suggested to me when I had no idea where to start.  It makes meditation simple, calm, and easy for someone like me who stresses out about doing even meditation correctly.

I love how many options there are of different states if mind that they can help talk you through rebalancing yourself.

I have recommended this app to every friend who mentions how they want to get started in meditating.  I would have given up if I didn‚Äôt have such a simple and colorful guide like this.

Even the design of the app is so calming.  I love it.

title: Fabulous design
review: I really love the recent changes including the Today design/experience and dark background! There may be a couple bugs in setting up the meditation and bedtime reminders from the dark mode switch. But the design journey is delightfully comforting overall.

title: Something for everyone/thing
review:
Love love love headspace! 
You can target various issues you want to work on and I use it so often when I can‚Äôt sleep at night. They have a great menu of can‚Äôt sleep options. The wake Up is also awesome. Thanks for helping me be more mindful and healthy everyday! e!

title: Great app!
review:
2 enhancements would make this the best app!
1.  If you can setup back to back sleepcasts.  Sometimes one just isn‚Äôt enough and you have to unlock your phone when you‚Äôre half asleep; or setup repeat as an option 
2. It would be nice to start with a sleep cast followed by all night of sleepy music.  It‚Äôs either one or the other.

title: Needs more free content!
review: I love this app. I use it for sleeping and it really helps! There aren't any bugs, and the sleep casts and sleep music are amazing! It's just that a lot of headspace requires plus to use and I think there should be at least 3-4 free meditations, sleep-casts, etc. But other than this, the app is great! I recommend it to anyone who's looking for a sleeping and meditating app!

title: Pretty Good, but...
review:
Ok, I‚Äôll say! Headspace is a pretty good relaxation app. It‚Äôs calming, and does help you relax. But 99% of the app requires in-app purchases. I don‚Äôt like that. I got the app last month and deleted it today. I want to listen to sleep time music, I have to pay. I want to take a calming class, I have to pay. Overall, very relaxing. 

I don‚Äôt like that you have to pay for 99% of the app though. That‚Äôs not very nice. 

Please fix that.

title: Life Enhancing  App!
review:
After a year of membership I find this App to be my favorite. There are a number of options to experience and my sleep patterns have improved!
Take a chance to improve your health and mental wellbeing especially in this time of reflection and difficult times.

title: Meditation for the busy mind
review: I have tried many different meditation apps and have found that I benefit the most from heavily guided meditation. If there is much silence, my mind wanders. Andy does a great job with the different cues and exercises to keep my mind from wandering too far away from the meditation practice itself

title: Nice if you‚Äôre into these kinds of things
review: If work didn‚Äôt pay for this I can‚Äôt say I would use it. The price is stupid expensive and honestly I have terrific health and mental coverage so this seems unnecessary. I will continue to use it until it‚Äôs not free because why not. Self help is nice I guess.

title: Amazing app I feel so relaxed
review:
‚Äú I feel the best I felt all day‚Äù said my Uncle. ‚ÄúThis is amazing!‚Äù Said my Aunt. I did this for a year and introduced it to my family. They had so much stress and I wanted to help. I introduced Headspace and they loved it. My recommendation/rate is this app helps you with stress, problems with sleeping, etc. Please use this app. 

-Ryan E.

title: I use it everyday
review: Headspace has been a part of my life for three years now. I use not only the meditations and sleep casts nearly every day, but my children also love the sleep casts, they really help them to wind down from the day. It is a resource that seems to grow all the time and I love it.

title: Headspace
review: This is a perfect introduction to meditation in an easy to follow format. The experience using it is clear and simple. I‚Äôm finding my own headspace again and doing some much needed ‚Äúhousekeeping‚Äù! Thank you Andy snd team for your generosity in sharing your life experience with all of us who need the gift of meditation! üíó

title: Very helpful
review: I am grateful for this app and all of the tools and skills it is adding to my mindfulness practice. I‚Äôm not new to meditation and mindfulness training but I will always have my ‚Äòbeginners mind‚Äô and appreciate opportunities to learn different techniques from different teachers as I journey. Thank you developers and thank you Andy :) Namaste ~ Di

title: very helpful for staying consistent
review: i dabble in and out of meditation like i do with many good habits because its hard to know the best routine to create for yourself. this app makes it so easy by giving you the structure, and also gives you plenty of self exploration options which I love!

title: What an app
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few months now. Let‚Äôs put some perspective here. I don‚Äôt write reviews. But this app is good I advocate for it whenever I can. My anxiety and depression levels have dramatically changed for the better. Thanks headspace. Your team has made my life one I love living.

title: Wow
review: This app i thought was only for sleep meditations and it made me feel limited on what I could or could not meditate on, but then I started trying other meditations and had some that were better than others. Anyway point is with Andy as my guide and others there for me too I feel perfectly satisfied and mainly, positive and calm. ‚ÄúWow headspace!‚Äù

title: Life Changer
review: Meditation has changed my life! It‚Äôs been almost five years since I joined Headspace after seeing an article in Parade Magazine. My blood pressure has dropped significantly and I find I feel less stressed! I look forward to the time I set aside each morning and l know it sets the tone for my day.

title: Headspace
review: I got this app a couple of years ago. It has truly been a life shift for me and helped me in so many areas. I use in mostly in mornings and night. My 6 year old son also uses at times. The sleep section is truly magnificent. Such a blessing to have Andy‚Äôs guidance. I‚Äôm so happy he didn‚Äôt stay a monk !!!! üòÇüòÇüòÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Amazing
review: The quality of this application is beyond anything I have ever tried. It is remarkable the amount of thought and work put into this app. This will definitely help me when I am not feeling all that great and already has. Definitely would recommend.

title: Live this app for meditation
review: Had never done meditation before and my work originally had purchased subscription for us.  Now love my 15 minutes of mediation every morning and use the kids section to help my kids settle down and fall asleep.  Highly recommend.

title: Meditation with accountability
review: I have been meditating for over a year now without Headspace. However, Headspace has strengthened my practice because of the way the app holds me accountable. I feel that the layout and the way it tracks progress is not only pleasing to the eye, but also quite motivating.

title: Best Meditation app around
review:
Not only do I think this app should be required. Every ounce compassion they have showed during the covid-19 pandemic is beautiful. I also just love the fact that they bridge the science based fact that mediation works and the metaphysical stereotype of mediation. 

Make this as much a part of your routine as showering !

title: Headspace is a delight.
review: Im a combat veteran with PTSD and ADHD, so my head is a bit of a basket case. Headspace, in conjunction with my therapy, has been wonderfully helpful in taming my racing thoughts so I can enjoy my life again. If you‚Äôre on the fence, give the trial a shot and stick to it. You‚Äôll know pretty early on if it‚Äôs for you or not. Regardless, good luck on your journey.

title: I Love Everything About This App
review:
From the variety of meditation experiences and courses to the focus music and daily offerings to the sleepcasts.- this is the whole package! The best thing is the beautiful energy that comes through in every aspect. You know this group, the creators if this app and content truly care. 
.

title: Best meditation app
review: I have tried a couple of meditation apps, but headspace of by far my favorite. Simple, clear, fun and engaging it‚Äôs such an important tool. I have all my clients get headspace, because it‚Äôs such an important part of their practice. Change your thinking and you can change your life.

title: Empty Mind
review: i‚Äôve recently started using this app again with its new features and i am amazed by it. it truly has helped me relax and refocus my mind. i cant sleep without it ! although, i do wish not everything on there you had to buy the subscription

title: Awesome App
review: I definitely recommend this app it has helped me sleep and meditate, 3 different voices you can listen too and hundreds of sessions that really do help. I use headspace whenever I can! I mean it really has been proven that meditation  once a day is super super healthy headspace helps so much and is really relaxing

title: Don‚Äôt wanna pay
review: Whenever I downloaded Headspace, I thought it would be free and I honestly think it should be free. I know you guys want to make money off of it, but it‚Äôs a app for meditation. I know it probably isn‚Äôt ideal, but I would rather do one payment of $5-$15 than 70 dollars a year or 13 dollars every month. Sure there might be a 7-day free trial, but I don‚Äôt think it really matters. Thinking about this problem makes me have even more frustration and it is now hard for me to meditate thinking about how I can‚Äôt finish.

title: It‚Äôs NOT just meditation.
review: This is so much more than a meditation app.  There are so many resources for healthy living including exercise, mindful eating and just great information on al those emotions that daily get our way.  As a psychologist, I can hear the lessons are well rooted in sound research.  I highly recommend.

title: Love the new layout!
review: I‚Äôve loved Headspace for awhile now, but I love the new layout even more. It‚Äôs nice to open the app and not really have to ‚Äúthink‚Äù about which meditation to do; I have a layout of my day and options. I can already tell it will make me more likely to meditate. Please keep this layout!

title: A good place to start
review: Headspace was a great place for me to begin my meditation practice. It is simple, easy to use as an app and will help the user begin their practice. I‚Äôve been using it in my practice for five years. For those who want to go deeper than calming the mind, into broadening our experience of consciousness, eventually you‚Äôll have to look elsewhere.

title: Great app for beginners
review:
Have used the Headspace app for a year and a half and I feel its a fantastic app for beginners. It has a very progressive slope which can help one ramp up their meditation practice.
The only con I feel is it does not incentivize the user to meditate regularly, which could help the user be more regular with their practice.

title: Please
review: I use headspace because I had it a long time ago to help me sleep because I have problems with sleeping but the thing is that I need to pay for it and I can only listen to two of the sleep things over and over and they get boring so please but more sleep meditate podcast for free not all of the but like the indigo gallery and the Landry mat one

title: Grateful for this app
review: I never knew how to go about starting meditation. The commercials drew me in, but the simple approach and encouragement to just be consistent, even if only for a few minutes a day, is what has gotten me through these rough times. It‚Äôs become a habit (I actually enjoy) like brushing my teeth.

title: For the developers
review: So i looove this app and (almost) everything about it it is able to put me to sleep when normally i have trouble, BUT, unless you pay real money (i have very little) you only get like two/three things! Granted, the things that do come with it are really good. (especially rain day antiques) so, a summery, i personally think at LEAST 3 times as many things should be free!

title: Disappointed
review: I had been enjoying several meditations that were available to me free of charge. They were very helpful to me. I updated my app and all the free ones were no longer available. I have to pay to get them back. Am I missing something? I thought the purpose of these was to help us with our anxiety, but this is causing me stress. I have to go looking for another app. I really liked what I was using and would have considered upgrading at some point.
developerResponse: {'id': 17981104, 'body': "We recently updated the courses available as part of our complimentary sessions!  Here's what's included in the free trial: https://help.headspace.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008192928-What-s-included-for-free-", 'modified': '2020-09-21T00:19:20Z'}

title: Great Way to Start My Day
review: I‚Äôve been doing short morning meditation everyday & love incorporating this into my routine to start my day in a mindful & peaceful way. PS I wish it was a little cheaper & I believe the prices went up a tad during this pandemic when people need it more than ever, but just an observation.

title: Pretty great to start meditation
review: I love the app and it is very helpful to start learning to meditate. I do have a complaint however, I would like for more of the basics to be free not just basics #1 so after you are done with those you can continue to meditate more and get a feel for the app before you decide if you want to buy headspace plus.

title: Meh
review: I think Headspace is a GREAT app but most of the meditations or courses are not free and I want to be able to meditate without having to worry that the meditation I‚Äôm doing is the last one I can do without having to pay but overall it is a good app with good meditation just please make less things Headspace Plus and more free stuff because I am considering deleting the app if I can‚Äôt do it for free

title: In it just for the money
review: Buyer beware- no refunds! They don't care about helping you. They only care about helping themselves to your money. Just another profit making scheme under the guise of "I want to help people." As long as you know their motivations are NOT about your happiness, love, and wagging puppy tails but instead all about getting your money, go ahead and pay for this product that is inferior to the FREE stuff you can find elsewhere. This is just a bunch of repeated blathering spliced together in different orders.

title: Worth every dollar
review: I saw headspace on ads for years but never got it because I thought I knew how to meditate so I didn‚Äôt think it was worth paying for it , but once I gave it a shot it‚Äôs a real game changer I‚Äôve been using it everyday to help me stay focused and calm throughout the day.

title: Headspace
review: Headspace has definitely helped me. From helping me to fall asleep at night and helping me to keep my calm to waking up. Headspace reminded me it‚Äôs okay for your mind to wander off, but in the end it will always come back, and mind, body, and speech, are one again. Headspace is a lifesaver, and I‚Äôd be lost without having headspace.

title: Don‚Äôt trust the free trial button
review: I hit the ‚Äútry free‚Äù button and was immediately charged for the full year. I guess it‚Äôs because I signed up for a free trial in the past that I had forgotten about? I assumed (reasonably I think) that if I was ineligible for a free trial, the app would have told me that and wouldn‚Äôt have repeatedly advertised one to me. Like I said, the button I pressed literally said ‚ÄúTry Free.‚Äù Pretty bad start to a business relationship for an app to explicitly tell me I‚Äôm not going to be charged and then to immediately charge me $70.

title: Game changer
review: Headspace truly changed the way I think about meditation - therefore, has changed my life. It made a practice that I was struggling to get into easier. I was actually was able to sit in a non-judgements space with myself and WANT to meditate everyday. I recommend headspace to all my fitness clients.

title: Great app if you don‚Äôt need customer support
review: Had a free trial and loved it. For a new iPhone 11 and couldn‚Äôt log in. Couldn‚Äôt reset password. Didn‚Äôt recognize my account, but charged me for the yearly membership. Logged several help desk messages trying to get it to restore and low and behold, double charged my Apple account but still would let me log in! Ended up disputing with my credit card company and going with another app. Too bad but who has the time for this?!! No thanks!
developerResponse: {'id': 22727258, 'body': 'Sorry to hear you were having trouble with your subscription. We apologize for the delay in getting back to your message but are still happy to assist if you need to get in touch with our team at help@headspace.com.', 'modified': '2021-05-10T18:23:09Z'}

title: It‚Äôs the Best!
review: My wife and I have been practicing meditation for over 365 continuous days using the app. Andy does a wonderful job of explaining and guiding. I recommend Headspace to anyone who is beginning a meditation practice and also to those who have been meditating for some time. All the feedback is really positive!

title: Amazing meditation app
review: I started using Headspace during the pandemic. I had been using the Calm app but found too much guidance for my liking although I did enjoy and used it daily for many months. I find I prefer the amount of guidance found on Headspace and Andy has a nice voice. Thank you Headspace!!

title: Great app. Needs planning/save feature.
review:
I love this app. The meditations are great. The sleep casts are wonderful. It really has added pieces of knowledge that have benefited my life. 
Suggestion: I would like a way to bookmark meditations or workouts. Would be above and beyond if I could sync it with my google calendar to set a specific meditation or workout for a day and time.

title: Great so far but more female voice
review:
So far this app is pretty great. I put it on in the mornings and sometimes during breaks at work. I like the different topics and variety like focus-based and morning meditations. I would just like to see all the meditations offer the female voice option. I don‚Äôt particularly vibe with the male voice on there. 
Overall, great app!

title: Only one problem
review: Ok, For starters, Thos app is a‚Ä¢w‚Ä¢e‚Ä¢s‚Ä¢o‚Ä¢m‚Ä¢e, I use it every night to help me sleep, all though, I don‚Äôt like how so many sleep exercises are locked, Because I mean, I don‚Äôt wanna pay for it, I just wanna calm down, So please unlock way more, I only use one exercise, which is Rain Day antiques, And I love it 100% for the voice actor, He‚Äôs so calming, Anyways, Enjoy your night/day

title: Amazingly wonderful!
review: I‚Äôve never tried meditation before, but I‚Äôm oh so glad that I did, especially with this app!  Everything from the gentle narration to the interesting information is top-notch and relaxing. I would highly recommend Headspcae to anyone at all interested in meditation!

title: It‚Äôs alright
review: This app is good, but with covid-19 still spreading, you would think that these people would have made everything in this app free so that people can stay sane. I went in here to get some help mentally and I thought that everything would be free and then when I saw that it wasn‚Äôt, I said SHAME ON YOU! Why would you not make everything free. Forget the money, help people. Make a difference.

title: Can‚Äôt use the app without paying.
review: So, my therapist told me that I should get this app. The reviews say that this costs no money but I can‚Äôt use any of the features for stress and anxiety. It says that they‚Äôre ‚Äúlocked‚Äù I thought maybe it was because I hadn‚Äôt finished all the meditations but when they were all completed I clicked on the ‚Äúlocked‚Äù meditation and it offered the ‚Äúfree trial.‚Äù I can basically only do three meditations out of the whole library and have to pay for everything else. This is stupid.

title: This is perfect
review: This helps so much because school is always so stressful because so many assignments about things I didn‚Äôt even learn yet. Because of this I was able to throw my stress in the trash and be able to do more things without being stressed.

title: Wonderful app
review:
I have been using headspace for more than 8 years now. Great investment especially they keep updating the app with different modules/ courses which fits everyone. 

The app helps a lot in normal daily meditation or during difficult times. Love love love

title: A beginner meditates..
review:
My first few meditation sessions went well... except for intrusive thoughts of ‚Äúthis isn‚Äôt my idea of being productive!‚Äù
And ironically I begin to understand *that‚Äôs* the point: remove yourself from the ‚Äòproductive‚Äô world; move yourself mentally and physically inward, away from involvement with the outside world. Say ‚Äòhello‚Äô to yourself, ‚Äúhow are ya‚Äô doing in there?‚Äù
And listen for the answer.

title: Love this app!
review: I have subscribed to the family plan, I have used this off and on for the last couple years and it has really helped me during my most stressful moments. The body AND the mind need excersize and rest. I encourage you to give this a try. Remember, there is a blue sky above the clouds!

title: Hope there are more female voice courses
review:
I love the app but I hope there will be option of female voice when it comes to some courses

It is frustrating that it automatically logged out several days ago, and when I tried to log back in, the options of the app are all locked even though I have the subscription üò≠üò≠üò≠
developerResponse: {'id': 19528214, 'body': 'Sounds like you may be logged into a duplicate account, sorry about the trouble. Please get in touch with team at help@headspace.com so we can assist you with this. ', 'modified': '2020-12-03T23:54:59Z'}

title: Incredible
review: I truly stand by this app. I‚Äôve struggled with anxiety, sleep issues, etc and whenever I‚Äôve felt overwhelmed, or even felt content I‚Äôve used this app. It helps! I really appreciate how they‚Äôve made certain collections free during the pandemic and election.

title: I have bad anxiety
review: This app really helps me I have very bad anxiety, I‚Äôm at the beach right now and I feel homesick and I‚Äôm also sick with a stomach bug! But until my dad started yelling at me for not being part of the family I was enjoying a corse on managing anxiety! It realy helps 10/10 do recommend!

title: Some room to grow!
review: I think this app is great but there should be a feature of saved/favorited exercises so one can quickly access frequently used items! Otherwise, Headspace has really changed my morning and evening routines (and life between those) even in a few short weeks!

title: Great for anxiety
review: I have a terrible time trying to relax. I constantly have to be doing something. This app was the first thing to help me just settle down for 3-5-10 min. This app has helped me with my anxiety, depression, sleep issues. I truly recommend this app to everyone. Issues or not.

title: Great App to Learn Meditation!
review: I wanted to learn more about meditation, but didn‚Äôt know where to begin. This app is a great place to start. I am working through the beginners course, which makes it easy to start forming a daily habit. I have noticed a huge difference in just a few days!

title: I wish you could stack
review: I love this app but I wish you could stack / make a playlist. For example, I like to listen to a 5 or 10 minute wind down before listening to a sleep cast. It would be nice to have a playlist to just hit play and be guided off to sleep.

title: Love the app! Where can I give feedback with new content requests?
review: This app has been super helpful! I‚Äôd love if there was more content supporting the working mom. How to balance work stress and kids, and meditations to help relax from work stress while pumping, and other issues working moms struggle with.

title: Lots of Content
review: I was surprised to see how much content is on here. There‚Äôs sessions for everything from stress management to working out to sleep. It‚Äôs easy to get in a few minutes every day to get yourself grounded. I enjoy the sleepcasts. I turn one on and I‚Äôm out in minutes.

title: Less anxiety
review: Since I started using this app a week ago, my anxiety levels are lower and I feel more in control. I highly recommend this app. It‚Äôs great for mindfulness and it has enough free stuff, you don‚Äôt have to pay for it unless you want to.

title: Love this App!
review: I am so grateful to the headspace team for creating this app. I feel lucky to have found it because it has helped me find clarity in my life like nothing else has. I highly recommend this mediation app to anyone looking to start their practice or find more consistency‚Äô.

title: Always there
review: As we go through life, we learn it contains intermittent chaos. But through the ups and downs, the gains and losses, I can always turn to Headspace as a stable, loving, caring practice. I love the variety and the wisdom, and the knowledge that other people are engaged in this practice, gives me hope for the world.

title: Great with minor annoyances
review: The sleep meditation is great but when you play the audio, the screen is bright white and blinding. Not relaxing when trying to get to sleep or especially annoying when trying to get back to sleep. Would be great if it could be dark like some of the sleep casts or sleep soundscapes.

title: Transformative
review: I've been using Headspace nearly 4 years and it has secured the habit of daily meditation into my life (after numerous previous attempts). Among the many things that I love about Headspace, I've noticed that it makes me feel like I'm not meditating alone. Hurray for Andy and his team. Thank you!!!!!!!!

title: Anxiety Level One & Two
review:
The meditation and  information that Andy shares with me is making  a big difference in my emotional life and in turn for those I live and interact with ...especially with my husband. We have never been happier or kinder to each other.
Thanks you!
Maripat Monterubio

title: Life Changing
review: I have been using this app for like three days now . It has brought so much peace to my life . I sleep better when I listen to it and I usually have a hard time getting to sleep . I deal with anxiety and this app has me on the way to effectively managing it .

title: It made me anxious
review:
This is how anxious I am that when I noticed the ‚Äúmanaging anxiety‚Äù course was free, but expired soon, I tried to cram as much of the 30-day session in a couple days. I am that broke, thanks to covid, that the thought of not having time to do the course before they lock it up again, stressed me out. I had to uninstall it. 

It‚Äôs great, just not for me at the moment because I cannot afford it.

title: It‚Äôs there when I need it.
review: This app is straightforward; it is relatable; it presents meditation in a helpful, real world way. Having this app at my disposal has given me a chance to focus and reflect on my time. I have even been able to introduce my 6 year old to the benefits of meditation.

title: Soothing Voice & Relatable Messages
review: I‚Äôve been with Headspace for three years now and feel like I have my own relationship with the teacher. He is very calm, kind, relatable, and even funny at times! I love the app and that they‚Äôve introduced a female voice for the sessions as well; she is just as great. (:

title: Hands down best app you can download
review: I have the deepest gratitude for Headspace and the people who have worked so hard to create something so beautiful, accesible, simple, and life-changing. The way this app is designed should win an award or something. Thank you so much Headspace. I am forever grateful.

title: Amazing
review: This app has honestly helped me so much when it‚Äôs either trying to fall asleep or trying to deal with stress and sadness. This app can tailor to whatever you may need in your life and highly recommend it, even though it is a little pricy, it still pays off.

title: Love the information but wish the introduction was different
review: So when you first open the app you feel as though you HAVE to pay or subscribe to get to the next screen. Thankfully I figured out how to exit out of the screen to sign up for my account first, but I feel as though this interface or setup is very misleading just to get more people to subscribe.

title: NOT FREE BY ANY MEANS
review:
The only way you can even find out that they make you pay monthly for this crap is too first give them personal information like first and last name and email. 

Once you have given them that, they force you to put in your credit card numbers and start a automatic payment. 

These people are leeches and know nothing of mindfulness if they have to ask you for your money and personal information before anything else. Not today and not never, good try.

title: Life changing
review: I came into this an angry person but through this app I was better able to uncover and see this anger and be able to let it pass naturally instead of letting it bog me down. It‚Äôs super easy to get into and genuinely walks you through it.

title: Easy to stick with
review: This is the only app I pay for and the only app I have every reviewed. Andy is a great teacher and the packs provide nice variety and choice. 10 minutes today can make an enormous change as to how you walk through life.

title: Amazing first experience
review: I never rate apps, but in a particularly difficult time of life, I tried my first meditation and I had an almost spiritual experience with one of the meditations. I felt empowered and free and lifted out of my burdens. I‚Äôm sold. I subscribed immediately. I can‚Äôt wait to meditate every day in the future.

title: Super helpful
review: I have depression, anxiety, OCD and a terrible time getting to sleep. Headspace helps me out with all of those. I‚Äôve been using Headspace for a couple of years now and I especially like their Sleepcasts. I also really like the Move category for a quick morning yoga routine.

title: Love these meditations and lessons
review: Headspace has helped me in so many ways, through many times in my life where I felt it was hard to keep my nervous system calm and my head straight. The tools they teach are easily applicable to everyday life. I‚Äôm very grateful for this app and the guided meditations.

title: Mental Health
review: Before I didn‚Äôt realize how beneficial meditation was to my life before I started using this app. I first watched the documentary and learned about how to meditate. And then this app presented itself and I took of with it. Very useful for those looking for different ways to benefit themselves mentally and emotionally!!

title: Always good
review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for years. It‚Äôs only gotten better. The meditations are so accessible and easy to follow. I meditated for years before starting headspace, and sometimes still on my own, but I‚Äôll continue to use the app for as long as I can!

title: Headspace Is a Lifesaver
review: Headspace has allowed me to start my day off and end my day on the right note, getting in touch with myself and enjoying my own company. It has allowed me to relax when other methods have failed, as well as ease any anxiety I have in a healthy and natural way

title: Calm in the middle of my storm!
review: I can definitely feel the difference when I am not able to mediate.  The soundscape recordings to help with sleep and the daily course meditation selections are spot on with specific challenges I‚Äôve been working through.

title: Grateful
review: I have struggled with anxiety most of my life. Headspace has helped me to develop more peace and calmness in my daily life. It is so easy to use and my life has been better with it than without out. Thank you Andy and headspace for a wonderful tool to improve my daily appreciation for life.

title: Headspace Fan
review: Headspace is a daily fixture in my life. The meditation has helped me get through the passing of my parents and supported my current successful relationship with anxiety.  The focus playlists keep me in the zone. The morning Wake up is how I like to stat my day and sleep music ends my day. Thank you Headspaceüåª

title: Do it
review:
I‚Äôve been doing yoga and meditations for 20 years before my husband mention this app. I love it. All the programs they have are useful during many stages and situations of our lives. It brought my meditation practice to another level. 
Try it. You won‚Äôt retreat it.

title: Missing the old interface
review: I love Headspace and have used it for years. However, I‚Äôm not loving the redesign. I really appreciated the simplicity of the previous interface and the softer colors. I use the app to manage stress and the new interface feels a little more overwhelming and difficult to navigate, which kinda stresses me out lol.

title: Good but $$$ for what it is
review:
While the app is useful, it really is overpriced for what is essential repetitive instructions to focus on your breath and be present and non judge mental to the happenings during this time.

This would be well worth a $30 initial cost but paying over $1000 for it, based on continued use for 10 years (I mean I have had 12 years of iPhones) is really crazy and a cash grab.

title: I love the sleepcasts
review: I splurged on the yearly access as a Christmas gift to myself, and now I can‚Äôt live without the sleepcasts. They‚Äôre slightly different each time and so soothing- I‚Äôm usually fast asleep before it‚Äôs over. My favorite is the Indigo Gallery. I wish the guy narrating that one would do more!

title: Amazing!
review: This app is amazing! I have sleep trauma type stuff and I listen to the sleepcasts and sleep things and I can now fall asleep much easier while listening to them! I really hope more sleepcasts are released and the wind downs really help! This app is definitely worth paying for! I love it!!!

title: First responder
review: Great company! The app is very user friendly and helpful. I‚Äôve been trying to hone my meditation skills for a while and this has helped more than anything else. Also, it is currently free for people in health care. As a paramedic in these crazy times it is much appreciated.

title: I love it but wish
review: I‚Äôm a teenager during quarantine who got on a horrible sleep schedule and can no longer sleep soundly so the past few nights I‚Äôve tried headspace and I‚Äôve never slept better but now I‚Äôve used up all my free ones and can‚Äôt afford to pay the subscription it was lovely whilst it lasted I was just so very happy to be sleeping soundly again I just wish I could afford it

title: Breathing easier
review: Especially in these uncertain times, Headspace has helped me ease the anxiety during the day and fall asleep faster. I just feel better overall - my focus, my digestion and my outlook improved and I feel more capable of handling future stressors. Thanks so much!

title: Really good but one ‚Äúproblem‚Äù.
review: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this app, I used it for the first time last night and I fell asleep SO FAST. (And I usually take a long time to) But I don‚Äôt like how most of the things are locked because you have to pay for them. But they need to make money somehow I guess. Otherwise, no ‚Äúreal‚Äù problems. ITS SOOOO GOOD.

title: Discovering my own breath
review:
Headspace has taught me to discover awareness, to let go and to face challenges with a different approach. 
I could not have grown so much in the past few years without Andy‚Äôs guidance in meditation. Thank you for teaching me how to breathe and how to better appreciate everything in life.

title: Read my review so you don‚Äôt get the wrong idea
review: I am a very stressed out person and I had this app once before it helped with falling asleep so well then I deleted it I just downloaded it again and tried pretty much everything and everything was locked because I didn‚Äôt want to do a 3 day trial and I didn‚Äôt want to subscribe. So if you are ok with paying then good for you but if your not I don‚Äôt suggest this app. Hope this helped!

title: Good for my head and heart
review: I have used Headspace off and on for four or five years. It‚Äôs never been more important to my well-being than it is now. And, the app keeps innovating content that adds to the scope of ways it can be useful to mind and body.

title: Best guided meditation
review: I‚Äôm so well pleased with this app. The creators, the content and everything in between from the daily reminders and inspiration. I haven‚Äôt found anything better! 10/10 recommend this app, it‚Äôs worth the investment. You are worth the investment üíì

title: Almost everything needs subscription
review: Headspace is great... only for people who are willing to pay. There‚Äôs barely anything you can do without paying. Everything on the app is good, but like I said, you need to pay for like 7/8 of it. I would give it one star but I gave it 2 because the meditations are really good. With all that being said, I will be deleting it soon. Thank you for reading. I hope this helped you!

title: I feel a lot better when using this app, really gets my day started off on the right foot
review: I have been doing this app on and off for a few weeks, but I know if I do it everyday, I will be able to stay more calm and relaxed, thanks

title: Mixed feelings
review: On the positive side I find it very useful to use this app. On the negative side, I never received a trial period but was instead charged the full price immediately. When I contacted customer service to cancel it, they couldn‚Äôt find my account. So I needed to use the app because I was so dang frustrated with the purchase. I don‚Äôt plan to renew my subscription but the app works very well

title: Evolving
review: I‚Äôve been a huge user of Headspace over the past five years and I am consistently impressed and grateful with their unique offerings that all speak to one purpose, awareness. Thank you for staying centered in this purpose while bringing forth fun and inventive content that is a betterment to all humanity.

title: Good
review: I search throughout the app, and saw I only had a few options to listen to. This was fine, until I realized all except one were voices. I wanted to turn the voices off, but that is not something you can do with the app. So listen to the same music every night. My point is, very much more powerful if you buy headspace plus.    Please change this.

title: This app is amazing
review: It helps with sleep, anxiety, stress, suicidal thoughts, and just tries to make you feel better. It is a little bit annoying because of the fact that you have to buy headspace premium, but other than that it‚Äôs amazing!

title: Horizontal Mode Writing Agian
review: Hi one more time. I have already written to you recently and you promised to consider a horizontal view for this app. But a month passed and there are no changes. I still cannot use this app while my iPad is in Apple Smart Keyboard. I really do not get why it would take so much time to bring horizon view. Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 17020265, 'body': "Thank you for your review; we'll be sure your feedback for a horizontal mode is heard. If you have any questions, please email our Support Team at help@headspace.com.\n", 'modified': '2020-08-01T22:14:10Z'}

title: This Is Amazing
review: I have been all over the world and have tried many different ways of meditation. Headspace is definitely, by far, the best ways of learning how to properly meditate to get the most out of each session. Recommend  to everyone!

title: Thank you
review: Thank you for making the ‚ÄòAdapting to Sudden Change‚Äô course free. I lost my job due to Covid-19, and this course is helping me cope. You guys didn‚Äôt have to make it free, you chose to. You‚Äôre making a positive impact on the world in a time when people need it most. Thank you.

title: They offer a lot but I wish there was more to the free version.
review: There are a lot of good guidance videos that I‚Äôd love to watch and sessions that I‚Äôd love to take but they are blocked on the free version. The basic classes have been very helpful and are worth downloading for but I wish I could access more. I struggle to justify paying a premium for mental peace.

title: Incredible app & fantastic customer support!
review: I have LOVED using headspace, it has absolutely changed my perspective on my anxiety and has had a huge influence on my life! Alsoooo HUGE shouts out to Angel because she was so sweet when I needed customer service & helped me out instantly. Enjoy the journey and happy meditating üñ§üñ§

title: I can tell a difference
review: I love this app. I can tell an improvement in my ability to cope, stay relaxed, and patiently approach stressful things I encounter throughout my day. And I‚Äôve noticed a difference when I go awhile without using it. I definitely recommend this app!

title: Awesome and great
review: I think that headspace is a great app and I love it. I love the calming voices and meditation. The only thing that I don‚Äôt like is that you have to pay for things like premium. And also nothing is perfect. Other than that it‚Äôs a great app and I would recommend you download it and use it. It‚Äôs better than  any meditation app I know of üòÉüòÑ

title: I‚Äôve been loving the free trial
review: I finished the course on the free plan and I loved it. You get 10 days of 10 different meditations with 3 instructors plus other fun videos. I‚Äôm still working on building the habit so I‚Äôm taking the course again but with a different instructor this time.

title: Meditations for Grief & Injustice
review: I am SO deeply inspired & grateful for the mini-series of content launched focusing on how to overcome various traumas due to social unrest & injustice... A brilliant example of beautiful actions companies can take that are inspiring the benevolent evolutions happening in our world. THANK YOU for this corporate accountability, Headspace!! Love your work!!

title: Health Care Provider in 2020
review: Headspace was offered free to healthcare workers at the peak of 2020 last year. I always wanted to try it, so here was my chance. It changed my life. I mean that sincerely. I crave sessions with andy and it has helped center me, teach me how to decompress, and de-escalate the emotions I was feeling that were taking control of my life.

title: Meh - like listening to one long run-on sentence
review:
I‚Äôm only three days into the beginner course. I‚Äôd like it a lot more if the teacher (Eva) paused between sentences, but instead you have no time to process what she said before she‚Äôs onto the next instruction. 

Example: ‚ÄúNow let your mind do whatever it wants to do now take a deep breath now feel your body in your chair now congratulations you‚Äôre done.‚Äù It‚Äôs actually stressful! PAUSE BETWEEN INSTRUCTIONS. Give me a minute or even 30 seconds to try what you just asked me to do.

I‚Äôd change teachers, but the other woman has a lisp and I don‚Äôt like the English guy‚Äôs voice. I‚Äôm being overly picky, I know. 

I guess it‚Äôs just not the meditation app for me.

title: Well worth it
review: This is one of the few apps I will pay for, because it‚Äôs not an app. It‚Äôs having mental health. The app is just the interface - the convenient method through which we access this content. Thank you for your teaching.

title: Not bad
review:
Overall a great app.

Positives: Great meditations, soothing speakers, great visuals. I like that they keep a tracker of how you feel over the course of a month. Additional articles to read.

Negatives: A lot of content is locked behind a subscription. I get it but, they give you just a little in terms of free. I‚Äôm talking one session, two tops.

Others of Note: I‚Äôm stuck listening to Kevin Hart when I run. I don‚Äôt personally like the man for a racist birthday party he held for his son (I‚Äôm indigenous). I wish I could have options to listen to other speakers like in guided meditation in their application. When I think ‚Äúmindful runs‚Äù I don‚Äôt go straight to Kevin Hart of all people. Makes me want to stay in.

title: A Beginners Guide to Meditation
review: I am an Infectious Disease physician and many of my patients describe to me what is all too familiar, the monkey mind. I encourage my patients to meditate, and it doesn‚Äôt matter which app or book or silence one uses, what matters is that one meditates. It‚Äôs just that Andy has does a good job of making it approachable.

title: Literally amazing
review: this app has gotten me through some really rough panic attacks, esp during quarentine. there‚Äôs this really amazing feature on the home page that‚Äôs called the panic button, and it is the best grounding tool i‚Äôve ever used. I highly recommend it, thank you so much devs!

title: Made Me Sleep Fast
review: As soon as I put the thing that talks you to sleep and for you to count backwards from 10,000 made me fall asleep very fast. Because of this app I can finally get some good sleep when I have to go to sleep, it‚Äôs very nice. This app deserves a 5 star review.

title: Charged twice and still no Plus
review: I have been charged twice for the Headspace Plus app and yet to be upgraded to Headspace Plus. It still tells me that I need to unlock with the Plus subscription. Trying to figure out how to contact the application to get my at least $100 back. I enjoy the app otherwise because meditation has become a part of my life so I would use Plus but who can afford to just throw $100 out the window for nothing?
developerResponse: {'id': 16603553, 'body': "We're sorry for the trouble with your subscription charges. Please send our team a note to help@headspace.com and we can assist you with this!", 'modified': '2020-07-13T20:10:29Z'}

title: This app is amazing
review: My gosh this app is amazing I was supposed to go to sleep at 1:00 I was up till 3:30 until I saw a add and I was so desperate that I downloaded the app than I tried it out I was sleep in less than 20 minutes I recommend this to who ever has trouble falling asleep!

title: Apple Watch - allow speaker access
review: I‚Äôve enjoyed the meditations so far. However, I do not like that I need headphones to access meditation on my Apple watch. For the Apple Watch app, can you please allow the meditation to play through the speaker. This is possible on the Apple Watch Calm app which I‚Äôve found myself using more because it‚Äôs more accessible on my watch.

title: Such A Great App
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for a little while and it‚Äôs really great. The soothing voices help me relax after each and every day. I recommend it to you if you‚Äôre very busy, stressed, tired, or have been sitting for a while or uncomfortably. Its the best! Thank you for reading!!

title: Amazing
review: This app is amazing! If I am stressed I feel calmer. If I am happy, I can contain it to the point where I am relaxed and happy. I personally like the male voice, he is relaxing. I strongly suggest using this, and I am only 12 years old. Using this makes you feel happy or just generally relaxed and calm.

title: Great way to learn to meditate
review: Slowing the mind in our frenetic world takes both discipline and practice. Andy has opened this ancient discipline in an incredibly accessible way. The step-by-step guided approach makes meditation easier, more fun and you will notice the transformation quickly.

title: Helped me be content with myself
review: I was struggling to figure out myself and what I want to be, and to be honest I still don‚Äôt really understand what I want. But Headspace has made me realize that that is perfectly okay and helped me relax and lean into the uncertainty of life and the future.

title: Great!
review: This app is amazing! I highly recommend it. For years I‚Äôve had terrible insomnia. Nothing worked to help me get to sleep. Someone suggested this app to me and I was skeptical, but when I got it I fell asleep so much better! My sleeping habits are getting back to normal because of this app!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: The best addition to my self improvement journey
review: This app has so many different outlets to experience self growth. I truly enjoy exploring all of the options it has to offer. My mind has been opened and I am a genuinely happier person because of this app.

title: Student discount
review: Education can be really taxing on us mentally and emotionally. Headspace recognizes this and gives an incredible discount for students - they also happen to have a really high quality app that caters to many different needs. They earned their 5 stars for sure

title: Game changer
review: For anyone that feels rushed, anxious, overwhelmed, meditation helps. If you do not know where to start, try this app. Give it time, start slow and explore it. I have been using it for two years and love it. The amount of rich content is endless.

title: My whole family uses it
review: From the quick meditations for releasing anger to the 500 minute sleepcasts, this app has saved my family from countless meltdowns and restless nights. My kids are calmer and more present and remarkably better at riding the waves of emotions they encounter in a day.

title: love but
review: I love headspace it helps me calm down so much etc. But i hate that you have to pay now or have some stupid subscription i‚Äôm on my free trial right now because i don‚Äôt have the money to pay for the subscription but the app is really great rather than all the things i can‚Äôt do cuz i have to have the ‚Äúpremium‚Äù

title: ‚òπÔ∏èannoying
review:
For PE I need a meditation app, I‚Äôve already tried the app Calm and some others, so I downloaded this! Well all of the apps I‚Äôve gone to make me put in my email AND I can‚Äôt find my heart beat on the app unless I pay money. I feel that everyone should be able to control their body with a little help. BUT USUALLY IT DOESNT COST MONEYüòû. Sorry. Other than that this is a good app and if ur willing to pay, then download this. 

Thanks and sry for overreactingü•∏

title: Amazing App - some fixes
review: I love using this app and the meditations are all lovely. One thing that I would like is to have Andy‚Äôs voice as an option for the sleep meditations (and for all of them actually). The woman‚Äôs voice is a lot more difficult for me to ease in to and I can‚Äôt use the sleep meditations because of that.

title: With all the mental heal issues they should make this free I love the free version basic
review: Just the basic helps me a lot you guys need to make this app free and just do ads or something or make it like 5 30 sec ads unlocks a category and you guys did do it now so that‚Äôs fireeee

title: Not worth it
review: Anytime an app has a subscription fee I don‚Äôt trust it. They make more money no matter how much or little you use it, and chances are the majority of users will use it less than half the time. The free version gives you access to 5 mindfulness tactics out of the hundred available. They basically don‚Äôt even give you a choice between the free and paid versions because of how little access you get from the free version.

title: Narration Too Chatty
review: I hate that 2-3 mins of a 10 min meditation is wasted on the narrator chatting before and after the actual meditation. I understand perhaps doing an intro at the beginning of a series but why does it need to be every single meditation of the same series? And sometimes you just want to go a little longer but the narrator continues to chat after a mediation too..

title: DONT BOTHER UNLESS WANTING TO SOEND MONEY
review: I‚Äôve seen so many ads for this app and I was interested I installed it trying to find something to ease me into sleep and I spent 5 minutes trying to find one thing that wasn‚Äôt locked behind a paywall for a subscription service like all I wanted to do was try it and im not signing up every dang time for a trial when I want to try something I only found one feature that was actually free that‚Äôs it so if your not looking to buy anything don‚Äôt even bother with this

title: The worst experience
review: They literally will not let you cancel your subscription. No option in the app. No option on desktop. Email support- no response. Now my annual subscription is going to renew when I‚Äôve been trying to cancel for 9 days and I‚Äôm going to have to dispute the charge with the bank. I will be actively telling everyone I know to delete this scam of an app and cancel their accounts well in advance (if they even can). Just an awful user experience.

title: Too many locked things
review: I understand why everyone else gave good reviews but it‚Äôs only because they pay for it. Some people are either too young or just can‚Äôt afford to pay for something just to help them to sleep. I get anxiety when I try to go to sleep so I just wanted an app that could help me with that. But I am only 13 so I don‚Äôt have money to pay for this app. I think that the app with the unlocked things is great otherwise it would be a waste of time.

title: Amazing!
review: Incredible app, definitely worth the payment! I tend my self having a rough night sleep with out listening to my bed time podcast. It has become a must have; and is work into my night schedule everyday!

title: Lovely app
review: Really enjoying this app. I like the reminder feature because who doesn‚Äôt need reminders when your day is full of activities. I also like being able to choose the instructor.

title: Helps me to focus the rest of the day
review: I meditate first thing in the morning and find I can get more done through the rest of the day. I am a lot less distracted by social media as well. I‚Äôve just started but that is the immediate effect I‚Äôve noticed.

title: Life Changing
review: I used to suffer with anxiety which manifested by having episodes of choking. I think it was panic attacks. Daily meditation with head space has completely stopped the episodes of choking! Now I notice anxious feelings and breathe. What a simple and incredible tool, I am so grateful ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Stick it out!
review: I‚Äôve meditated on and off for decades. This is the best of everything that I had learned from all prior ‚ÄúMasters/Teachers‚Äù in a really accessible format. Combining the ethereal with the pragmatic in a variety of learning styles, just hang with it, I look forward to it every morning.  JP üëèüëèüòä

title: Long time user
review: I love this app I have been using it for such a long time seems like 8-10 years, I can‚Äôt remember exactly. It has truly helped me see my thoughts and be more present with my thoughts abs emotions. I wonder if adding analytic mediation has been considered.

title: 5/5 ‚Äî astounding
review: As an attorney, I deal with daily stress and this app has helped me find my footing to inner peace, better and more creatively solve the legal issues before me, and better concentrate my thoughts as I write and communicate with others. Highly recommend this app. 5/5 ‚Äî astounding.

title: World Class!
review: If I could I would give this app 10 Stars!  It goes above and beyond what you would expect from a mediation app and surpassed my expectations. There are way too many cool and useful features for me to try to explain. Do yourself a favor and give the free trial a go!

title: Headspace has made me more happy
review: Are used to be a very anxious person. Since I started using headspace, it not only calmed my mind, but it changed my way of thinking. Making me become a happier person with a happier mind.  I truly recommend this app to everyone!!!!

title: Life changer
review: This app has done more for my grieving, and anxiety than all my years of therapy.  Everyone around me sees a positive change.  I handle most situations in a more calm way.  I haven‚Äôt been this happy and confident in decades.  I‚Äôve literally thanked God for this app in prayer.  Simply life changing for me.

title: Really helpful
review: I have meditated on and off but this is great. It‚Äôs guided by wonderful people that know and understand the process. It has been incredibly useful to me and my morning routine and the positive change in my life is becoming more evident as I continue on this journey.

title: Recommend
review: Meditation WORKS. Headspace makes it easier by provided so many options to choose from, depending on what you need. Cheaper than other options I‚Äôve tried. Headspace changes my life and perspective everyday. Highly recommend!!!

title: This is awesome
review: Headspace is awesome they have everything that Would make me happy like for the sleeping exercises they have sleep cast, they have falling to sleep ,they have pain exercises and last but not least morning or getting ready for bed workouts and etc.

title: Fantastic!
review: Meditations are wonderful, but the true star of this app is the sleepcasts.  Rainday Antiques is literally the best thing for my insomnia. The narrator's voice is so soothing, I am usually asleep in the first 15 minutes.  I love rain day antiques so much I haven't really been able to try the others.

title: It‚Äôs ok
review: It‚Äôs ok but I want to just hear the music when I‚Äôm sleep I don‚Äôt wanna hear people talking and then when I try to play just the music it only last for 60 minutes I wish I could play just the music for as long as u sleep without no interruptions put it‚Äôs a good app if u want to hear people talk when u sleep and if u wanna pay for it after your free trail is overü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.

title: Awesome!! I love this app- perfect for me and my kidsüòé
review: This app is well organized and easy to use. the meditat packs and topics are really wonderful- and I am someone who has always been afraid of or disregarded meditation as ‚Äúhard‚Äù or not my thing. Ilove this! Kids section is great too!!! Thank you!

title: Appreciation for headspace right now
review: I‚Äôm so grateful headspace made the app available to healthcare workers like myself, my sister and my husband in this wild and unprecedentedly stressful time. I just downloaded the app this morning and I‚Äôm appreciating the clear, low-key meditations already.

title: It‚Äôs ok
review: I was so excited to try this app. When they gave subscriptions to health care workers I jumped at the chance. However, after using it for a week or so I have noticed that every meditation is the same, no matter the category. There‚Äôs like 2 types of meditation. The sunshine, or scanning your body. It is lacking in diversity of meditations for sure.

title: The Best App Ever
review: This app is what really started me getting into meditation and I can‚Äôt imagine life without it. A lot of people say that the price is too high but honestly it‚Äôs a lot of different meditation themes and you have access to the soundscapes which I use every night.

title: Peace be with you
review: These chill guided sessions are lit üî• Do it for yourself, do it for those you want to be your best for.  A sense of peace will get to you on this journey. ü§çthe options for male or female voice (ü§çthe accent mate) and session times which vary from 3-15min depending on the topic you choose.  Practice this, it‚Äôs next level *

title: App is Great. Customer Service is a 0.
review: I‚Äôve been using headspace for the last two years. I cancelled my recurring membership and bought a one-time membership for a year. I‚Äôve been able to log into my account but I haven‚Äôt been able to access any of the paid content. I‚Äôve emailed headspace three times over the last month and I‚Äôve been trying to keep my chill. What would be even more chill is if I could have someone help me because I haven‚Äôt heard back yet!

title: Meditation and Motivation
review: I have had Headspace for about a year now and it‚Äôs been instrumental in helping me to learn to meditate but also has increased my daily level of motivation! The app has so many other features that motivate me, inspire me, and help me in such a holistic way!!

title: Great app. I use it every day
review:
I have used Headspace every day for over a year now.

Meditation is interesting and can be difficult at times. Headspace helps simplify the concepts and makes it enjoyable to keep on meditating.

Highly recommend to anyone and everyone.
I personally find it hard to sleep in silence, so this is personally a great app for me and I highly recommend to others who find it hard to sleep without rain or something playing in the background.

title: 100% 5 star ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
review:
The app is simply amazing- it‚Äôs has definitely improved how fast I fall asleep as well as my quality of sleep!

Not to mention they added a reminder upon opening the all, Thats it‚Äôs National Woman‚Äôs Day and to thank a woman. 
That alone is a five star rating!

title: Excellent daily self care tool!
review: Challenging myself to self care. Wow! This journey is different for me everyday. One moment I think I have it and then a week has gone by and I find my life has take me away. Headspace brings me back. Wonderful tool to stay in flow. Thanks you!!

title: Customer support?  Antithesis of the app!
review: I‚Äôve been working for days now trying to make the favorites feature work.  I pay for the full subscription so expect access to all features. ‚ÄúCustomer support ‚Äú sends me articles and suggestions indicating they haven‚Äôt even read about the issue. The content is great but I need it to be easily accessible, especially in the middle of the night
